"James Harris, you are the man!" Those were the first words that came to your mind when you woke up. They were also the last words you heard from your interview with your new boss Kim. You were happy beyond belief. This was your first real job since you graduated from university. Before that you had worked at the beach for minimum money, barely managing to make ends meet as you had worked as a chef, a waiter, a housekeeper and had gone through all types of labor work during your university years.

That was about to change! You were finally employed by one of the biggest companies in the city and in the state, which would help you skyrocket your future career and to eventually become the one on the managerial position, as that was your goal.

"I'll do whatever it takes to reach my goals! I didn't put up with university professors so I could boost my GPA and not work my way up to the top!" Those were the words you thought to yourself while you were getting ready for work. Shortly after you were already out of your apartment and strolled to work.

You were already in the company for a week, however, you were not really familiar with the atmosphere, as you were stuck in one small room with a trainer that was preparing you for what was to come. She was a beauty but from what you heard you would only see her for the first week, as she was not part of the working staff on the floor above. The week by itself went really slow, as the training was mundane, as it was but a repeat of what you had learned from your days in higher education.

Furthermore, you were also distracted by your tutor's dazzling feet. Feet had always been your weakness, despite how much you tried to fight it. "And that's all! You are ready for work, I am sure you will be our top seller!" The tutor exclaimed as the final moments of your training had come to an end.

1121211112222.title: Michelle takes the rest of the day off.

112121112.content:
A click of heels makes both yours and Michelle's attention shift behind you.

Kim! She's on her way over...quickly composing yourself, you give her a smile and cheery wave as Michelle giggles gently.

"Remember that I'm a superstar. Oh, and don't forget that you're my bitch..." she murmurs to you, too softly for Kim to hear as she arrives at where the two of you are 'working'.

"James...Michelle! How's it all going?" She looks between the two of you.

"Great...really great!" You reply instantly. "Michelle's gone through all the necessary induction procedures and has aced the initial online assessment task..look, I've got the results right here!"

Kim peers over her glasses, her expression clearly conveying approval. "Wow, I don't think I've ever seen a score that high from a newbie!" She looks across at Michelle and smiles. "Well done. I am extremely impressed! James, what was your initial assessment score when you started?"

You feel your cheeks reddening at the fact that Kim is saying this right in front of Michelle. "Er...well...well, her score is over 30 percent higher than mine was..."

Kim practically ignores you as she continues to stare at Michelle. "Very impressive. So, James here must be quite the mentor, huh?"

Michelle shrugs, a look of apparent sincerity about her. "I'm a quick learner to be honest. I've had to speed James up a bit, you know try to cut out his waffle a bit. The assessment was pretty easy. I did similar things in college - I reckon I'm ready to move to the next level!"

"Wow...such ambition! Reminds me of...me." Kim and Michelle exchange grins, while you look uselessly between them, powerless to prevent Michelle from taking all of the credit for her impressive score. You did it for her! Still, you can't say anything, knowing that Michelle could reveal your secret at any time... Michelle's made you her bitch all right!

Your redhead boss frowns for a moment as she glances down at the floor, noticing that your trainee is barefoot.

"No shoes, huh? What's that all about?"

Shrugging again, the cute brunette gives Kim an innocent smile. "Oh, I just find it more comfortable. It's not a problem, right?"

Kim pauses for a moment before breaking into a smile. "What the hell - if it gets you scores like that, you can be barefoot as much as you like!"

Your heart sinks; Michelle being told not to be barefoot could help restore some sense of pride or self-respect, allowing you to stand up to the brat...who are you kidding! You're her willing work bitch now!

"You OK, James?" Kim raises her eyebrows, staring directly at you.

Michelle sighs. "He does this a lot. Don't worry, I can deal with it. James, now print out my assessment results so we can analyse the data." The petite brunette says this with such authority that you find yourself meekly nodding and standing to your feet at once.

"Looks like Michelle's the one training you!" Kim chuckles at you before turning on her heel and stalking away.

"Good work, bitch," Michelle says smugly as she looks up at you, one foot swaying hypnotically from side to side. "Now, I'm going to go out with some friends for brunch. If anyone asks, just explain that I'm familiarising myself with some other department in the office. You'll think of something. You can do my induction tasks. I want an ever higher score than last time."

She stands up, slipping her shoes back on and staring challengingly at you, hands on her hips. "Oh, I want my car cleaned too. You can't miss it - it's a white BMW 3 series. My number plate is 'Mich Wins'. I'll be back at lunch so get it done before then. I want it so clean that I can see my face in the windscreen! You got all that, bitch?"

Too overawed to even consider denying her, you nod slowly.

"Er, answer me properly. Say 'Yes, boss,'" Michelle says in a gloating voice, clearly loving the power she holds over you.

"Yes...boss," you say humbly, wishing that your foot fetish had stayed hidden today. Michelle smirks in satisfaction as she slinks away, leaving you to stand hopelessly in front of your computer.

Sighing and sitting down, you begin working on her next assessment task. You can't help but rue the fact that Michelle is getting all the plaudits from Kim for doing absolutely nothing! And now leaving this early in the day for brunch with friends?! An idea pops into your head. Kim wouldn't be fawning over this rookie if her next test score wasn't quite so impressive...

Helena!
Someone else...
1121211121.content:
The mutinous idea you have dissipates quickly away when you realise the flaw in you plan: Michelle will use it to blackmail you even more! Sighing with resignation, you dutifully do as you're told, working away on the next assignment task, which - at your level - is not particularly challenging. Still, it takes time as there are over two hundred multiple choice questions.

Whether you like it or not, you simply have to accept that Michelle is going to become Kim's favourite very soon! The way the two women were practically ignoring you as they revelled in Michelle's success is a cringing one. And it's all because of your foot fetish!

In the last few years, since working at this office, you've never let anyone - female or otherwise - take advantage of you. Your foot fetish has never been an issue. Perhaps that's why you've been overly macho, talking down to the likes of Denise and Candice, in order to convince yourself that you're an alpha male. Well, Michelle has certainly dispelled any illusions of that now! Cursing yourself for being so stupid as to let this brat discover your fetish, now exploit it to the max, you refocus on the task in hand.

A half hour or so later, you're done. 95%! That is slightly higher than the initial assessment...Michelle will be pleased! Remembering that all this means is that Kim will be even more impressed with the cute brunette, you let out another defeated sigh.

By the time you've done the third task, again averaging 95%, you remember Michelle's other task - cleaning her car! Checking the time, it's now past midday. Almost lunch time! Thinking it best to borrow some cleaning supplies from the janitor's office, you manage to retrieve a bucket, water, sponge and cleaning fluid without Helena, the janitor who seems to hate your guts, see you.

Sneaking into the car park, you look nervously around but no one appears to be here. It doesn't take you long to find Michelle's car. The numberplate 'Mich Wins' is obviously customised and sums up your situation succinctly.

"I bet her Daddy bought this for her," you mutter quietly aloud as you begin sponging the windscreen of the BMW 3 series. Even though she's several years younger than you, she has a more expensive car. Soon she's going to be earning more money than you, you grimly muse to yourself.

You make sure to do a thorough job of cleaning Michelle's car, wiping clean every single square inch of the vehicle, including the alloys and even under some of the car. Being careful not to get any water or dirt on your shirt or pants, you begin trudging away, back to the office.

"Well, this is interesting!" A familiar voice behind you stops you dead in your tracks.

Who is it?

"Helena! What are you doing here?" You smile at her, trying your best to be jovial and friendly.

She smirks at you, the corners of her mouth twitching. "What am I doing here? I am not the one..." She nods in the direction of Michelle's car. "Being a car cleaning bitch!"

Reeling a little from her blunt assessment, you try to keep your cool. "Me...cleaning her car. Oh, it's nothing....I was just checking something for her."

"Pa!" She sees through your bullshit straight away. Walking closer to you with a hand on one hip she clicks at the bucket of water and sponge. "So, what's all this. Huh?"

Glowering at the janitor, you revert to your cold manner with her. "Whatever. It's no big deal. Thank you so much for borrowing your valuable cleaning equipment."

Around a year ago, Denise and Candice took it upon themselves to make Helena absolutely hate you. Initially, you tried to explain that these were just lies that you never called her "just a cleaning woman". Unfortunately, the Hispanic janitor did not believe you and has despised you ever since! In turn, you've returned her hostility, meeting her glares with your own.

Your sarcastic retort seems to please her, as if to confirm to her that you are a real jerk. "I didn't let you borrow my stuff...gringo. So you better apologise to me. Now!"

"Hahaha! You really think I'm gonna apologise to you?" You scoff, shaking your head and walking away from her.

"Apologise now, you piece of shit, or I'm gonna tell boss lady Kim! I'll tell her that you stole my things, then cleaned that new girl's car!" She shouts angrily, making you - for the second time - be rooted to the spot.

"New girl...how do you...?" Your words trail off uselessly as Helena points to the number plate 'Mich Wins'.

"I met Michelle this morning," Helena says with a glint in her eyes. "Ha - whoud'a thought that little piece of skirt would have you by the balls!"

"She doesn't-"

"Well I want that too. To have you bow down to me and show me some fucking respect! You've been a patronising bastard to me for the last year and I've had enough!" She interrupts you, a look of triumph adorning her hard, yet pretty features.

"What do you...want?" You gulp, trying to assert some authority over the situation, but finding it increasingly difficult to do so.

She smirks as she walks right up to you, her breathing a little wild. "Bow down to me and apologise for being a jerk to me. Promise from now on you will show me respect! If you do that, then I won't tell Miss Kim about how you're 'helping' that new girl."

There is a decisive look about her that's hard to refuse. Being ordered around today by yet another woman...are you really going to allow yourself to go through with this?!

A sudden, almost blissful feeling washes over you as you stare at Helena. Being tempted and seduced by Michelle's bare feet is one thing, but you're not a schmuck! You haven't got into the position you're in by people - a janitor of all people - walking over you!

You look up from her croc shoes and meet her smirk, causing her pretty eyes to widen in surprise. "What...what's so funny, gringo?"

Ignoring Helena's furious yells, you smile to yourself as you feel like you're walking on clouds. By pushing you this far, the Hispanic janitor has actually made you stronger than ever, rather than broken you! You grimace as you think about how easily you allowed Michelle to run roughshod all over you this morning.

"That little brat," you growl to yourself. It's not too late to redress things - at the moment it would only be your word against Michelle's, if the newbie would attempt to dob you in to Kim. Chewing this over, you stop by at one of the reception desks - not that bitch Candice, who gives you a customary glare, but to your friend, Jenny.

"Hey, Jenny! How are you this fine afternoon?" You ask her with a smile.

The cute redhead returns it. "Not as well as you, apparently! Is it because you're, like, the most awesome mentor in the world?"

You blink for a moment before realising what she means. Of course, word of Michelle's initial assessment scores must have spread around the office like wildfire. Trying to be modest, you smile at her. "Well, you know, she's a quick learner!"

Your friend leans in, as if she's about to tell you something confidential. Jenny has been a loyal friend to you for several years now. Admittedly, you've never felt any romantic inclination towards her. Perhaps it's because she's such a useful ally that you wouldn't want to risk compromising the strong working relationship you have with her. She always keeps you up to speed with Denise, Candice and the other goings on at the office, which have proved invaluable.

"So...Denise is really pissed. Kim told her that this newbie is amazing. She's freaking out that you're gonna get some massive promotion, and that the rookie is gonna move up the ladder - above her - too!" She grins at you.

Your heart sinks a little. Truthfully, Kim is not impressed with you at all; she made it crystal clear that it is solely Michelle who has earned brownie points.

"What is it?" Jenny frowns at you. "Thought you would be loving it!"

You consider confiding in Jenny. She has proven to be a confidant, friend and ultimately someone that you can trust. But telling her about Michelle is certainly risky....

114.content:
It’s good to be king.
King of the world, king of the company, it didn’t matter. You finally did it. It took years of climbing the ladder, kicking off anyone who tried to drag you down. You kept your friends close, your enemies even closer. You finally reached the top of the mountain, and to be perfectly honest, the view was pretty damn great.
King James. It has a nice ring to it. Biblical even.
And now that you finally reached the pinnacle of the mountain, nothing better to do than lean over your royal balcony and watch the legions and legions of appreciative subjects screaming their adulation and love for you.
“Hey buddy, I said are you gonna pay me now or am I gonna have to call the cops?”
Well, most of them anyways.
Jolted begrudgingly from your day dream, you reached into your pocket and produced your leather wallet to reward your driver. Pulling out a few dollars, you handed it to the man who greedily snatched it up and turned back towards the wheel. Not even receiving so much as a “thank you,” you grabbed your briefcase and exited your royal carriage, known by most peasants as a taxi cab.
With your trusty brown briefcase in one hand and a foamy latte in the other, you briefly turned back to the taxi window and admired your reflection.
Dressed in your premier apparel consisting of a brown jacket, a white buttoned shirt with black tie, khaki pants, and polished dress shoes, you were the spitting image of the “rags to riches” success story. Now, all that’s missing is a scepter.
Breathing in the excitement and letting your emotions breathe out, you reopened your eyes and simply marveled at your castle: the office building.
Towering above the urban village with its metallic glass panels and giant bold lettering, you couldn’t help but break into a goofy smile as you realized that all of this now belonged to you. Figuratively speaking, of course.
Normally, you would flaunt your new cornucopia of wealth by showcasing your first (of many) sports car, one truly befitting that of a king. But seeing as how this was your first day as the new “chief of office,” a more humble and nuanced means of transportation would work more to your advantage.
Straightening your tie, you took a quick sip of your coffee to wet your lips for conversation before pushing open the glass doors and making your presence known.
Inhaling deeply, the smell of fresh victory (and artificial freshener) was definitely a new yet most welcoming one. It was one that had eluded you for so very long, but now it was a smell that you hoped would greet you daily in the coming years.
Carrying yourself with the professionalism and poise befitting of a king, you couldn’t help but smile a bit inside as you caught the lingering glares of your passing colleagues as they saw you strut confidently past them. A platinum name tag was pinned to your left coat pocket, one that simply read: Junior Manager.
It was approximately five steps in that a new smell permeated your nostrils, one that reeked of bitterness and jealousy. It was almost refreshing to see so many of your colleagues who claimed to be the best of friends finally reveal who they really are deep down. Some gave you the cold shoulder while most didn’t even have the decency to give congratulations for your promotion.
"Figures. They like you when you're on their level, but dare to climb up the ladder and they just want to pull you down," you thought to yourself, brushing past a few coworkers who merely glowered at you resentfully.
Vowing not to let their negativity take you out of your unusually uplifting mood, you decided to pay a visit to the office receptionist and rub your victory in even more. After all, nothing better than a heaping pile of public humiliation to help her eat her words, right?
Walking up to her natural habitat, you took another sip of the beverage before you two inevitably locked eyes and a sly smirk crossed your face.
Candice.
No doubt the co-conspirator of several smear campaigns led by the queen bitch herself to get you fired, her malevolence is matched only by her disdainful mood She is the center of office gossip, somehow knowing about enough embarrassing incidents or humiliating nuggets from anyone’s past that would put TMZ to shame.
There is no doubt that you would’ve been “future-endeavored” had she found out about your...secret, primarily because of who she would’ve told it to: Denise. The two were determined to run you out of the office from the day you were first hired as an intern, but you stood your ground. They were practically foaming at the mouth to get some dirt on you, but you kept your record spotless. And now that the day of reckoning was finally here, well, you know what they say about payback.
It was truly one of those rare occurrences in your career to legitimately see Candice at a loss for words, or rather trying to piece together some that won’t get her suspended for professional misconduct.
A bitter, ugly snarl carved into her powdered face, accented only by her brown eyes staring daggers into your smug expression.
Despite the fact that she was a monster on the inside, she was by no means unattractive on the outside. She sported a very slender and womanly figure, with curves all in the right places. With her naturally brunette hair tied in a bun, at least two earrings clipped around each ear, and her facial features sharp enough to cut through wood, the only thing marring her face was the sheer abundance of overindulgent makeup that she had applied.
Neck down, she wore a white blouse complimented a light red jacket along along with a crimson pencil skirt that ended at her knees. That was the extent of her, with the receptionist table obscuring the rest of her waist-down.
“Good morning, James,” she greeted curtly, without any of the trademark warmth or enthusiasm you’d usually expect from a receptionist. Then again, Candice and warmth is an oxymoron in itself.
“It always is until I speak to you, Candice,” you replied in kind, much to her visible chagrin.
Hiding her irritation behind a few twitches in her lips, she tried resuming her work typing furiously into the computer.
“Yes well….congratulations on the new promotion, James,” she stated with her teeth gnarling into a forced grin, barely concealing her disgust at having to utter such a blasphemous phrase.
“Actually, it’s Mr. James now. Our clients would appreciate knowing who the man in charge is, don’t you think Candice?” you smiled coyly, your grin growing ever wider as her disdainful look only magnified.
Biting her lip for a moment, a wicked smile crossed her face as she leaned in to retort. “Yes but with all due respect, Mr. James I’m sure that Kim will take offense to that statement. She does run the building, you know.”
“For now,” you shot back defensively as Candice reminded you of the natural pecking order. You were king of the castle at last, but the whole kingdom was still a work in progress.
“And I see you’re still working hard, or hardly working. I can never tell with you,” you smirked, seeking to regain control of the verbal one-upmanship while resting your elbows on the counter casually.
“Well unlike you, Mr. James I actually take my job seriously. You won’t find me trying to flaunt my new job promotion to my colleagues in some pathetic attempt to overcompensate for something that we both know was never there in the first place,” she sneered vindictively, her lips pursed in a triumphant snicker as her last words hit you like a freight train.
It definitely jolted you for a moment, but you had a rock-solid foundation that was never there in your previous encounters with Candice: job security. And now, after years of taking her crap, it was finally time to pay it forward and then some.
“Oh, you mean like how you prance around ruining other people’s lives just to make yours worthwhile all while you’re stuffing your pudgy little face with Weight Watchers when no one's looking because you can’t handle the truth,” you declared loudly, catching the attention of some passing clients and colleagues who had been eavesdropping on the conversation.
Candice's smile vanished off her powdered face as she felt at least a dozen eyeballs from all directions bearing down on her. Her previously smug expression was replaced with a seething scowl as she caught a few of her colleagues snickering under their breath as they passed by.
“And the truth does hurt, doesn’t it Candy?” you smiled, taking a smug sip out of your latte as she fixed you with a downright murderous expression before regaining her composure.
“Very….funny,” she grated irritably, nearly breaking her pencil in two as her veins threatened to pop.
“You know I’m no comedian, but you would sell out arenas if you ever picked up a mic, Candy. I mean, seeing as how your whole career here is a joke and the closest you’ll ever get to real success is carrying my bags when I walk through the door you could definitely relate. Then again, I guess you and Denise finally have something in common now besides being conniving little bitches,” you grinned, continuing to cut inches through her previously impenetrable skin and hurt her where it counts: her ego.
In that split second, you wished you had a camera so that you could forever document the almost comical image of her passive-aggressively fuming while her face grew redder than a tomato.
With her eyes bulging like eggs and her lips quivering in both anger and embarrassment, it was the ultimate comeuppance to a woman who once made you eat the same public shit and pretend to like it or else suffer the consequences.
And now, you were the consequences.
Straightening up your tie with a pleased and victorious smile painted all over your face, it took all of your self-control not to burst out laughing as her mascara even began to smear off.
With a deep breath, you stated your actual business:

“Oh James…” Candace’s taunting voice, now ripe with triumph and bad intentions, hovered above your bowed head.

Cursing yourself again and again for your monumental lapse of judgment, you remain in your uncharacteristically submission position as the characteristically smug receptionist finally took a few steps back.

She had seen your moment of weakness unfold in this very office, heard your pleading words and whimpers for mercy, and for the past few moments felt your frantic kisses adorning her high heels.

But now, judging by the malevolent glint in her eyes, Candace wanted something else from you.

Something that only you, in your desperate state, could give her.

Her plush crimson lips curled into a playful grin as those oh so delicious words finally oozed out of her mouth. “On your knees.”

Tensing up as the receptionist you had thought beneath you spoke those simple words, you instinctively brought yourself up into a kneeling position.

Barely concealing her delight, she cocked one hip to the side and teased you simply, “You really made this too fucking easy.”

And on that note, she sauntered past you and propped herself up on Denise’s desk, her slender legs now dangling freely out of your periphery.

Within the span of seconds, you went from the king of the kingdom, to being at the mercy of the freakin’ office jester!

Fuck. Fuck, this cannot be happening. This cannot be-

“Eyes over here, Mr. James,” Candace finally called out to you, her voice absolutely dripping with condescension.

Shamefully lifting your gaze up to her cocky visage, you tried to plead your case again. “Candace, I swear, I’ll do anything to make this go away, okay? Just name it, I can-”

She quickly held up a manicured hand, prompting you to stop talking.

“First things first…” Crossing her legs together, she told you with an unflinching certainty in her voice, “You do not get to speak to me unless I tell you to. Believe me, James, you are going to do everything I want, but that will be undisputed from here on out. Am I understood?”

“.....Yes,” you finally forced out, speaking in a meeker voice than usual.

Smirking, she continued on, “Secondly, this stays between us. You go to anyone about this, Kim especially, and I will make you unemployed for the rest of your life. Do you understand me?”

Unable to find the necessary words, you could only nod your head yes.

“Good.” Relaxing a little bit, she finished off her demands, “Last but not least, you do whatever I say. When I say it, without question. Kapeesh?”

Weighing your options, you reluctantly come to a decision and uttered a meek, “Yes.”

Glowering up at her pathetically, you also sense the pure arrogance simply radiated from her gleaming expression.

It was obvious that the shift in power from you to her was quite the overwhelming sensation, especially when juxtaposed to your last interaction together just minutes before.

For her, especially, it must’ve been poetic to see the man who was lording his office promotion over her, now kneeling at her feet and begging to keep the same position.

But for you, somehow inexplicably, it was kind of a turn-on.

Letting out a breath of pure triumph, Candace reached behind her head with one hand and undid her bun, allowing her raven black hair to elegantly cascade down her shoulders, as if signaling her transition from powerless secretary to powerful woman in control.

Biting your lip, you reluctantly nodded.

You sighed. “Yes, I did.”

Candace’s eyes narrowed. “Yes, you did what, James?”

“Yes, I went inside Denise’s office uninvited and smelled her shoes,” you told her shamefully, an even brighter shame of crimson coloring your cheeks.

“Good. I appreciate your honesty.” Putting the phone down, the receptionist sneered down on you, “I’ve got to say, James, you really put yourself in quite the enviable position here. I mean, sniffing Denise’s tennis shoes? What, you couldn’t wait to stalk her home and jack it into one of her socks or whatever it is creeps like you indulge in?”

A defiant growl grew in your throat, almost begging to be unleashed, but looking up at her domineering expression, you knew that saying those very choice, four-lettered words would not bode well for your future.

Hell, they wouldn’t even bode well for your present.

I notice things in people, things that could be used against them. Denise recognized it. Even your little fangirl Jacinta knows what I’m capable of.”

“But as I was saying, I found out pretty quick why he needed to spent considerable time with my feet before his little friend could rise to the occasion. Pretty said, really. But not for me. See, James, I learned something about myself that night,” she told you, forming a coy grin, “I learned that if I could figure out what a man likes, what he absolutely craves, I could make him do whatever I want. Now I will admit to a lucky break walking in on you making an even bigger ass of yourself than normal, but I can work with it.”

You were almost too scared to ask what became of her past lover, but she quickly answered your own question aloud.

“As for Mr. Bigshot, well, let’s just say he had to become quite the foot massage masseur to avoid me telling the other girls just what an utter bitch he was. Fortunately, that’s just one of many roles I envision for you, Jamesy,” she concluded, running her fingers up and down her shapely calf.

“Right now, you’re going to call me Mistress Candice. I only want to hear those two words from your mouth. If I hear anything else, I’m going out that door and telling the entire office what you just told me,” she smiled at you devilishly, brandishing the recording app on her phone before emphasizing, “At maximum volume.”

Forced to make a choice between self-preservation and pride, you looked into her smug eyes, and somehow finding the strength inside, spoke aloud your final decision:
1141121.title: She wants you to be her slave.

11411212.content:
"Fuck...YOU!" You suddenly roared at her, panting and shaking from the effort.

The look on Candice's one was one of surprise however the brunette quickly recovered. Cocking her head, she pulled her iPhone to her mouth. "OK...that will be a good one for the outtakes! Give Jamesy here a chance to have a little bit of fun before he becomes my slave... What the hell!"

Her last few words were full of even more incredulity as you snatched her phone, swiftly deleting the current and previous recording. You were somewhat an expert at this, considering you had the same phone model and been in situations before where you needed to hastily delete a video or photo...Dropping it back on the desk, jumping backwards, Candice grabbed it up, looking practically livid at what you had just done.

"Right, that's it, you ungrateful worm," Candice spat at you, her eyes like daggers. "I am telling EVERYONE! EVERYONE about your dirty little secret! First of all, Kim is going to know that I caught you sniffing Denise's shoe like a fucking pervert..." The brunette swivelled her legs around so she was off Denise's desk in an instant. Promptly kicking off her other shoes, so that she was fully barefoot, she walked slowly towards you, like a lioness towards it prey.

"Candice..." You finally spoke, your heart beating wildly. "I am not going to kiss my career away. Not by you - of all people!" You matched her snarling expression as you stood your ground. Although this was still a perilous situation, you felt almost relieved somehow, relieved that you hadn't just succumbed to the bitchy receptionist.

She stopped moving, hands now on her hips, a disbelieving look about her. "Excuse me...?! You really think you have a choice in this, Jamesy? Ha! It doesn't matter one iota that I've got recordings or not. I know...I know your sick little secret. Just think - now I can end your fucking career rather than just making you my slave!"

"You are NOT telling anybody. ANYBODY about this!" You roared at her, spittle foaming around your mouth. "I am JUNIOR MANAGER, dammit!"

"No, you are a perverted foot freak who is about to lose his job for improper conduct," Candice spoke more calmly, an infuriatingly smug smile on her lips. Tossing back her dark hair so that it hung sexily around her shoulders, she giggled a little. "Ooh, there's an idea. Yes - this is even better! I'm going to end your career, THEN make you my slave anyway! Jamesy, Jamesy..." She spoke in a mock-disappointed way. "You really should have done what I told you, like the good foot bitch you are. That way you could've kept your job, your position..."

Doubt and indecisiveness hit you sharply around the head like a clubbing blow. The bitch was not backing down...had you just made the entire situation worse?!

No, you were the king. She was a mere peasant! This was just a test, a way to strengthen your inner fortitude!

Breathing steadily and forcing a more neutral expression on your face, you shrugged your shoulders at her. She looked visibly pissed at this immediately. A small victory but a victory nonetheless.

"Well, Candy, I guess it's just your word against mine. Of course, Kim is well-aware that you and Denise have had it in for me for years. This slander against my character might not....might not go down as well as you would hope," you spoke calmly, choosing your words carefully.

Practically growling at you, Candice narrowed her eyes. "You're really threatening me?! Jamesy...just bow down...bow down at my feet and accept I've beaten you! I tell you what - just because this little act of defiance is kinda cute - bow down now and kiss the tops of my feet and the original deal will still be on. I won't tell Kim about your foot fetish. You'll still be my slave of course... But, if you don't surrender to me now, then I will make sure that I ruin your whole fucking career. I will use this against you in ways that you couldn't even imagine. Once I destroy your career, then I will force you to become my pathetic, grateful, jobless little slave anyway."

The more she spoke, the more confident and assured she became, as though she was sure that you would bow down before her. "Candice I told you..." You said slowly, your words trailing off as she put her fingers to her lips, shaking her head.

"No, no more words. You choose - walk out of here and watch me ruin your career, then turn you into my slave whether you want it or not....OR, bow down now, kiss my feet..." She spread her crimson-painted toes, causing you to gulp a little. "THEN, you might earn yourself a bit of mercy. Come on, Jamesy, being a good little slave and getting in my good books is all you should be concerned about now..."
11411212.title: "Fuck You!"

choices: Candice pretended to be oblivious about it...what the hell?!

114112121.content:
You could not let her win...not Candice Watson of all people! Although her feet were beautiful, shapely and most likely, delicious, you couldn't surrender like this...

"Good luck with that," you told her, with a sneer. "I'm going to have a little chat with Kim..."

Not waiting to hear her reaction, you hastily darted out of Denise's office, moving swiftly across the corridor until you arrived at the Kim, the big boss's office.

You were her right-hand man, you'd impressed her so much over the past couple of years... Best to get her firmly on your side now before that receptionist bitch starts spreading her poison around...

"James! How is our new Junior Manager?" She grinned at you, offering you one of the comfy leather chairs, one of her eyebrows raising a little as she saw you catching your breath. "Everything OK? I know you need to get your steps in whilst at work, but running around the office..." She jokingly chastised you.

"Hi, er, yeah I need to tell you something Ms Kim..."

"Oh, James, you can call me Kim, now. Considering that we're at a similar managerial level after all," She smiled, surprisingly warmly. Kim was usually tough as nails, yet she did have a warm centre there, somewhere! This was your best chance, confide in her while she was oblivious to Candice's claims and still held you in high regard.

"It's Candice - the receptionist. She's, um..." You paused for a moment, deciding to choose your words carefully. "She's determined to screw up my career.

Kim's eyebrow raised even further. "So what's new?" She chuckled drily. "Oh, James, the number of times that I've heard about your bickering with Candice and Denise. Look, I know that sometimes you clash with people, that you get paranoid and start assuming the worst of people. But, trust me - I know Candice. And Denise for that matter. They are professional and probably just a case of sour grapes...I'm aware and you're aware that Denise was a strong candidate for Junior Manager after all..."

She wasn't listening; you had to cut to the chase here.

"Kim...Candice, she's...threatened to make up rumours about me!" You blurted out, catching the redhead off guard as she stared at you with curiosity. She gestured for you to continue. "She told me that she was going to spread a rumour that I...liked feet." You swallowed thickly, trying to ignore the flicker of a smile on Kim's face. "That I liked sniffing...woman's socks and...shoes..."

Her mouth hanging open slightly, Kim took a few more seconds until she reacted, leaving you on tenterhooks. "Well, James, that's...quite the allegation. Have you done anything, anything at all to add any credence to what she's said?"

"No...no!" You practically shouted, taking a breath to force yourself to be calm. "No, not at all Kim. It's a disgusting lie that she made up and seems hell-bent on using to discredit me and make me seem like the office pervert. There is no truth in it."

Kim reached over to her office phone, tapping a few numbers on it.

"What are you doing?" You asked her, caught off guard by this. "Who are you...?"

"Candice of course," Kim told you, eyes rolling a little as she covered the receiver end for a moment. "I want to clear up this nonsense now. Yes, Candice it's me, Kim. Absolutely, please come here immediately."

Turning back to you, she smiled. "Don't worry, James. I'm glad you came to me about this - we can get it all cleared up."

The next minute or so passes in awkward silence, Kim dangles her red, open-toed heel, which you studiously ignore, focussing instead on a couple of inspirational quotes on the wall. Why did she have to involve the bitch herself? Why couldn't she just have taken your word?

Cursing yourself with making such a hasty, babbling case for yourself, a knock on Kim's door forced you to refocus. Here we go; you would have to lie through your teeth and present a convincing case here...

1141121212.content:
"Please, Candice, take a seat," Kim offered the brunette receptionist, who confidently took a chair next to you, not even giving you a glance. "So...I'm guessing you know what this about?"

"Yes, Ms Kim, I think I have a pretty good idea," Candice responded in a polite, respectful tone. One that was starkly different to the one that you were accustomed to!

"Go ahead," Kim told her firmly. It dawned on you that Kim was doing exactly the right thing here, adopting the body language of a headteacher dealing with two tattle-taling children, there was no way that she was just going to punish Candice and back you fully. It also became clear to you that Candice had the wherewithal to present her case far more coherently than you...

As the brunette began to regale your boss with the details of you on all floors in Denise's office, you feel too stunned to even interject. She comes across as totally plausible, adding subtle details which makes it all the more convincing such as the position of your nose in the tennis shoe, the noises you were making... Wincing at the reminder of you actually kissing Candice's black heels was also cringe-worthy. Candice had twisted this part to suit her story of course - she made it out that you, in desperation for being caught, began kissing her shoes voluntarily with the intention to convince her not to tell anyone. Kim went from looking impassive to actually looking shocked by the end of Candice's account.

"Well...well, thank you Candice..." Kim said, her voice shaking a little as though still taken aback. "James...James...what do you have to say for yourself?"

"It's not true!" You protested. "She's...she's making it up! Honestly, you know how she and Denise want to bring me down...discredit me...they've always had it in for me..."

"Ms Kim, if I may," Candice cut across you, still with a respectful tone of voice. "I have never come to you with a claim about another employee being inappropriate. This is not a case of me wanting to get a colleague in trouble, not at all. Surely you can see that this man is lying? I caught him red-handed...he came to you so that he could get in his story first."

"I didn't," you spat at the brunette, your eyes full of loathing while she tried to suppress a smirk. "You...you've always had it in for me..."

"You see," Candice remarked. "That's his only defence - that he knows we haven't been best pals before. He had his nose buried deep in Denise's tennis trainers, then he kissed my shoes as he hoped it would convince me to stay quiet. Ms Kim, like I said, this is not about vendettas - this is about this man being inappropriate AND lying to you about it now. He obviously has a problem, to be sniffing Denise's shoes..."

"Why would I even go into her office?" You snapped at her. "I didn't go near there...you can't prove..." As soon as you uttered the words, your heart sank at Candice's triumphant expression.

"So you're telling me you didn't even go into her office? Now, we all know there are no security cameras in the offices but there along the corridors..." It must have taken the receptionist a great amount of self-control in not doing a full-on victory dance, so stupid was your mistake. Dammit, this was going even worse than you imagined!

"James," Kim said firmly, a scowl now on her face which made your heart beat faster than ever. "James, you have one chance to 'fess up. Tell me the truth NOW. If I find out that you've been lying, then there will be serious, serious consequences. What do you have to say to me?"

What is it?
