Her behaviour both irritated you and got excited. You were the Junior Manager and she treated it as if it were nothing. She would end up being dangerous if you let her have her way all the time, yet the initial thought of that exhilarated you more than you would hope for.

You were now just in front of Kim's door. You fixed your suit and put a professional smile on as you entered.

"James! Good to see you! How has your day been, I presume the Junior Manager has had a lot to do for his first day!" Kim quickly looked at you entering the room, shifting her gaze from the stash of documents in front of her.
"Hey, Kim, yes you could say I have! I got a couple of clients in two hours and I am almost ready to close them!" You said as you shifted to your Fitbit, realizing that your pulse is normal and you had regained your composure.
"That's great, James. I suppose you have something else to tell me, or else you wouldn't be here." Kim nodded as she was reordering her desk to waste some time.
"Oh yes, there is an intern, her name is Michelle. She is waiting for you next to my office." You said calmly, not making it sound awkward.
"Oh my, I totally forgot! I have had a lot of paperwork to deal with recently so I totally switched off about that. I will be right there." Kim looked a bit stressed, that was unlike her. She was usually amazingly composed when it came to these things.

Is Michelle hiding something?

11422.content:
“Ummm..e-excuse me Mr. Harris,” came a soft-spoken, almost meek voice from the doorway that you recognized instantly.

Jenny.

You lost count of how many conniving little cunts have tried to keep you down over the years, but you could always count on Jenny to watch your back. She was, and will always be your best friend. Through all of the workplace politics and HR bullshit Denise and her lapdog put you through she stood by you through the thick of it.

She looked out for you; you looked out for her. It was no doubt the best decision you ever made bumping into her when you were running late for a meeting. All it took was stain remover on her clothes to finally get her to open up, and everyday since you and her were damn near inseparable.

You two were also an odd couple in how different your personalities and goals were. She was the mild-mannered, meek and courteous receptionist who knew her place and always tried to make friends with everyone whom she worked with. You were the young and hungry novice, always trying to move up while she was satisfied remaining stationery. In the end, your ambition and drive landed you the esteemed position of Junior Manager while she’s remained by her secretarial role.

You’ve told her time and time again that she’s better than that, that she deserves more than constantly being at her superior’s beck and call. But Jenny, ever the humble one, insists that being an office assistant is where she feels more comfortable at. Her “true calling,” she calls it. But that’s just the kind of woman she is.

And more importantly than all that, she was the only woman in this whole damned office who you found attractive.

Well, besides other woman for more...superficial reasons of course. But Jenny was genuine, definitely more likeable than those artificial bimbos in business professional. You always wanted to ask her out for a coffee, maybe see where the conversation goes and if she feels the same.

Fraternization amongst co workers had always been frowned upon by the company, but now with this extra boost of confidence you saw no reason why not.

After all, you’re your own boss now.

Jenny was dressed to impress, as always. Her fashion sense has always been conservative and inoffensive and today was no different.

Wearing a ruffled grey cardigan sweater with a white top and a pencil thin skirt that ended at her knees, her usually flowing red hair was tied in a secretarial bun.

Never one to exaggerate her height or impose her towering presence like some women you knew with high heels, her dainty bare feet were confined in a pair of noticeably tight leopard skin ballet flats with pointed toes.

Your eyes involuntarily wandered for a bit downward toward her petite feet almost popping out of the rather worn footwear, lingering on that for a moment before meeting her friendly gaze.

“Jenny, I told you last week to keep calling me James," you scolded her playfully, "Guess you heard the good news, huh?”

Entering your office with her eyes lit up with slight awe, she eventually stopped behind one of your leather chairs.

“I can’t think of a better guy for the job. You totally deserve it!” she beamed right back at you.

“Not as much I deserve this little bundle of cuteness standing before me!” you grinned coyly, smirking at just how squeamish and adorable her body language was becoming.

“James, stop it! You know we’re not supposed to talking like this in the office,” she finally giggled in her trademark girlish delirium, before closing the door. “You know who might be listening.”

“Who, Denise?” you scoffed, waving your hand dismissively. “She’s probably crying in some cubicle and blowing her nose on Candace’s blouse right now anyways.”

“Yes, well speaking of…” Faltering slightly, she began shifting her feet nervously.

Sighing, you knew what that meant.

“Jenny?” you finally prompted her.

“Well…” Finding solace in your eyes, she reluctantly came clean, “When I was in the break room, earlier this morning, Denise was talking about you and how like, unfair your promotion was. She was...really, really mad. But before you could mad, James, I didn’t mean to snoop or anything.”

“I know you’re not that kind of person, Jenny,” you assured her, before nodding, “What else did you hear?”

“Well….” Choosing her next words very carefully, she locked eyes with you, and proceeded to freeze your heart mid-beat. “She was talking about how she’s going to expose your secret in front of the office.”

Your calming smile quickly vanished right off your face, replaced by a very worrying frown.

Retreating into your own mind, your paranoia instantly shot into overdrive at the mere mention of that word.

Secret? That fucking bitch knows nothing about me. Nothing! But what about that one time-

“No,” you told yourself adamantly, quickly convincing yourself that there was no possible way Denise could know about that.

And even if she did, noone would believe her. Without any proof, without any tangible evidence, it’s just hearsay. And the story of the jealous subordinate trying to get back at the new manager who ‘stole’ her position is one that you could masterfully spin to H.R. should it come to that.

Looking up at her, you scratched your chin in brief contemplation, before asking one last followup just to be sure. “She go into any specifics about what that secret might be, just out of curiosity?”

Jenny gave a halfhearted shrug. “Unfortunately no James. She just kept going on and on about how it’s going to utterly destroy you, and how you’ll be groveling at her feet for this not to come out in public-” You instinctively cringed a little at the mention of Denise’s feet, but held your tongue as she finished, “But besides that, she was sounding like some kind of Saturday morning cartoon villain.”

“Well, she is pretty delusional so that wouldn’t surprise me,” you agreed with her, still wrestling with your suspicions.

Basic instinct told you that Denise did know something (she certainly wouldn't be flaunting it in such a public area if she was just bluffing), but then again, she’s also one of, if not the biggest liars you’ve ever met in your life.

Both ends of the argument wore away at your decision making process like a mental tug-of-war, forcing you to come to a compromise.

“Well, I guess there’s only way to find out if Denise isn’t totally full of crap,” you sighed, voicing your decision out loud to the redhead.

“Um sir?” she nervously stepped to the side as you cracked your knuckles eagerly, a weary yet determined king ready to publicly humiliate his greatest nemesis one last time.

“I’m going to pay Denise a little visit down to her office, and get to the bottom of this once and for all,” you told her matter-of-factly, no hesitation in your voice.

This was your kingdom now, and it’s time that dear ol’ Denise realized that she’s no longer facing off with her equal.

Now, you were the alpha, and she’s about to find out what being on the receiving end of getting royally fucked over feels like.

“You coming?” you offered the still startled woman, walking around your desk.

“If you want me to James, I will but I don’t see why I need-”

Holding up a hand, you pointed out, “Whatever happens in her office, I need a third party to witness it. And if Denise tries to pull something and make me out to be the bad guy, I’m gonna need your eyes and ears wide open. Right?"

Thinking for a moment, Jenny nodded her head in agreement.

“Cool. Let’s go put the big bad witch in her place once and for all!” you smiled at Jenny confidently, leaving the office with the receptionist right on your heels.

"Hello, I am looking for Junior Manager James Harris, can you help me find him?" a slender 5' 5'' young girl appeared to be the one knocking at your door.

She was exceptionally beautiful, as her skin was alluring, candy to the eye. Not to mention that she was definitely in good shape, as she was no more than 110 pounds.

Her clothing consisted of a button-down shirt, brown leather jacket, black knee socks, tight shorts and sneakers. Beautiful, yet something was off, it was definitely not sticking to the dress code of the firm, which caught you off guard.

"You're speaking to him. May I know your name and what did you need of me?" You acted as politely as possible, as you were not sure, who the person opposing to you may be and ruining your chances right off the bat would definitely be a bad start.

"Perfect! My name is Michelle, the new intern-in-training. The manager, Kim, told me to come to pay you a visit. Thanks for having me in the firm." Michelle smiled at you, as she got closer and sat on the chair opposing you and took her sneakers off.

"Likewise, Michelle..." As you were returning the greetings, you were caught off guard by her beautiful feet, which were covered in revealing nylon.

"Anyhow, she told me that I should learn the roots from her right-hand man, so it may look better on my resume, that I have trained under one of the biggest firm's Junior Manager" She explained, having a smirk on her face based on your reaction and even slightly dangled her feet up, for her soles to be fully shown for a split second.

"Well, if that's the case, then I can't decline" You faked a cough as you regained your composure and looked her straight in the eyes. "We can begin tomorrow, as I have a few important clients scheduled for today.

"O-oh... too bad, I was expecting to start learning from the first-hand experience right away" Michelle sighed, as her face shortly after resembled one of a puppy as she continued to dangle her feet even higher than previously.

"W-well, I guess I could show you how I deal with important clients, would you want to stay and wait with me?" Did your voice just crack and stutter? And why did you suggest such an absurd thing without even confirming the small intern's story?

"Really, wonderful! You are the best, Mr James!" She smiled as she rose back to her feet and took the chair next to you, as she sat close to you. "So who is your first client and what is the plan of action to get their signature?"

Despite you not wanting to admit it, Michelle definitely got one on you and made you agree to her query immediately. You had never let your guard down, however, you were entranced by this intern for a short conversation.

Something wasn't exactly right and you knew it.

What was odd, however, was that Michelle wasn't exactly paying attention to the discussing and taking notes. Instead, she was looking both at Stephanie and you during the confrontation and evil yet, elaborate smirk could be seen on her lips from your peripheral sight.

Maybe you were prepared for her?

"This intern is definitely aware of my fetish." You thought to yourself. After all, after adding up everything, she had entered your office and seduced you with simple feet movement to agree on handling this case together. That by itself was an indicator that she wanted to get more out of this situation. And of course, you, the KING of this place would not allow a simple novice to trample over you, even if she had dazzling feet.

After all, you had worked for years to achieve this position and had more complex situations under control. Even your arch-rival Denise, nor her friend Candice had gotten one on you, and arguably they had as good, if not better soles to allure you with during team meetings, mainly the one that announced your promotion.

Taking all of this in consideration you got out of your trance state and got up to shake Stephanie Beachwood's hand. "It was marvellous working with you, madam. If any questions regarding our marketing assistance to spread your brand further arise, make sure to email me to my personal email. I will answer to you personally!" With that, you smiled at her to leave your office. What caught your attention even further was that when you walked her out you saw that your name was not written on the door, just the position.

"Michelle is a sly fox, I should not take her lightly". You thought to yourself as you tightened up your tie and fixed your hair, walking back to your chair.

"That was amazing Mr James! You are definitely the best closer in the city, I am glad to be learning from you. I think I got what you meant by your top 3 fundamentals of selling." Michelle applauded, as she smiled innocently and childlike.

That, however, did not fool you, as you had seen through her act. With that, you handed her over the report for your next client, Samuel Davis, who had the city's highest quality shoes, regardless of the price and was wanting help with expanding with the eCommerce service your firm had to offer. "Our next client is Samuel Davis, I would want you to assist me with taking him to our side, as he would be a key asset to the company."

"Our next client? That's awesome Mr James! I am so glad to be able to work with someone like you on my very first day" Michelle looked rejoiced, as she got even closer, kicking her right foot, which was still barefoot to your knees. That by itself made you a bit weak, however, you knew that she was playing a role and that was but a facade to humiliate you.

As you gave her the report, you texted your secretary, Jacinta, to get more information on Michelle, as soon as possible, while the cunning intern was going through the report. While you waited for her response, you practised your karate meditation technique to focus on your next client and to better control yourself for what was to come.

10 minutes had passed when you heard a knock on the door, indicating that your next client had arrived. Before you could tell, whoever was at the door to come on in, you saw Michelle drop the report below the desk.

"I am so so sorry Mr James! I have such butterfingers..." Michelle looked at you innocently as she bit her nails, worried at how you might react.

"It's okay Michelle, please hand me over the duplicates which are in the second drawer to your left." You responded, with a confident smirk, knowing she had a scheme to make you lose your concentration.

Michelle's face had turned a tad pale, as she was definitely not expecting you to have other hard copies. She then handed you over the reports from the drawer. "Here you go, Mr James. I am sorry for dropping the rest." She spoke, as a satirical remark could be felt in her voice.

"Come on in, Mr Samuel Davis!" With that the door opened, revealing a 6'2'' tall man, who was in good shape, dressed in a suit, which meant business by the very looks of it. As such you entertained the man for the next hour, presenting him with the options your business could offer, both with combined sales with Stephanie's business, alongside other ways of expanding his current business.

The man was impressed by your presentation and by the options you gave him, which after the time you spent pursuing him, he had finally agreed to partner with your firm. Despite the success you had had, that did not mean Michelle did not try to screw you over a couple more times. As she was rubbing her bare foot from your knees to your tights, to wherever would be possible, to not be seen by the businessman in front of her. That caused you to stutter at given times, but you quickly regained focus back to the topic at hand.

"It was a pleasure doing business with you, Mr Davis. If I could help you out with anything else, make sure to contact me on my personal email, I will be glad to assist you, however, I can!" You stood up, proud and confident, smiling back at the man as you exchanged compliments, as he left your office.

With that, you could finally take your break and opened up the window behind you, as you got out the pack of Treasurer cigarettes out of your right pocket. As you were about to lit your cigar, your phone buzzed, indicating that a text from Jacinta, which had all the information you needed about Michelle.

You chuckled to yourself and lit up the cigar as you looked at the window.

What happens now, Junior Manager?

Completely losing track of time, you continued to lick her feminine feet, sadly being interrupted by Michelle lifting them up, as she looked at your foot marked face, which was dirty from all of the lickings.

"Rise and shine, Mr James." Michelle said as she giggled hysterically at your face. Crossing her legs and making you enough room to get up.

You quickly got back to your senses and mumbled. "What... happened? Samuel! What happened to Samuel!" Getting up quickly and cleaning your suit from any visible dirt on it. What surprised you more was that Michelle was sitting in your luxuries office chair.

"Samuel? Oh yes, that guy. He is long gone, in fact, all other 3 clients are already on their way home." Michelle smiled, as she laughed, putting her feet on your lap after you had sat on the neighbouring chair.

"What, how? I was just picking up the papers and I heard Samuel knocking on the door..." You were interrupted by her small feet tending to your jeans, more specifically your bulge, which had formed a wet puddle, from all the time spending with Michelle's feet.

"I know. That's what I was waiting for actually. I saw how you were ogling me when I walked in, as well as Stephanie, more specifically how you ogled our feet." Michelle spoke in an authoritative tone as she took her feet off your lap and put them back into her sneakers. "You know James, my ex was a foot-loving loser like you, that's why it didn't take me much to break you. Before coming to the firm, my Dad, Mr B, handed me a couple of employee pictures, as well as mutual ones. I saw that you were ogling your co-workers' feet, which made me curious. And from how well, you pampered my feet, I'd say I was right"

Michelle's smug expression was wide and clear as day, as she got up and started walking to the door and before leaving turned around to say.

"Also, let me give you a tip. The selling tips are four, not three, Mr Junior Manager. Distract, Dominate, Befuddle and let them ask for more. See you tomorrow, foot boy." Michelle gave you one final devilish smile, as she exited your office.

DAMN IT! DAMN IT! DAMN IT!

1143.content:
“I certainly will,” Candice told you, the venom in her voice absolutely dripping with every word.

Smiling nonetheless, you reminded her cheekily. “You certainly will what, Candy?”

“Mr. James,” she uttered through gritted teeth, as if your very name pained her at her very core.

“You catch on quick, Candy. No wonder you did so well in college.” Cocking a smirk at her visibly fuming expression, you feigned a look of realization, “Oh, wait a minute…”

Grinding her teeth together, you could tell she was itching, just craving one chance to let loose, to tell you exactly what she thinks of you in a mixture of four-letter words and rude hand gestures.

But, you could also tell that she enjoys still having a job.

Calming herself somewhat, she chose her next words very carefully. “Are you done, sir?”

“Nah, I’m just getting started messing with you, Candice. But, knowing how anal Kim can be with tardiness, I’ll leave you alone,” you smiled at her, watching her type furiously into her computer as a way of poorly containing her anger.

Walking around her desk, you flashed her one last playful wink before heading up the spiral staircase.

Feeling rejuvenated with Candice finally humbled, you mentally scratched that accomplishment off your bucket list as you bounded up the steps with a confident spring in your step.

Sauntering down a hallway, you finally reached the left wing, aka where all the important people took up space.

And, at least for now, the Queen of the kingdom.

Stopping at the office door, you patiently tapped your knuckles on the glassy surface and took a few steps back.

Almost immediately, the sound of female voices from inside died down to that of a hushed whimper.

Cocking a smirk, you couldn’t help but think that they were talking about you, and just how great of a worker- no, how great of a human being, you were.

How you singlehandedly rose to the top of the corporate ladder, stepping in anyone who dared oppose you. How you, against all odds, managed to score the second most powerful position in the whole damn office, with Number 1 still to come in the not so distant future.

Giving yourself a mental pat on the back, you were absolutely beaming with joy as the sounds of clicking heels approached from the other side. “Hail to the King, baby! Hail to the freaking’-”

As if on cue, the door opened, bringing you came face-to-face with the Devil herself.

Denise.

That same smug face that you had hated for years was now staring you down, naturally followed by one of the best bodies neck down you’ve ever laid eyes on.

A blonde bombshell with curves in all the right spots, Denise wore her usual white blouse and pencil-thin skirt, followed by a pair of expensive-looking pumps.

Keeping your cool, you crossed your arms as the blonde woman stepped out of the doorway while still maintaining eye contact.

“James,” she finally said curtly, the tension between you two almost palpable.

“I think you forgot to add the ‘Mr.’ in there,” you replied with a slight smirk.

“For now,” she said in response, before turning on her heel and strutting down the hallway.

“Enter,” came the mature yet sharp voice of Kim.

Shooting your nemesis one last scrutinizing glare as she rounded the corner, you put the swagger back in your smile and went inside.

Kim’s office space was extremely clean and tidy, much like the woman herself.

Plopping down on a rolling chair, you looked on as the redhead swiveled around on her own chair to face you.

Wearing an all-black business suit that perfectly showed off her mature yet very attractive figure, she minimized a spreadsheet document on her desktop computer before giving you her undivided attention.

“You wanted to see me, boss?” you smiled brightly.

“Yes, I did. Firstly, how have you been enjoying your new position, James?” she spoke, her tone strictly professional as always.

Grinning like a goof, you could hardly contain your excitement. “I am loving my promotion, Ms.-”

“You can call me Kim now, James. I figured that since we’ll be operating at around the same managerial level, there really is no need for such formalities,” she informed you with the slightest hint of a smile.

Shrugging nonetheless, you continued on, “I am thrilled beyond belief to be given this opportunity to become an even bigger asset to the firm. And I am especially grateful that you saw true potential in me, with credit obviously due to my equally as capable colleagues.”

“I don’t reward potential, James; I reward effort and results. Both of which you have given me time and time again. I only figured it would be more beneficial to the company to give you a more authoritative position to continue doing what you do and eventually, teaching other members of our office how to become more efficient in this line of work,” she told you somewhat glowingly, though you could never tell with her slightly impassive voice.

Nodding in appreciation, you reluctantly decided to cut to the chase. “Not that I’m not appreciating your very kind words, but I believe you sent me an email about my first official assignment as the Junior Manager.”

“Yes, of course.” Reaching down into her desk, she pulled out a folder and slid them over to you. “In about two hours, I was scheduled to have an appointment with a client: Sara Steele. Just a simple consultation about our services, really. Unfortunately, I will not be able to make that meeting.”

“Oh?” You raised an intrigued eyebrow.

“Let’s just say, I have personal matters to attend to at noontime today, and its very nature requires that I attend to it in person. So, as my now right-hand man, I believe that obligation would fall to you,” she explained to you.

Your smile only grew wider. Hell yes.

“I would be happy to do this for you, Kim. Just tell me where, and I’ll be there,” you grinned, a surge of confidence flowing through you like adrenaline.

“I knew you were the right man for the job,” she smiled, gesturing at the folder. “If you would, take a quick peek.”

Picking up the folder, you quickly looked inside and scanned the contents: mainly just info packets about what the firm does that you’ve practically committed to memory by this point as well as some notes on Sara Steele’s financial troubles.

“Again, this is just a consultation. I want you to tell her exactly what this firm is about, and why it would be most advantageous for her current situation. She doesn’t have to make a decision today, but it should at least be on her mind going forwards.”

“Will do, boss,” you chirped at her happily, playing the noble knight all too willing to carry out his queen’s commands.

For the moment, at least.

Her warm smile, at least for a second, seemed to break her stoic exterior. “Good. Now, there’s just one last thing I need to tell you…”

Knock Knock!

“Right on time,” she grinned, calling out to the unknown visitor, “Come in, please!”

A pair of slapping sounds from the ground pricked your usually sharp ears.

Looking up, you saw a petite, college-age girl strut in.

A natural brunette, she couldn’t have been a few inches above five feet.

Wearing a floral sundress that perfectly captured her youthful curves, her hair cascaded down her slim shoulders in wavy curls.

A quick flicker up her chest confirmed she definitely had some good genes, especially on her mother’s side, but naturally your eyes drifted downwards…

Trailing down her slender legs, your eyes feasted upon her quite dainty bare feet, accentuated by a rather cute pair of brown thong sandals.

Contrasting the silver strap on each shoe, her toes absolutely sparkled with bright pink nail polish on each digit.

Of course, you didn’t have much time to fully admire her pedicure as Kim rather loudly cleared her throat.

“James, this is Michelle, our new intern. She’s just starting out with us today,” the redhead beamed.

Offering your hand, you switched on Mr. Benevolent King, at least for now. “Pleased to meet you, Michelle.”

Shaking it with an almost dismissive smugness, she replied back very snobbishly, “I’m sure.”

“I was hoping that, as you were giving Ms. Steele the consultation, Michelle could sit in with you. Strictly to watch and observe,” Kim told you.

“I’d be okay with it,” you smiled, before adding with a sly smirk, “As long as Michelle can take notes the whole time. Just to make sure she gets the full benefit from my performance.”

You could almost sense Michelle’s irritable glare burning a hole in the back of your head, but quite frankly you didn’t care.

“Excellent suggestion, James. You’re thinking like a manager already,” Kim complimented you, before turning back to the computer. “For the moment, why don’t you give Michelle a tour around the office? Maybe even show her your brand new office?”

Thinking for a moment, you looked up at her somewhat bratty expression before saying:

(Note: Feel free to continue on where I left off.)

121.content:
Life is good... Damn good!! It took you 10 long hard years but you have managed to successfully climb the corporate ladder in your office and now you're the junior manager at the Office. You had an amazing pay packet, a group of girls that you managed and controlled and your bank account looked so good that you honestly believed that you were set for life. Nothing could go wrong from here!

A huge part of your success was due to the senior manager at the Office, the one man who out ranked you! Jim Richards was his name, and despite the fact that you thought he was a bit of a dickhead you had spent your last 10 years kissing his ass and becoming his friend... And it had paid off well. However, today was the day that all of your hard work would REALLY pay off. Jim announced last month that he was retiring and that somebody would be taking his place as the senior manager. You knew that he had lined you up for the position, it was a certainty! And everybody believed it... Everybody except Denise...

Denise is the bitch of the office in your eyes, and she really has it in for you... In fact, you actually started at the office at the same time as her and had a massive war over the position of junior manager, a war that needless to say, you won. If Denise had her way, your only job in the office would be as her foot stool, and she would make you pay her to have that position! Which would suck because the one thing you hate more than Denise is feet!

She was intent on scoring the senior manager position, and this is your biggest fear. God knows what she would do if she had power over you... But it seems God won't be the only one who knows what she would do, as you hop out of your car and see Denise in the parking lot of the office.

"Well good morning my minion," you say, rubbing in the fact that you are her boss.

"Don't get used to being above me Rob, soon you will be dethroned by me and you will be kissing my feet, begging me to keep your job!" She says to you.

You hold your ground for a second, unsure of what to say... She mentioned kissing her feet, she can't possibly know your secret fear... Could she? You suddenly realise that you've been pausing for about 5 seconds now, you need to speak before she realises that she had said something that has stumped you...

"Well... You may think you have the senior management position... That you want... But you're wrong... The day I kiss your feet, I will give you my monthly pay check!" You stutter out poorly.

"Oh is that so? Well, Rob, Mark my words... You WILL kiss my feet. It is now my top priority, I will have you under my feet, I will have your paycheck and you will be my slave!" She says with a scary confidence. You are paralysed with fear as you see her foot move... She has removed a shoe and is lifting her foot to you... "Of course, if your scared to fight me, you can always get down on your knees and crawl under my feet now and start kissing Rob..... What do you say?"

Your frozen with fear and you don't know what to say... You've just started something you really didn't want to start... You've dug a whole, and your afraid of digging deeper, so you turn and walk away quickly. Denise just starts to laugh...

"Hahaha, oh my God, you have a weakness for feet don't you?? Hahahaha!" She tells to you... You speed off to the Office, you have to get away from her!

As you get into the office, you sit at your desk for 10 minutes and collect yourself... It's ok, it will be fine... You're junior manager, remember? She can't get you! But what if she wins? No, she can't win, and she won't... But if she does? This is bad... There's no other way of looking at it... What the hell did you say that for??

You check your watch and realise you're going to be late for Jim Richard's big meeting... You get up and quickly walk over to the conference room for Jim's big announcement, this is it!! Senior management, here you come!

121132.content:
The hate and animosity you feel towards this woman is virtually spilling over, to the point that you're about to completely blow your top off!

Yet somehow you manage to take a deep breath and look her directly in the eye. "Denise...ma'am,' you add with as much sarcasm as you will dare, "I am never going to kiss your feet. Not in a million years! You can cut my pay if that makes you feel like a real manager - I don't give a shit. I'm going to find an office, which can utilise my not inconsiderable skill set..."

You pause for breath, some pride returning to you at the surprised expression on your nemesis' face. "But until I do, I'd rather work for half the money than go near your disgusting feet! I'm telling you now, you will never, ever see me degrade and debase myself by kissing yours or anyone at this office's feet!"

Breathing heavily, adrenaline pumping through you, you feel like the Rob of old: before this morning's shocking announcement took place. However, you feel a little alarmed by the condescending sneer now planted on Denise's admittedly pretty face.

"Oh really? We'll see about that, loser. In the mean time, your pay is cut by half. Ha - I have an extra few thousand dollars a month, just because you're too proud to suck it up and kiss my feet. Your choice! Now get the hell out of my office!" She says venomously, her manicured nail pointing at the door.

Knowing better than to risk antagonising her further, you make do with the hand you've been dealt. Half the pay is an absolute slap in the face, a complete insult. But you can get a promotion elsewhere: you've networked enough to know people in various places. You consider telling someone from the board of directors about Denise's outrageous decision, but you brush it aside immediately. You know how this works: she'll plead ignorance and find a way of making your life even more miserable if she knows you've ratted on her. Plus, any actual, concrete evidence is needed for you to get a generous severance package, should you have to leave sooner than your notice period runs out! Maybe you can stick this out longer, get some real dirt on her, then really screw up her career leaving you to take over as the Senior Manager!

Trying your best to focus your mind away from your evil new boss, you head over to reception, relieved to see that your friend Jenny is there, without that catty Candice anywhere in sight.

"Hey Rob," she smiles sympathetically at you. "How did it go in there with Denise? Candice told me you were meeting with her."

You snort. "Yeah - great meeting!" You're about to continue to relay what happened in hushed tones, when a bing emits from the redhead's computer. You pause, knowing she's hopeless at multi-tasking. No point in even trying to talk to her while she reads that email!

"Uh, sorry Rob, Denise wants to have a meeting. I'll be back in a few minutes. Do you mind keeping an eye on reception?" For anyone else you wouldn't bother, but Jenny has been a kind, loyal friend and ally to you.

"Sure," you smile as she hurriedly makes her way towards the office that you stormed angrily out of just a minute or two ago.

From your position at reception, you see the female staff flocking over to Denise's meeting room. Yet none of the men are. This strikes you as odd, but you don't dwell on it. Several minutes pass uneventfully until you see the door open and the women of the office exit, a mixture of different expressions on their faces.

Jenny walks towards you, a troubled look about her. "What was it? You're not fired are you?" You laugh, trying to break the tension. "No, I mean, you're not really fired are you?" Surely Denise wouldn't be that much of a bitch on her first day!

As the redhead swaps positions with you, her eyes seem to be avoiding contact with yours.

"Come on, what is it? You can tell me," you press her gently.

Jenny looks up, her pretty hazel eyes full of concern. She opens her mouth to speak but closes it again, checking to see who else might be nearby to listen in. What does she tell you?

"Oh really. Whatever, I'm surprised the greedy butch isn't just keeping the money to herself. So which stupid bimbo is she giving my money away to? Let me guess, her best friend Candice? Or that new girl Michelle?" you reply half jokingly.

"Ummm... Nobody yet Rob... She said the first female employee that can make you kiss their bare feet and show her photo or video proof that you have kissed their feet will get your salary cut added onto their pay."

"W... What???" you reply, stuttering... This is bad... Really bad... If any girl makes you kiss their feet AND had photographic evidence of it happening, Denise could blackmail you into making sure you never get another job... You'd be stuck here forever, probably kissing HER feet. Silence grabs a hold of you as you begin playing scenarios in your head... All the women that would want that pay rise... All the women that would want to make you kiss their feet... Candice, Helena... Even the new girl Michelle would probably want a crack at you! The silence is broken by Jenny...

"... Ummm... Rob... Can I ask you...... "
1211321.title: The Dilemma

choices: You agree to kiss her feet, but ask to keep the money for yourself!
Agree to kiss her feet - offer to split the money 50-50 between you!
This is ridiculous! You are not kissing her feet, nor anyone else's!
12113211.content:
An uneasy feeling begins to build inside of you as Jenny chews her lips and grimaces a little, as if in sympathy.

"Ask you what, Jenny?" You enquire, fearing the worst. Surely she couldn't be asking you...no, she wouldn't do that?

"Would you kiss my feet please? Better me than anybody else right?" She asks you, more bluntly than she probably intended.

You stare at her open-mouthed. Not Jenny: your closest, most loyal friend in the entire office. If she were prepared to get in on Denise's little game...

"I mean, c'mon," The cute redhead asks you, tugging a little on her soft grey cardigan. "Knowing Denise, she'll get her way - wouldn't it be better if it were my feet you were kissing, than someone else's. Like Candice...?"

The mention of that vicious harpy's name makes you shiver involuntarily. Jenny does have a point, but you simply cannot believe that she is not being more supportive than this. The mention of Denise always getting her way does not help matters either!

"Jenny," you begin, keeping your voice as deliberately low and calm as possible. "I'm not kissing anyone's feet: not Denise's, not Candice's, not yours. Did your new bitch of a boss tell you that I could keep full pay if I kissed her feet? No way was I kissing her feet! So I'm sorry, it's not even an option!"

You gather your breath, aware that your voice has risen to a slight crescendo. In the corner of your eye, you see a couple of ladies looking over suspiciously in your direction. A slight giggle in the background does not alleviate your paranoia one bit! Leaning forward urgently so that only Jenny could possibly hear you, you continue...

"Look, if I had to choose someone here to get the sixty-odd thousand of my salary, of course it would be you. But I'm fully intending of leaving here as soon as I can: once I've served out my notice period-"

"Um, good luck with that," Jenny tells you apologetically. "Apparently, the first thing Denise did when becoming boss was to make sure to tweak the get-out clauses of all staff's contracts: they need a VERY good reason to leave without serving at least three months' notice..."

What a bitch! Seething, you manage to regain your composure: it wouldn't be fair to take it out on your friend after all. "Let's just say that my holiday and sick days may all be happening within the next couple of months..."

A shake of Jenny's head, her curly red hair flicking from side to side, makes you trail off. "There will be no holiday period or sick days for anyone, unless they can commit to at LEAST another year's contract from now."

You had to grudgingly hand it to Denise: she really had thought of everything. Three months of every woman in this office doing their utmost to make you kiss their feet; if it had been their breasts or pussy, this wouldn't be such a bad deal! But their feet...!

Jenny uses your silence to continue talking. "So, like I said - better me than anyone else, right? Look, we can do it right now: under the reception desk - get it over with and all?"

You stare at her, unsure of what to say. A small, but burgeoning amount of self-doubt is creeping in: the odds of surviving three long months without Denise succeeding are not great. Jenny getting your money would certainly be better than anyone else getting it - maybe you could split it between you! Or you could ask for it all back - she was your friend after all! Clearing your throat, you make your decision....
12113211.title: Jenny's Foot Request!

choices: Apologise: you need Jenny as an ally!
Screw her - she shouldn't have suggested for you to kiss her feet! Walk away!
Someone else comes over: they heard what you said to Jenny...
121132113.content:
Thoughts of pressing your lips against disgusting bare feet are too much for you. Shaking your head firmly, you lean back and fold your arms.

"Sorry, Jenny. Not gonna happen," You tell her.

"Come on, Rob. It will only take a minute then all this will be ov-"

"No it won't be over. If Denise has photographic evidence of me kissing any woman from this office's feet, then I will be screwed. Permanently! You think that she'll just give you a nice pay day and let me have my normal salary restored? Or that she'll write me a glowing reference if I move elsewhere? Are you that fucking stupid?" You find your temper rising here, yet you don't feel guilty: Jenny is supposed to be your friend. Is she so naive and stupid to think that kissing her feet would make things OK for you?

She grabs her shoulder and looks very uncomfortable at your words. "No need to be a jerk - I was only-"

"Being an idiot. That's what you were doing," You interrupt her again. "Now have you got anything else useful to suggest. Oh, why I don't start offering all the women in the office to let me kiss my feet? Maybe I should beg to be Denise's personal footstool and serve her like a bitch for the rest of my working life. Is that what you were gonna say?"

This time Jenny narrows her chocolate brown eyes at you. "Forget it. You know, Rob - I might be one of the only real friends you've got in this office. You'd be wise to remember that."

You don't care at this point. The stupid ditz was supposed to support you, supposed to help you. Then again, she may well be the only person you can trust, the only person who will be completely straight with you.

Do you apologise for your harsh words and try to salvage this friendship or walk away and take your chances?
121132113.title: No Way!

choices: It's the best offer you're going to get - accept!
You can't just give up your money, even for your friend. Refuse!
1211321131.content:
A wave of shame washes over you - what the hell are you thinking?! Jenny has always been such a loyal, trustworthy friend to you over the last few years. Why shouldn't she make a perfectly valid suggestion? Even if you don't agree with it, there's no excuse for you to be a complete tool about it!

"Jenny, I'm sorry. Please, don't take what I said personally. I just can't believe that Denise has done this: this offer of hers... it's making me say stupid things. Unfair things. I didn't mean it, honestly."

The redhead receptionist stares at you impassively, her arms folded. "You're right, Rob. You were completely unfair. I was only making a suggestion to you. Who would you rather got the money anyway?"

She still doesn't seem to get it: she's assuming that you are going to be beaten, forced to kiss horrible bare feet whether you want to or not. Yet you suck it up, for the sake of your friendship you know that it'd be foolish to antagonise her.

"Yeah. I am definitely not kissing Candice's feet. Not if you paid me!" You grin at her, which she slightly reluctantly returns.

"So, as I was saying before," she continues, apparently content to move on. "If you kissed my feet, really quickly, you wouldn't have to worry about Candice or anyone else. You'd only have to put your lips on them for like a second! We could even share the money if you want?"

Your ears prick up at that last part. "Share my money?" You ask her testily.

"Yeah - we could split it 50:50. It's obvious that you don't want to do this. I get it - kissing someone's feet - gross and all. If you do it right now, under my desk so no one else will even notice or interrupt us, I promise that I will give you half of the money."

"Jenny, can't you...you know, let me have...all of my money...?" You say hesitantly, not expecting to hear a positive reaction. Still it's worth a try.

She smiles at you. "I knew you'd ask me that. I know it's unfair you having to have your pay reduced. But if I'm really honest Rob, I could so do with that money. I'm behind on credit card payments, bills are mounting up...being a receptionist doesn't exactly pay well, you know."

"OK, true," you say reasonably. "But you're my friend....surely that means you wouldn't just... take my money...?"

She sighs. "That's the best I can do, Rob. I'm learning to be more ruthless - otherwise I'm going to spend my whole life being trampled on. This is a real opportunity for me; half of that money would make such a big difference. SUCH a big difference. Can you honestly say it would for you?"

Your friend has a point. She could really use the cash more than you actually need it. Still, there's this horrible feeling that you're being taken advantage of, by your ally, your confidant of all people. Despite all that, you feel a grudging respect building for her: she is not budging and her toughness and shrewdness about the situation has to be admired really.

"So there you have it: we'll settle at a 50-50 split if you kiss my feet right now. What do you say?" She looks at you hopefully while you mull it over...
1211321131.title: Apologising To Jenny

choices: Jenny sits down and starts taking off her shoes.
Jenny is paged to Denise's office before she can sit down.
Somebody approaches Jenny and starts talking to her.
12113211311.content:
The way the morning has gone so far, you are truly afraid of what will happen next... So Jenny's offer to simply kiss her feet and be done with it is extremely tempting... Too tempting in fact. Especially considering you won't lose half of your pay, you'll only lose a quarter of it.

"OK Jenny, I'll take your offer and kiss your feet" you say with a sad and disgusted look on your face. Jenny smiles and looks you in the eyes.

"Rob, trust me, this is a great decision. I know you think you could simply keep fighting and never kiss anybody's feet, but do you seriously think Denise would let you win? We do this quickly and it will all be over, ok?" Jenny says in an attempt to comfort you.

The way Jenny speaks, it's as if she is the one doing YOU a favour by making you kiss her feet and taking half of your money. It's almost as if she is expecting you to thank her or something! But you swallow your pride and nod your head. After all, she is right. Denise will never allow you to avoid doing this eventually. This is by far the easiest and cheapest way out.

"OK Rob, get down and crawl under my desk" Jenny says, motioning you toward the opening of her desk.

"Wh... What? Why under there?" You ask her.

"Did you want everybody else to see this too?" Jenny says with a serious look on her face.

Knowing she's right you walk over to her desk and quickly drop to your knees and go under her desk. You can now only see her feet in her high heel shoes. If it weren't for the fact that you absolutely hated feet, hers would certainly be attractive. She had very smooth creamy skin and an obvious arch that was accentuated by her heels. You shake your head, what the hell are you doing?? You sigh, thinking of what's to come...
12113211311.title: It's the best offer you're going to get...

choices: She lets you back up - the picture will do!
She isn't happy with the picture: she wants to take more photos at various angles!
121132113111.content:
A shuffling sound makes you feel even more uncertain about the situation you have found yourself in. Wiggling her high heels, which are just in front of you on the ground, one of Jenny's bare feet becomes fully revealed. Staring at it in resignation, you still can't believe you're agreeing to this. Still, like Jenny reasoned with you before, it is a better outcome than someone like Candice forcing you to do this...

Jenny crouches down a little as she slides her bare foot forwards, so that it is directly on the carpet in front of you. Smiling apologetically, she reaches for her phone and aims the camera lens at you.

"Don't worry Rob," she whispers gently, almost soothingly. "It will be over soon."

Part of you wants to get the hell out of here. A slightly damp, leathery aroma begins to meet your nostrils; Jenny evidently takes good care of her feet, but there's no denying that there's a funky smell in the air. Plus, it's feet. Are you really gonna go through with this?

Jenny flexes her toes slightly, the red varnish glimmering slightly in the restricted light, such is your position under her desk. She taps her foot, this time a tad impatiently.

"Rob, just kneel down and kiss my foot..."

This is it: the moment you've been dreading ever since you agreed to her deal. Feeling like a complete loser, you bow downwards, so that your face is just a few centimetres from the top of Jenny's smooth, creamy foot. Slowly, gradually you move further downwards until your lips are virtually pressed against her foot.

"Will that do?" You murmur, clear enough for her to hear you, but still in hushed tones. Hopefully, she won't make you have your lips actually touching her foot...

"Best to do it properly, just to be safe," she mutters back. "Come on - just kiss my foot - you're nearly there..."

Knowing that you simply can't avoid it, you sigh in resignation as you reluctantly press your mouth against her foot, droplets of moisture immediately tracing over your lips.

"Hang on...just hold it there," Jenny says while you wait in the most awkward position you can ever remember being in.

"C'mmm omm!" You breathe your voice muffled by the top of her foot. Even saying just this forces you to taste a definite salty flavour in your mouth.

It seems like an eternity until you sense a flashing light blink above you. Finally! Moving your head up, you nearly bang it against the underside of her desk, such is your desperation to extricate yourself from this position!

"Just wait a sec..." Jenny murmurs down to you, her voice doubtful and uncertain. What could be taking so long?!

"The quality's not great," she says, keeping her voice low but sounding clearly frustrated. "Don't know if that will do!"

She extends her phone under the desk to you so that you can get a clear view of her screen. To be fair, the image is so dark and blurry that it wouldn't be crystal clear that it is you kissing a foot...

"Please, Jenny. Please - not again!" You plead up at her, fearing that she is about to ask you to do it again...!
121132113111.title: One Shoe Off: Time To Kiss!

choices: "Jenny, you're fired!"
I'm going to need to take the pictures myself... Rob, kiss her feet again."
"Jenny, you only win if Rob agrees to be your office foot slave permanently!"
1211321131111.content:
"Please Jenny, no more foot kissing. You've got the picture, it's over" you say, putting your foot down. Jenny looks down at you deep in thought.

"Rob, we should take more pictures. I mean, what if Denise doesn't believe it's you?" Jenny tells to you. You knew she would say something like that... It seems like a small part of her actually enjoyed making her friend kiss her bare feet! But luckily for you, you had an idea to avoid this.

"Then I'll come with you to Denise and I'll confirm that it is actually me" you say, as the smile fades slightly from Jenny's lips.

She continues looking down at you, as if trying to think of another excuse to make you kiss her feet again. However she seems to be all out of ideas.

"Alright fine, let's go see Denise now then" she says, moving back so that you can crawl out from under her desk.

"What? You want to go now?" You ask as you crawl out and stand up.

"Well yeah, why wait? Or do you want other women trying to make you kiss their feet?" Jenny replied. She's got you this time. Now you're the one looking at her thinking of any reason not to go and see Denise right now. But none come to mind.

"Fine then, let's go. After you" you say, allowing Jenny to walk ahead of you. Jenny starts walking without even bothering to put her shoes on. It seems strange to you at first, but you shrug it off and follow Jenny.

The walk to Denise's office seems to take forever. Thoughts of the degrading act you just performed full your mind, and watching Jenny's bare feet walking in front of you only serve as a reminder of the fact that you didn't just kiss her feet... You tested you lips on them for a good 5 seconds so she could get her photo! Yet still the picture was blurred. Did Jenny do it on purpose so she could make you kiss her feet again?? Before you can give this theory any more thought, you and Jenny arrive at Denise's office. Jenny knocks on the door.

"Enter" Denise calls out. Jenny leads the way in.

"Ahhhh Jenny and Rob. To what do I owe this visit? Come to beg that I reconsider the little offer I have given the women of the office?" Denise says with an evil smile.

"Actually..." Jenny begins, as she places her phone on the table. "I've come to claim my reward!"

"What??" Denise says with shock. She snatches up the phone and looks carefully at the photo... "This isn't exactly a clear photo..."

"... Which is why I am here" you interrupt her. "I am here to confirm that it is me, I kissed Jenny's feet, so she wins and this little game is over!"

"Admitting it? Well well, if I didn't know any better, I would say you two were working together on this one. Cut a little deal perhaps?? You know, that's cheating..." Denise says... This isn't good... "Plus I wanted that photo for more than just proof, I wanted that picture framed and hung up all over the office!"

You cringe at the thought... She really does want to break you!

"Well, I can only think of one option here..." Denise begins...
1211321131111.title: She lets you back up - the picture will do!

choices: She won't fire Jenny on one condition....
Denise is bored of Jenny - she kicks her fired ass out of her office!
Something else...
12113211311111.content:
A look of excited maliciousness flashing in Denise's eyes, she points a finger directly at the redhead receptionist.

"You're fired!" She proclaims with triumph.

Both you and Jenny exchange horrified expressions at one another. "Wh-what?" She says, completely gobsmacked.

"You heard me, you conniving little piece of work - take your cardigan and get the hell out of my office!" Denise looks imperious as she sits at her desk; you can't help but feel cowed by her natural affection for displaying authority.

"B-but. I haven't done anything! All I did was show you the photo. You can't-"

"I can't! Ha! If you think I'm gonna buy your little story - getting this complete loser to actually admit he kissed your feet - while you pretend to be this all-decent, all-righteous little idiot...! I knew you were lying to me the second you walked in here! At least have the self-dignity to admit it!" She smirks at your friend, her arms folded.

"There's no way-"

"There's every way, sweetheart," Denise cuts Jenny off again commandingly. "Such is my new contract as the Senior Manager that I can fire any of my employees for "general misconduct". And what you've tried to do certainly comes under that category! I don't even have to explain why - just tick a box and it'll all be done and dusted: no pay with immediate effect for someone as lowly as a stupid little receptionist!"

"OK, OK...! Please Denise, please don't fire me!" Jenny says, her voice cracking. It's clear that her brutal firing has left her in a desperate state. "Just please don't fire me....I really need this job!"

Watching Jenny's pride evaporate away like this makes you seethe with anger. Denise knows full well what this is doing to you: she knows that this is your closest friend at the office. Unfortunately, Denise's bullshit detector was also working well when you and Jenny tried to play her.

The redhead looks desperately at you after Denise fixes her with a look of disdain. What are you supposed to do? You clear your throat to reason with Denise - immediately a smirk is etched back on to her admittedly pretty face when you begin speaking.

"Come on, Denise. This isn't fair. You can't fire someone for this. It'll never go through with the board," you say confidently, hoping that your boss will back down.

It has the opposite effect however. "Ooh, and here's the little bitch's knight in shining armour....so brave, so strong!" She says her words dripping with scorn.

"I'm just saying..." Your voice trails off as she laughs at you.

"You really think that anything you say is going to help your little friend? The board won't give a shit if I fire this idiot. Shut the hell up before I make things worse!"

Worse? How can they be any worse?! You can't help but think grimly to herself.

"Please..." Jenny says, doing her best to refrain from crying as she gives you a warning glare as if to say 'don't make things worse!'. "Please, Denise - I'm sorry. Please just don't fire me...."

Denise watches you both with satisfaction: she clearly loves holding so much power over you. A malevolent expression on her face, she stands up to face you both directly before speaking again...

Denise gives Jenny a choice: she has to make you into a foot bitch or be fired!

"Please, anything, Denise - anything!" Jenny says, her voice choking as she's losing even more control of the situation.

Denise, clearly enjoying herself, stands in front of the pair of you. She looks across at you challengingly.

"You hear that, your pathetic little pal here says she'll do anything. Would you do anything, Rob? Anything Rob so I change my mind and let her keep her job?"

"Well, er...I mean..." You scratch your head and shrug your shoulders. Noticing Jenny give you a quizzical sideways glance, you give a non-committal grunt, hoping to indicate that you could help, if needed. Obviously it all depends on what Denise has in mind...

A nasty feeling begins to build inside of you; this can't be good! The last time you were in Denise's office, you negotiated so poorly that you actually had to accept half of your salary, just so you could avoid kissing her feet. Her nasty, evil feet! As if on cue, Denise points down to one of her open toed high heels, making you glance down warily and reluctantly at it.

Let's just get this over with so every party is satisfied: Jenny keeps her job, I get the proper respect from you that you've owed me for years, and you get to play the hero. Well, maybe not a hero: maybe more like a worm who has managed to avoid getting stomped on and instead just gets lightly crushed." Denise laughs gently, as she looks smugly at you.

That damn smug expression nearly causes you to go into autopilot and call her every name under the sun. Yet you manage to keep your composure, for Jenny's sake as well as yours...

"Please, Rob. Just kiss her foot - come on: you have to do this for me!" Jenny tugs your arm, her grip surprisingly strong considering that she's pretty petite. "Just do this for me - you can't....you can't just let her fire me like this!"

You look rather helplessly at her. "Jenny, I...I..." Your voice trails off as you notice Denise reveal a bare foot as it slips out of her shoe. Again, like Jenny's, you have to admit that her foot is by no means unattractive. However it's a bare, nasty foot. And not just anyone's: it's that of your worst enemy!

"Yeah, come on, Rob," Denise says in a mock-dramatic tone, a smirk plastered all over her face. "Help your friend: do the right thing!"

Looking between Jenny and Denise, then down to the bare foot on the ground, you know that this is a situation you could never have envisaged being in, not until today at least! Kissing Denise's foot....the very thought of it nearly makes you throw up in your mouth! But if this is the only chance of saving Jenny's job, will you suck it up and do it?

"Fine then." You get on your knees in front of Denise as she lifts her sole in front of your face. You start to lean in before she stops you.

I want you to cradle my foot like you would hold a lover's head during a kiss, then I want you to pull it into a deep kiss, maybe give it some tongue." You taste the saltiness of her footsweat not just on your tongue, but wiping off on your face as she presses her foot in closer. You hope this is over soon pr you might just gag.

12113211311111112211.content:
"Hello Rob." You find Jacinta standing there, with her shoes already off.

"Jacinta? What are you doing here? Where's Jenny?"

"Jenny? Now where on my letter did I say Jenny would be here? I remember signing it with a J, but not Jenny." Crap you took the bait.

"So what do you want Jacinta?" She saunters over to the door and closes it.

"Isn't it obvious? I want to win that contest and have you as my personal servant." You knew she had a crush on you, but to go this far?!

"Why would I possibly agree to that?" You try to stay in control of this.

"Because I'm your best option. Denise, Candice, and Helena all hate you, so they wouldn't stop until you're completely destroyed on an emotional and maybe even physical level. That new girl Michelle looks like the type that would love to make you her work mule, and Kim is a complete wild card in it all. Meanwhile, since Jenny is out of the contest, I'm your only ally left that can help. I'll treat you nice, I might even have you 'help' me on those lonely nights. So what do you say Rob, wanna just kiss my feet now and get the best possible outcome of this deal?"

You can't believe this. Now both your friends have tried to get you to kiss their feet for their own gain. You were half tempted to just walk out now and tell Jacinta to go fuck herself. But she was right, if you declined her, you had to survive three months with a target on your back. You remember all the looks you got after the new deal was announced, you might not make it that long with the whole office out for you. Maybe you should just take her deal. She was right about her being the one that would treat you best.

She had a good point. Without Jenny, she was the only one that liked you enough to not try and break you like the others. She might just be you only hope now.

"Fine Jacinta, I'll do it." She takes a seat in the corner and raises her foot to you while pulling out her phone.

"Pucker up then Rob." You do as she says and lean down to kiss her foot, planting yours lips on the top. This is the third foot you've had to kiss today and it hasn't gotten any easier. "Good, now hold it there." You hear several snaps from her camera phone. How long is this going to take? "Okay, done." You lift yourself up and wipe your mouth. "I took a few extra, just to be sure. Now cmere." She grabs you by the tie and pulls you into into a deep kiss.

You start to think that maybe this won't be so bad. She breaks the kiss after a full minute. "Don't worry, once your my slave, it won't be all feet." You stopped at that last part.

"All feet? I don't want any feet."

"Well you may have to be my footslave every now and then to keep appearances with Denise. Don't worry though, I'll teach you to love them." You consider backing out of the deal, but you remember that she already has the pictures, so you're in for the long haul now. "Let's go to Denise right now and get this settled."

"Fine, lead the way."

*****

You return to Denise's office once more and Jacinta knocks on the door. "Enter." You here. Jacinta starts by poking her head in to see Denise sitting at her desk. "Ahhh, Jacinta, what can I do for you?"

"Miss Denise, I'd like to announce that I've won the contest." She opens the door the rest of the way and pulls you in.

"Rob, back again so soon? Well Jacinta, if hope you have proof of this claim." Jacinta shows her all the photos she took of you kissing her foot.

What does Denise decide?

1211321131111113.content:
"I'll tell you what Jenny. I won't fire you." You both sigh in relief. "But, I still need to punish you for this little stunt. So, from now on, you will be the office dog." She says that last word with an ear to ear grin. You watch the blood drain from Jenny's face.

"D-d-dog?" She stutters out.

"That's right Jenny, a dog, leash and collar, the works. You'll crawl around the floor on your hands and knees and clean the feet of every other employee here with your mouth. Your pay will be the same, but your job will change completely." You watch as tears begin to form in Jenny's eyes.

"*sniff B-but I didn't do anything wrong. It's Rob you're mad at. He was the one that thought up this whole plan and it's his stubbornness that got him in this mess to begin with. Let him be the company dog."

You couldn't believe this, Jenny was throwing you under the bus for her plan. You were willing to give her part of your salary, and this is how she repays you? "An interesting idea. Tell you what Rob, if you agree to take her place as the company dog, I'll let her keep her job, no strings attached. I'll even end the contest and let you take full pay again." That last part got your attention. As much as you wanted Jenny to pay for turning on you like that, you could use the money.

"Or, you can go back to work and I'll make Jenny company dog. Of course, her salary is a lot to pay for just a dog, so I'll need to make some budget cuts. Say, a quarter of your full salary." That will leave you flat broke. So your options are either be poor as dirt with a target on your back, or be Denise's literal bitch.

"But, there's one last option for both of you. If you can convince me of one other employee here that deserves the humiliation of being treated like a dog, I'll make them take the job and you'll both go free, salaries intact. Of course, if you fail to convince me then you're both becoming dogs. So Rob, what's your pick?"

12113211311113.content:
"Jenny, you only win if Rob agrees to be your office foot slave permanently!" Denise declares, her expression deadly serious.

You let out an almost hysterical laugh. "Wh-what? Her office slave...? You've said some crazy, stupid things before but this really takes the biscuit!" Looking across at Jenny, you're surprised to see that her expression doesn't match your incredulous one.

"I'm not talking to you, worm. This isn't anything that you get a fucking say in." Her harsh words wipe the disbelieving smirk from your face as you watch your redheaded friend with nervousness.

"What do you mean, exactly?" Jenny enquires, her arms folded.

"Well, Rob here - this complete waste of space - will basically devote his every working moment to serving your feet. He will be your personal foot stool: his face will soothe your feet while you work. He will service, clean, lick and worship your feet at your request. Basically, you're going to completely own him." Denise states calmly, the corners of her mouth twitching when she sees the evident horror in your eyes.

Jenny goes strangely quiet. The tension is just too much for you. "This is ridiculous. Jenny - don't listen to this bitch. Come on - we don't need her. We can..." Your voice trails off as Jenny gives you a half-smile and a shrug of her shoulders as if to indicate that she can't go with you right now. Turning to your boss, she clears her throat.

"So if I do that I'll get half of Rob's salary. Right?" she says, a conflicted expression on her face. You can't believe her! Is she seriously considering Denise's offer?! Part of you wants to get the hell out of there, but you stand there transfixed, as if witnessing a car crash.

"Yes. You will receive the money immediately. All you have to do is to get him to agree to being your foot slave," Denise says simply, reasonably almost! Her green eyes begin flashing with excitement, as if she knows that she's about to make your life a living hell!

"That sounds...interesting," Jenny says ominously.

Finally you manage to find your voice. "Look, I can't be-"

A warning glance from both women silences you before your blonde bitch of a new boss speaks. "Speak again, you worthless maggot, and I will reduce your pay to a quarter, and keep the rest of my money for myself," Denise adds this last part in quickly, to make it clear that Jenny won't suddenly be receiving more.

Jenny stares across at Denise, her expression still conflicted. You imagine she is mulling it all over. But how can she?! Does she seriously think that you will agree to such a deal?!

"Rob, just stay quiet while I speak to Denise," Jenny speaks calmly, with surprising authority. It's almost as if Denise making her such an offer has boosted her self-confidence.

"You've made a decision then?" Denise replies, barely able to contain her excitement...

Jenny nods before answering...

121132113111132.content:
"Ohh and before I forget, if he has not agreed upon being your office foot slave and shown it in action by the end of the day you will be fired," Denice barks.
"I hope that will give you enough incentive," she adds with a wicked smile and closes the door.

You look shocked at Jenny who does not seem as confident anymore, instead she seems worried. What have you gotten her into.

After a moments pause looking at Jenny petrified by Denise's final remarks you muster your voice. "Well what now? That bitch can't be serious".

"I don't know.. I can't loose my job Rob, I just can't," Jenny says with a cracked voice.

"Well what do you want me to do, I have already kissed your foot once and that was bad enough, you can't expect me to become your foot slave," you snap back.

Jenny looks back at you ready to reply but then just hangs her head and leans against the wall. Then moments later slumps down to the floor sobbing.

You notice that the people in the office are starting to look over at the two of you, Jenny just sitting there sobbing louder and louder and you standing over her not doing a thing about it.. this does not look good. Also you could never stand to see a women cry.

You help Jenny up and suggest that the two of you go into one of the empty conference rooms to talk about this, she just nods her head still sobbing.

You help her over to the conference room, sit her on one of the chairs and kneel beside her.

"Ok Jenny what do you think we should do," you ask with a measure of dread in your voice.

Jenny looks up at you with tears on her cheek and wipes a few of them away. "You know she will do it, you know she will fire me if she does not get what she wants Rob," Jenny says with a cracked voice.

"I know, that bitch has all the power.. for now," you reply.

"And you know that even if you don't do this and she fires me she will just continue until she gets what she wants," Jenny says with some of the authority and assurance returning to her voice.

"Yes I suppose you are right but what do you suggest we do about it, you can't just expect me to live under your desk at your feet from now on," you say with an emphases of disgust on the last part.

"Like I said before we have to give her what she wants for now, so you will just have to suck it up for a little while until we figure out how to turn the tables.
She wants you to agree to be my office foot slave so I think we should draw up a contract together about what that entitles and sign it in front of her.
It will obviously have to have some foot kissing and you will probably have to live under my table but Rob that is the best thing until we figure something out, its either that or me being fired and you having to deal with the next thing she throws at you alone".

"I suppose you are right.. but Jenny I hate feet, I just can't be your foot slave"

Jenny kicks of her pumps and raises her nylons toward your face. "We have some time before we have to draw up the contract, we can test and see if you can do the basic task you will have to do and help you get used to my feet."

You are unsure but you think you saw a quick smile in Jennies eyes.

"Just take one sniff of them and then kiss them," Jenny adds.

You lean in and hesitantly take a short sniff of her nylons, they smell warm and vinegary with a hint of sweat. You gag instantly, you hate the smell and above that you hate the degradation of having to smell feet.

"Now just give them one kiss," Jenny adds, with the previous authority returned fully to her voice.

You move forward and barley manage to touch her foot with your lips before gaging again, this can't be happening, you can't do this for the foreseeable future.

"There see it is not so bad, I wont make you do more than that I promise. We just have to write a contract now and show Denice what you just did and everything will be ok," Jenny says compassionately.

"So this contract will only be about me smelling you feet and kissing them once a day?" You ask with a mixture of discussed and optimism.

"No of course we will need to put way more and way nastier stuff into it to sell it to Denice but I won't make you do any of that stuff Rob," she says with the same compassionate voice.
"We are friends, you can trust me," she adds but again you think you see a sinister smile shoot across her face.

"Alright then, go ahead." Michelle sighs as she takes her feet off your face for the first time since the shift started. With your vision unobstructed, you see all three of them grinning down at you in your hole. "Go on back to your mistress' desk, then."

"Actually, we were planning to take him down to the break room to feed him." Jacinta says.

"And you are?" Michelle questions with a raised brow at Jacinta inserting herself.

"Oh right, sorry. I'm Jacinta from marketing. Pleased to meet you." She says as the two girls shake hands.

"Come on Rob, out of the hole. Denise never put in tunnels that lead to the break rooms." Jenny says as she gestures for you to come out.

As you crawl out from under Michelle's desk, Jacinta talks to her. "We'll have him back in, say, half an hour." She says before the two begin to depart with you.

Jenny and Jacinta looked to each other and then to you.... "Sure.. why not?" Jacinta replied... both Jenny and you stared at Jacinta with disapproval . "Let me get my lunch bag and I will meet you guys there at the break room" Michelle said... "okey, see you then" Jacinta replied

"Come on over and take a seat Michelle." Jenny says while patting the seat next to her.

"Uhh.. okay." Michelle says as she takes her seat. "I thought this seat was for him."

"Nope. He's not allowed to sit normally under the contract." Jenny says plainly.

"Jenny, I think Rob would like his food while we talked." Jacinta reminds her friend as she begins slipping off her shoes.

"Oh yeah, right." Jenny remembers as she takes off her shoes as well.

"What's going on here?" Michelle wonders as the two women set their shoes in front of you, showing the smashed-up bread in their heels. You waste no time digging into the soggy mess, fighting through the admittedly salty taste of a fresh day's sweat as you ate. After sitting in a hole under Michelle's feet for several hours, you would take anything you could get right now.

"Oh, part of the contract says that he's only allowed to eat from footwear and nothing else. So, me and Jacinta took to packing his lunch in our shoes." Jenny explained as she pulled a sandwich out of her lunch bag and began to eat.

"Yeah. He hated it at first, but soon came to accept it." Jacinta adds on as she too begins to eat her lunch.

"Huh, neat." Michelle says as she looks under the table to see you licking away at the insole of one of Jenny's heels, trying to get as much of the bread mush as possible. She sees your attitude and begins to think up plans for once she got back to work as she sat back up and began to eat for herself.

"So Michelle, you met Denise, right?" Jenny asks.

"Yeah, why?" Michelle wonders as she bites into her sandwich.

"Well, what do you think of her, as a person, that is?" She asks, ripping the band-aid off quick. She needed to know if Michelle was already a lost cause or not in getting her to their side before Denise's.

How does Michelle respond?
