121132113111132121122222.content:
"Oh, Look its late and its time to go to bed" Jenny said. then she give you that smirk look "Bed time for me, closet time for you"

"Oh, come on Jenny. Do you we really have to do this?" you begged her. "we don't need to discuss this matter again, Rob!" she frowned. "You're my foot property, among my shoes is where you belong, as you all are my foot property. I'm sorry you don't fit in my socks drawers *giggle*" Jenny laughed.

Jenny put her hand again on your head, you understand that she is guiding you to the opening where your head supposed to go inside the closet. You were complying as you started to feel her control over you. you looked in the opening and you see that there is no enough space for your head. you pushed your head inside, pushing her shoes to both sides of your head. Jenny came from the closet door side and looked at you and smiled. "Let's make it more comfortable to you!" she said. She pushed her work heels a little bit away from your head (2 inches) and flipped the heels she wore today at work so the inside of the shoe will be against your face if you slept on your right or left side. You looked up and you say the soles of her ballerina and the soles of party shoes. The scent of her heels reached your nose. they were still humid. "And now I'm going bed, good night Rob! Sweet dream!" Jenny said that normally like she has just tucked you in bed and then she closed the closet door. Sending you in the darkness, the air of the closet is filled with the aroma of leather, humidity, the dirt and Jenny's feet. You can't believe that you ended up sleeping in a shoe closet.

Suddenly you felt something moving on your neck. You realized that Jenny is up to something. you tried to move but Jenny calmed you down. "This is just to make sure that you don't sneak out during the night" Jenny informed. You realized there is no way out till the morning as you heard Jenny's step moving away from the closet.

You couldn't sleep, you are suffering from a headache caused by the intoxication from the scents of the closet. At last you managed to sleep and you had nightmares about your future. It was a very long night for you.

You could not figure whether morning had come or not, as you're still in the darkness of the closet. You heard Jenny's steps as she woke up, going to the bathroom and took her morning shower. She then started to dress for work. Finally you heard her approaching to the closet. She opened the door, the light almost blinded you. You were happy to see her face. "Good morning, Rob! How was your first night?" she asked you with her normal smiley face. "Good morning, Jenny!, it was a very long night but I managed to sleep a couple of hours", "That's good, I promise it will be better day by day" Jenny comforted you.

Jenny looked into her shoes and picked one of her shoes for work. But before she picked it she put her foot beside your face, "The good morning kiss for my feet" Jenny ordered. You complied and kissed her foot. She unlocked your neck and you could get out of the closet. "You may use the toilet, but remember you're not allowed to wash your face" Jenny said.

You still feel that she is your friend, and this is why you comply to her without feeling much degradation. As soon as you got out of the bathroom. You found Jenny having breakfast. You saw a bowl of cereals between her feet under the table. She pointed at the bowl and told you "your breakfast is ready". You wanted to object but you remembered the whole discussions so you crawled down the table and started to lick and suck the food from the bowl.

You went together to work. You've noticed some changes in the receptionists desk on the front door. The desk are higher than before. Candice was waiting at the front desk, "Rob!" Candice called you, "you crawl from here" she pointed at a small opening under the new floor of the receptionist desk. "As you're now a foot slave, Denise decide to give you a proper place to work from rather than occupying our floors, you should operate under the floors, just follow the guidelines on your way" Candice said. Jenny and you were surprised to see that, you looked to each other's eyes and then she told you "work time, to your place".

You groveled inside the tunnel, you find an opening that barely allows your face to look up from. You've realized that your face is on the level of the floors under Jenny's desk. Jenny was sitting on her seat looking down at you with Candice standing beside also looking at you.You felt yourself very small under them.

"See Rob, now you're below the floors, beneath the level of the soles of our heels. You look pathetic. But it's your destiny to live under our feet forever." Candice said. you couldn't speak a word as you're not allowed to speak . you were waiting Jenny to defend you but she kept looking at you with a fake sad face. "Don't worry, Rob! It will fine" Jenny comforted you.

This time, Jenny did not take off her shoes. But she did not put them on your face neither. you watched her heels coming very near to your face but she did not step on you. Jenny was focusing on finishing some paper work, with no intention she put her right foot with her heels on over your forehead and crossed her legs.

The pressure was enormous, and the soles of the heels are very hard compared to Jenny soft soles. You were not able to speak nor able to kiss her shoes. So you just hoped that she removes her feet. Suddenly, you heard Candice calling Jenny for the morning coffee brake. What a relief!!!

Suddenly you heard some heels approaching you! Who is she??

121132113113.content:
Jenny kicks off her high heels and pushes them to the side. This is it, she will sit down and make you kiss her feet now. Nerves fill your body with a horrifying tingle as you think about what you're about to do... But that feeling is replaced with fear as before Jenny can sit down, you hear a different voice speak, accompanied by foot steps.

Oh shit! Somebody else has come over to Jenny's desk! Did somebody see you crawl under?? As you look back at Jenny's now bare feet, a new pair of heels come into view... Unfortunately for you, you don't check out women's feet ask day, so you have absolutely no idea who they belong to! You strain your ears trying to listen to who it could be, but they are talking quite softly and the voices are somewhat muffled to you being under the desk. You hope to God this person leaves soon, whoever they are!

As you listen carefully, every now and then you can make out some of the words that are being said...

"............ That document to be sent...."

Thank god, it seems like they are talking about something work related. At least nobody saw you and nobody knows where you are.

"... Well it was supposed to go yesterday......"

"... Busy, I just didn't get to it..... "

It sounds like whoever this person is, they aren't too happy with Jenny.

"... Doing nothing all day? I mean, look, your heels are off, you're bare foot!..."

Oh shit, whoever she is, she's looking at Jenny's feet! You curl into a tight ball hoping that none of your limbs are sticking out from under Jenny's desk.

"... Why are you bare foot anyway? Are you going to get Rob to kiss your feet and take his pay?.... "

Oh god... Why did the conversation have to go to that topic?!? You try to hear Jenny's response, but her voice is even more muffled than it was before. It sounds like she is struggling to respond to this person's question.

"... Pathetic, get out of here, go send that for now before I go and see Denise!..."

Jenny doesn't even put her heels back on, as you see her bare feet start walking off towards the copying room. This is quite possibly the worst thing that could have happened right now! You watch the unknown woman's feet, hoping to God that she leaves Jenny's desk...

You breathe a sigh of relief as suddenly the feet turn and walk away! Bullet dodged!!

... All of a sudden, she stops..... She turns and starts heading back to Jenny's desk! Your heart stops as you wait to see what she does...

Jacinta has found you.
The new girl Michelle has found you...

The feet walk to the side of the desk as your heart begins to beat again, exceptionally fast... What the hell is she doing!!

The chair is pulled away from the desk and all you can do is look up in horror at the face of the woman grinning down at you like a predator that has captured its prey...

"I KNEW IT!" She says!
1211321131131.title: She sits down and looks under the desk!! You

No way are you giving up! Refuse and tell her to go to hell!
Jenny suddenly comes back....thank God!
12113211311311.content:
Like a rabbit in the headlights, you stare in terror at the brown-haired receptionist. The fact that she sounds so triumphant at finding you only exacerbates the fear that is enveloping you!

"I've been looking for you....and here you are, hiding under your loser-friend's desk!" Candice says cattily, a smirk on her annoying face.

Curled up in such an uncomfortable position, you attempt to salvage some pride by attempting to appear casual. "Er, hi. I'm just...looking for something..."

"Ha!" Candice snorts. "Yeah right: you decide to look for something the same day that Denise announces the best news ever! This is just perfect!" She hops down on to Jenny's chair and places both heels firmly onto your back. As they dig into your ribs and your lower back, you can't help but let out a cry.

"Stop....you bitch!" You grunt up at her, hating the fact that you can still see her horribly smug, powdered face.

"Watch it, loser. You're under me: literally and metaphorically. Be a good boy or I'll just...press a little harder..." She says in an ominous tone as the end of one heel prods with such force that the shoe itself comes halfway off!

"Owwww! Please...!" You gasp, wishing that you could manoeuvre yourself out of this. No such luck: you are well and truly trapped in this awkward position!

"Oh come on, douchebag. Denise is gonna walk all over you now she's the Senior Manager. And as her best friend," She pauses here as if you should be impressed. "That means I can walk all over you too! We've waited for years to put you in your fucking place!"

The dangling heel drops off so that her bare foot is now pressed against your back. As soon as her shoe drops off, a musty stench spreads around you, making you gag. Writhing in agony, you roll to your side but find only the hard wood of Jenny's desk. Having no real choice, you allow Candice's feet to push you firmly onto your back. Ruing your bad luck, you find that one arm is trapped under the base of the office chair, while the other is squashed painfully under your back somehow, as it becomes increasingly numb.

"Ha! That's better - now you can get a good look at what you're about to kiss! My FOOT!" Candice laughs at you, making you feel entirely hopeless. Wishing Jenny would come back to get you out of this, you suffer under this bitch of a receptionist!

"Hmmm maybe you weren't hiding....maybe you were about to kiss that loser-friend-of-yours foot instead...?" Candice says curiously.

You start denying it, wary of avoiding any trouble for Jenny if you can help it, but the heeled foot plants squarely over your mouth, muffling your voice. At least she didn't use her bare foot, is the only thing you can be thankful for right now!

"Save it, foot boy. That little bitch won't be back for a while, believe me after the stuff I've given her to do! Now let's get to why I'm here. You are going to kiss my foot; I am going to get half of your salary," she says matter-of-factly. "You are going to kiss the foot of the woman who has beaten you! Now, take my heel off with my mouth so I can put my feet on your face. Do it quickly, then I will let you kiss my feet just once, maybe twice. Decide not to and I will completely humiliate you!" She giggles nastily. "So, what's it gonna be, loser?"

Candice places the sharp part of her heel over your mouth and taps her front teeth with it, as if to indicate that you can use them to pull it off her foot, therefore sealing your fate...

Are you going to submit, to Candice of all people?!
12113211311311.title: Candice!!

choices: "If my feet smell do amazing, I think you should kiss them"
"You like the smell, have another whiff then!"
Candice is interrupted by somebody...
121132113113112.content:
"Go to hell Candice, I will never kiss your feet you bitch!" You say, not surrendering to this evil woman.

"You know Rob, a part of me was hoping you would say that!" Candice proclaims as she pulls her phone out of her bag. "I know Denise only required a photo of you kissing somebody's bare foot as proof of your defeat, but I think she would prefer the full video of your destruction, what do you think?"

She's going to film this?? You struggle harder as a grin comes over Candice's face. She holds her phone to her face and presses record, starting off with what is obviously some kind of introduction.

"Hello everybody, my name is Candice Watson, and this morning I was given a fantastic opportunity..." She begins. "Our amazing new boss has offered a substantial pay increase to the first woman in the office that can force the office pig Rob to kiss her feet and produce evidence to her. Well, I am proud to say that I have this very pig under my feet as we speak, stuck under a desk, unable to move, completely at my mercy. Let's have some fun shall we?"

Candice then maneuvers the phone so that the camera is now on you. Humiliated and scared, you begin to struggle again, grunting.

"Tell our viewers pig... What's your name?" Candice asks you.

"Get off me bitch!" You reply.

"Hmmm... Wrong answer" Candice says to you. All of a sudden, she pushes her high heel into your ribs hard! You cry out in agony as you hear Candice start to laugh at your cries of pain. "I'll try again, and let's see what comes first... The correct answer, or a broken rib! What is your name?"

"Ahhhh, ok, ok please, it's Rob! My name is Rob" you cry out.

"There we go... Now let's get this show started shall we?" Candice says with a smile as she kicks the remaining shoe off, revealing both bare feet. Unable to stop her, you're forced to watch as she lifts one bare foot up and places it over your face. "Now Rob, tell everybody what my foot smells like. Take a deep whiff!"

You refuse in take a deep smell, but with her foot on your face you have no choice but to inhale her foot odour. You cringe in disgust as the smell of foot seat overcomes your senses and you begin struggling with a renewed energy, but the struggling is no use.

"They... They smell like shit!" You cry out.

"Oh really? Another wrong answer, you know what that means people!" Candice says. She then pushes her sweaty smelly bare feet right into your face, crushing you like a bug under her. You struggle and cry out again, but this time your cries are muffled by the soles of her feet. As you attempt to shout, her foot sweaty involuntarily makes its way into your mouth. The taste is disgusting, even else than the smell, but no where near as bad as the psychological torture this is taking on you. Just when your mind breaks and you decide you can't take any more, Candice lifts her feet up... You waste no time at all...

"Ahhhh, ok fine Candice, they smell good!" You shout out.

" Oh my, have my feet broken you already? This is too good! Ok then Rob..."
121132113113112.title: No way are you giving up! Refuse and tell her t...

choices: You have to surrender, it's too much! Kiss Candice's bare soles in defeat!
Thankfully, someone comes along. But who?!
Not kissing her feet makes her frustrated: Candice decides to punish you!
1211321131131121.content:
Your will to fight her is rapidly eroding: all you want to do is get out of this ridiculously painful and frustrating situation! Candice continues to hover her nasty, stinky feet over your face, immensely enjoying the agony this is causing you...

"If my feet smell do amazing, I think you should kiss them!" She declares triumphantly, a look of sheer glee about her.

You moan up at her. "No...no!"

"But I thought you just said they smelled amazing?" Candice swivels the lens of the camera back to her so that she can 'talk' to the so-called audience. "You heard that before, right? You heard good old Rob here tell me how amazing my feet smelled?" She giggles nastily before turning the camera back to you, lowering her feet slowly down so that they are just above your face.

A nasty stench swirls around your nostrils, making you gag and splutter. This is it: this is Denise's evil plan coming to complete fruition. In a way, you have to grudgingly hand it to her - she knew full well that it was only a matter of time that you would be forced to kiss disgusting feet against your own will. And for it to be Candice of all people...

The very thought of that gives you a jolt of adrenaline. Biting on the end of her left heel, the brunette receptionist lets out a cry of pain and automatically jerks her foot up. The right one however is pushed firmly down onto your face, causing the back of your head to sink into the carpet.

"Ahh! You piece of shit!" Candice shouts down at you in fury. Using a hand to clasp the end of her foot where your bite marks are, she puts her phone down temporarily. "Now I'll have to edit that. Man you're such a pain in the fucking ass! Well, a pain on the end of my foot!" She smirks at you malevolently, despite her pain.

This is a small victory, you realise. Candice has you completely trapped and the putrid smell of her bare foot is making you nauseous to the point that you're going to hurl. Your vision obscured by her increasingly sweaty sole, you let out a groan of frustration, wishing you could free your arms and force her off you.

"Wow, am I gonna enjoy it when you're kissing my feet like the loser you are," Candice states confidently, resuming the position of her other bare foot over your face.

"Pmmease....!" Is all you can gurgle up at her, now that your face is completely covered by her god-awful smelling soles.

"How do they smell?" She says with mock-innocence.

"A-a-amazing...!" You gasp up at her, desperately hoping that she will let off you, yet she doesn't!

"I told you before: you said my feet smelled amazing! You need to kiss them! Unless you want more of this..." She laughs as she exerts more pressure with her feet, sliding them along your face, pinching your cheeks with her toes. Just when you consider suddenly biting at them again, Candice pushes the centre of one sole over your mouth so firmly that it is sealed tightly shut. Her sweaty toes tap against your forehead while you squirm to no avail.

"Kiss my foot, kiss it!" You can just make out her phone pointed squarely at you, just above the tops of her toes. "Kiss it now and accept that I've beaten you!"

She lets off you only very slightly, but just enough so that her feet are placed over your mouth and nose. There's enough pressure forced on you from her soles that you can't use your teeth at all, but you do have some movement with your lips.

This is it - it's either kiss her foot or just hope that you are saved, or pass out from the nausea!
1211321131131121.title: About To Kiss Candice's Foot?

choices: Call her bluff, she can't be telling the truth
Maybe that is the correct choice... Jenny shouldn't suffer because of you
12113211311313.content:
"Who else could it be other than Mr Rob Parker, the best sell representative in the company." Michelle's sweet and meek voice was definitely a bliss to hear... however not in a situation like this one.
"It is not what it looks like... Jenny asked me to help her out with the cables since she had an issue with her peripherals that prevented her from doing her job... yes!" You murmur out as you try to get up only to be cubed by Michelle sitting down on the chair and in front of the desk.

"You know, Rob, I may be an intern but I wasn't born yesterday. I overheard Denise's 50% increase for anyone that proves that they have gotten the better of you." Michelle pulls the chair carefully closer to the desk as you were now faced with her black and silky nylon stockings were pressing to your face.

"We can do something else, however. As you probably know, being an intern doesn't pay a lot, so a 50% increase wouldn't really do me justice after I found you fair and square in such a good position, don't you agree?

"What do you mean found? You just happened to come by and..." You were quickly shut, as your open mouth had her bare right foot inside of it.

"Now, now, Robbie, don't interrupt your owner while she is talking. That is very impolite of an obedient pet like yourself, is it not?" Michelle giggled a bit as she started playing with her foot inside of your mouth, slowly rubbing her toes to your hard palate. That made you cough a bit, but you couldn't do much more than to look into her emerald eyes and listen.

"As I was saying..." Michelle looked around on Jenny's desk and took her mirror and started fixing her make up. "What I propose instead fancies me way more. I let you out of the small confinement you are currently under, where my feet are degenerating you enough and we go to Denise." As she says that, Michelle had fixed her makeup and had her gaze back focused on you as she got her foot out of your mouth to allow you to speak.

"You will admit that you have had a crush on me ever since I came to this firm before two weeks and are so gratefully giving up your current position to become my footrest and pet during the day for free!" Michelle smiled as she leaned in to see your expression.

"And why the hell would I do that? Feet disgust me, they make me vomit. Why would I agree to that?" You utter furiously to the absurdity of that offer.

"I knew you would ask that! My my, you are a very smart doggy, aren't you?" Michelle slowly got her left foot and slowly caressed your head with it. "Thing is, you don't have a choice. You see, my dad's company is the firm's biggest partner and if something were to go south it would be really really bad for the company..."

"Your point? I could definitely quit right now and go somewhere else outside of town, not even Denise can affect my work at that point."

"Well, you see. I am aware that Jenny is a distant cousin of yours and that she loves her job... I know that that is one of the reasons you decided to have her get the raise since you care for her so so much. Not to mention that she is still paying off her student loans... What if I decided to tell my dad to have both of you fired? That wouldn't be so good, would it?"

You stayed there frozen in place. How did she know about that? What are you gonna do from here?
12113211311313.title: The new girl Michelle has found you...

choices: This is a absurd, you can't put up with this.
You agree to the video.
121132113113132.content:
(Hello to anyone reading this. If you are enjoying my additions I would love to receive a message from any of you! I would love to hear what you think. Coins are also much appreciated!)



"Jenny shouldn't be affected because of me..." You murmured under your nose, making it barely hearable. Your eyes went back to Michelle's. She was looking at you with great interest. You were like a pet to her.

"Did you say something, doggy? I can't hear your meeking from down there." Michelle's lips turned into a light smile, that became a smirk.

"I think your proposal is justified and that I deserve my place as your footrest, Michelle." You uttered with a slight distaste in your mouth. "I have only one request."

"And what may that be? You should be aware I am no philanthropist, especially when it comes to my property." Michelle's expression did not change. For her, all of this was just a game, and you were just prey.

You gulped at the mention of property, not believing what had happened for just one day. "Let's say I do everything as you wish. Will Jenny be able to keep her job?"

Michelle burst into laughter as she heard your request. That, terrified you even further, being in the situation you were. "Here you are, Rob, the top sells performer of the firm, who is about to lose his dignity and humanity to a mere intern he met only a week ago and all you can think of is Jenny's well-being? Aren't you just wonderful?"

Michelle moved her right foot to your head and started petting you with it. "Since you asked so nicely." Michelle took a phone out of the bag she was carrying. "Jenny will keep her job. I will make sure she gets a promotion. Of course, as we know in this field, nothing comes for free. We may tell it does, but does it ever really?" Michelle was visibly searching for something on her phone.

You couldn't believe your ears. Here you were, below your best-friend and cousin's desk, lectured by a mere intern. As much as it pained you, you had to comply. "Of course it doesn't Michelle. What do I have to do for your generosity?"

"Glad you asked! So that nothing goes south when we are in Denise's office, I need to feel secure that you won't back off from our deal. That's why I have a proposal. I will make a video of you telling everyone how much you adore my feet, as well as how you would like to be my servant during work hours.
121132113113132.title: Maybe Michelle is right...

choices: Talking complete crap! Of course she knows - make that clear to her!
Genuine! She is probably the only woman in the office unaware of Denise's offer!
Before you decide, Jenny comes storming over!
1211321132.content:
For a moment, you feel yourself start to relent, remembering the times that Jenny has had your back before. However the look of animosity on her freckled face only makes you seeth with rage.

"Screw you, Jenny. Find some other loser to get some money out of," you say harshly, shaking your head at her in disdain as you stroll off.

You hear an agitated sigh behind you as you head your way back to your desk but ignore it: Jenny's dead to you, as far as you're concerned!

Deciding to focus on some work that's been hanging over you for a while, you begin typing away, your mind still troubled by Denise's declaration to the female staff. What a bitch! She is seriously hell bent on making your life a misery. In the past, you wouldn't be that bothered about such a situation, but things are different now. Noticeably different! Now Denise holds a tangible authority over you, others have less reason to flock to your side, to support you. Jenny is living proof of that!

As you continue your email, you become increasingly aware that there are several pairs of eyes on you. Better than several pairs of feet on you, you grimly muse to yourself. Surely, you are a target now: nothing but prey to any woman who would eagerly take half of your pay check away!

"Hey Rob!" Jacinta, the blonde who you suspect has a crush on you, appears behind you, startling you.

"Oh, hey," you reply warily. "What do you...want?" You don't want to sound rude, but you have every right to be suspicious!

"I just..." Jacinta pulls up a nearby office chair so she is sitting right beside you, so close that you can smell her strong, vanilla scented perfume. You recoil slightly as she presses on.

"I just need to say something. I know how you must feel about Denise's promotion." She smiles apologetically at you, her Roman nose widening slightly. "But I just want you to know-"

"I know about Denise's stupid offer in the meeting room," you interrupt her. "I know all about it so I can save you the trouble explaining."

Jacinta stares at you, puzzled. "Offer? What offer? I haven't even been to the meeting room!"

"Oh come on, do you seriously think I'll fall for that one?" You practically sneer at her, rapidly losing respect for her.

The blonde woman stares at you. her ocean blue eyes full of confusion. "You've lost me. All I was gonna say was that I'm here for you. If you wanna talk, I'm here for you." She leans forwards to squeeze your knee gently before leaning back to a more comfortable position.

Watching her closely, you have to admit that she is by no means unattractive. Sure she has a rather large nose and an usually wide mouth (especially when she smiles!), yet she's well-dressed: with her smart yet stylish purple dress, and expensive-looking shoes. It's strange how you've never found her attractive - maybe the fact that you've always thought of her as having amorous feelings for you has been off-putting, somehow.

"Thanks," you mutter uncertainly, still trying to suss out if she's for real. As she smiles at you, in your head you're becoming increasingly decided that she's...
1211321132.title: Cutting Ties With Jenny!

choices: It's worth a try: attempt to befriend Michelle, the office newbie!
Guilt about Jenny and Jacinta catches up with you...who do you apologise to?
Candice suddenly comes over!
12113211321.content:
The chances of Jacinta telling the truth just seem so unlikely; the cynical side of you takes over...

"I'm sorry, Jacinta," you tell the blonde woman.

"Hey there's no need to apologise," she smiles at you. "You know I'm-"

"I'm sorry that I actually started to believe that utter crock of shit!" You say harshly, cutting her off completely and leaving her in stunned silence. "Do you really believe that I buy that blatant bullshit from you? Like Denise would conveniently decide not to tell you but ALL the other female staff!"

"Tell me what?" She says in a small voice, her feelings clearly hurt by your tirade.

"Ha!" You scoff. "Still denying it! Come on we both know it: you're trying to get me to kiss your disgusting feet, like that stupid bitch, Jenny," you find yourself fuming and really losing it over this whole situation.

Jacinta stares at you, a little open-mouthed in surprise with the way you're talking. You've never spoken like this to anyone in the office before - sure you've been blunt and tough on people at times, but to rant and swear in this way has obviously upset Jacinta.

"I don't know what you're talking about," Jacinta says, her blue eyes moist with tears. "But I never knew you could be such an asshole, Rob!"

"Oh come on, stop pretending-"

This time it's Jacinta's turn to interrupt you. "I'm NOT! No one speaks to me the way you just did. I've always stuck up for you before - always! Every time Denise would say something mean about you...I would always fight your corner. But now...now..." Jacinta says defiantly, standing up and glaring at you, several tears causing her makeup to run a little.

"Look," you say more softly. "I didn't mean to..."

"Too late," she snaps, stalking away. "That's the last time I'll try to help you, Rob!"

These last words emit several giggles from the women in the office. "What's up? Got nothing better to do? How about some work?" You call out angrily at the curious faces: all of which seem to have a gloatingness about them.

Watching Jacinta make a swift exit, doubts circle around your mind. Maybe she was telling the truth.... But it doesn't matter now either way. You've managed to alienate another potential ally - again by your quick temper. It dawns on you slowly: there are literally no other women in this office that you can trust, or even potentially trust. Your eyes flicker over to the slight, delicate form of an unfamiliar figure. Wearing a white summer dress and a seemingly innocent expression, your eyes meet but only temporarily.

As this young, petite brunette walks on, you realise it must be the new girl, Michelle. With all the tumultuous events of the day so far, you had practically forgotten about the office having a newbie. An idea forms in your mind: Michelle is new: unaffected and uninfluenced by Denise...maybe Denise isn't even including her in her unpleasant 'offer'! It could be worth forging a new alliance here, before the cute new girl becomes like the other harpies...
12113211321.title: Not Buying Jacinta's Story!

choices: Go on talk to her: ask her if she was in Denise's meeting!
Ignore it for now and carry on with your day. Catch up with her later!
121132113211.content:
Fears of having alienated the two women who could potentially help you, you decide to chance it with Michelle. As she's the newbie, she could well be your one and only chance to forge a new alliance!

Hurrying after her, you decide to turn on the charm offensive. "Hey, er Michelle isn't it?" You ask her, smiling politely.

"Uh-huh," she replies, staring back at you in surprise. "And you're...?"

"Rob," you tell her. "I've just poured some coffee. You want some?"

"Sure." She follows you into the kitchen and watches you curiously as you pour her a cup.

You chat to her for several minutes about how her day's been, being careful to be friendly but not too overbearing. The worst thing to do would be to risk making a negative impression. As you tell her a bit about yourself, you notice that she's staring at you, as if to work something out. This starts to alarm you slightly: is it that she was in fact in on the meeting with Denise after all? You try to ignore it, but it's still very much at the forefront of your mind. Asking her about why she came to work here, you try to watch her carefully to see if there are any nonverbal cues you can pick up on...

"So I was like, y'know good to get some experience and all," she says, a little disinterestedly, playing with her brown hair. "I mean, I don't want to be stuck in here forever or anything!"

"I know what you mean," you retort, ignoring the thinly veiled dig. "So what do you want to do, for the long term I mean."

She looks at you with amusement. "Come on, I don't know that! I mean I'm just out of college! Whatever I decide to do, it will be better than this place." She adds in a rather arrogant tone.

Michelle is certainly cute: with her shortish, white summer dress, slightly wavy brown hair and admittedly attractive face, no red-blooded man could deny her hotness. However, that's not what you're here for. Trying your best to overlook her bratty nature, along with her attractiveness, you change the subject and talk about various other things.

Finishing her coffee, Michelle crinkles her nose at you. "So, nice talking to you. You know, maybe it will be me welcoming the new girl to the office. The shoe would really be on the other foot then!" She laughs casually before walking off with a brief wave goodbye.

Her words resonate inside your head. The shoe would really be on the other foot...

Damn! You really hope that this is just a coincidence; can you take a chance on assuming it is? If Michelle does know about the bounty placed upon you by Denise, then she is just another person who you should probably avoid...
121132113211.title: Attempting To Make A New Ally

You've lost your best friend in the entire office and the one girl that had a crush on you and may help you, you've just blown off too. " Awww, did I scare you? What's the matter, didn't hear me coming?" Candice said with a grin whilst shifting her gaze downwards. You look down too only to notice she is bare foot. You step back quickly!

Nothing would give me more pleasure than to see you on your knees licking my feet. Hell, I'd make you do it even if there was no money involved! Getting half your paycheck is just an added bonus to me!" Candice says to you whilst you continue to look at her evil feet.

"In fact, that's not enough for me... I want to crush you under my feet whilst you kiss and lick them... I will crush your face so hard that you will beg me to stop. Then when I have you begging, I will make you my office foot slave. You will live under my desk, worshipping my feet constantly. Do you think you can avoid that? Think again!" Candice says smiling.

Caught up in the fear of the situation, you are completely unprepared when...

Swiftly and without any warning, Candice whips her leg forward. You can only stare in surprise as her bare foot comes into sharp contact with your testicles!

"Ha!" She cries out triumphantly as you let out a cry of pain and drop instantly to your knees.

There are mutterings from some of the others in the office; no one seems to come too close though. Candice seems to have warded them off with an icy stare. Focusing her attention back to you, she prods her foot directly onto your nuts, making you gasp and feel several tears swelling in your eyes, so intense is the pain.

"Y-you...b-bitch!" Is all you can manage to murmur up to her, wincing with every word you say.

"You make me laugh, Rob! Here you are: crying on your knees in front of me, in front of the entire office," she makes a point to turn her head around to see who's watching. "And you decide to curse at me...! Wrong move!"

With that she smirks evilly at you while pressing her foot against your groin. You're in too much pain to force her off you; all you can do is futilely move your hands over to where her bare foot is firmly crushing your manhood. Letting out a whimper, much to your own disgust, you feel completely utterly pathetic. No one has made you feel like this before! The worst part of all is that this is Candice: one of the people you loathe most in the entire world, second only to Denise! The smug look on her powdered face is so damn infuriating, yet there's nothing you can do, apart from keel over on the floor. There's no freakin' way you're doing that!

Finally, you find the wherewithal to shuffle back enough to free your throbbing balls from the pressure of her foot. God, imagine if you'd got a hard-on, you muse grimly to yourself! That's pretty much the only positive you can think of right now! Your awkward movements to create some distance from her have left you slumped against the side of your desk. Unfortunately the pain is too great for you to even think about standing up.

Candice tuts at you as she stalks several yards over until she is towering over you. "Rob, you are such a loser! Look at you, cowering under me! No wonder Denise got the manager's job over you!"

You glare up at her, wishing that someone could help you out of this predicament. Just to make matters worse, the malevolent secretary raises up her nasty bare foot again but this time keeps it hovering in the air, just over your face.

"Kiss my foot, you fucking loser. Kiss the sole of my foot and accept your place: as my foot slave! One kiss to seal the deal: your money will be mine, then you can crawl under my desk, where you belong!" The expression on her face is so triumphant, so gleeful that it makes you simultaneously helpless and desperately furious!

"Come on!" She taps your forehead firmly with her toes, knocking it against your oak-panelled desk. "Who's gonna take you seriously again anyway now they've seen me own you. That's right, I own you, Rob!" She lets out a snort of laughter while staring down at you.

Gazing up at the bare sole that is just in front of your lips, you feel the nasty, vinegary stench begin to flood into your nostrils. Do you have any fight left in you or has Candice broken you?

Agreeing to meet again in an hour for a coffee break, you begin work with renewed hope. Having Jacinta to keep others away from you could just about make work more bearable!

Another thought occurs to you: has Denise not told Jacinta about the offer, knowing that she would go mad and cause an uproar, or did she simply just miss the meeting by mistake! You would rather it were the former: that way, Denise would have made all the other women sworn to secrecy, NOT to tell Jacinta!

Either way, you find that the next hour passes relatively quickly. Before you know it, Jacinta walks over to you, pulling her hair a biting her lip: two things you've noticed she often does when around you.

"Ready for a coffee, Rob?"

As you walk off with her, noticing a few mutterings from the other girls, Jacinta suddenly stops as though she's thought of something.

"Hang on Rob, I just...

Candice stops in her tracks and stares at you in confusion. "Excuse me...did you just say no?!" She says this last part as though just the idea is laughable.

Licking Denise's feet was one thing - she is technically your boss after all and refusing her would lead to a firing, or potentially worse. Candice on the other hand has had enough fun at your expense. Feeling some fire and resistance return to you, you look her in the eye.

"I said no, Candice," you tell her coldly. "You're not my boss...you can't tell me what to do."

"Well, that's where you're wrong," she says with a sneer. "I AM your boss, Rob. I'm Denise's best friend, and she has you by the balls. If you think it's beneath you to lick my feet, think again. The fact is you're beneath me. Me and every person in this office who is on good terms with Denise."

You try not to look fazed as you gulp a little. It's hard to argue with her logic, yet you're not going down without a fight. "Candice, I really think-"

"YOU'RE beneath me, Rob," she says with disdain, interrupting you casually. "Literally...I want you to be under my desk, licking my feet like the good little bitch that you are." She practically whispers this last part to you as she leans in towards you. "Now, do you want me to go and have a word with my good friend Denise, or are you just gonna accept that you'll be licking my feet whenever I tell you to?"

Staring at her, feeling outmanoeuvred and defeated once more, you know that this could well be pivotal. Surrender to Candice now and you'll be her doormat, her own personal slave. It's bad enough that you'll do literally anything Denise tells you to, as well as promise more foot massages to Kim...how long can you let this go on for?

"Come with me now, get under my desk and lick my feet. OR, I go and have a word with Denise...what's it gonna be?" Candice says, a smirk on her face and both hands on her shapely hips.

1211331222111222.content:
“I couldn’t help but notice how bad my feet stunk when you first started licking them. I’m glad I didn’t have to taste them like you did!”

Fresh laughter from Denise compounds your humiliation.

You don’t like where this is going...

“No fucking way!” You explode and jump to your feet. You thrust your finger out at her. “I’ve kissed your ass, licked your feet, given our boss a foot rub...there’s no way I’m letting you fart on my face! What’s wrong with you?” You snarl, the anger of the day flowing out of you.

“Get your finger out of my face Rob.” Denise says in a tone that freezes your veins. You drop it slowly. “Last chance Rob, put your head on my chair or else.”

“Fuck off.” You spit and turn to walk away. Fully prepared to leave this place forever and start over somewhere...anywhere else!

Before you make it to the door, you’re spun around by Denise. You open your mouth to curse her but she stuns you with a right hook to the jaw that sends you crashing to the ground. You shake the stars out of your vision and look up at her, she’s bouncing on the balls of her (freshly licked) feet in a legitimate looking boxing stance. She waves you up.

“Let’s go bitch. You think you can disobey me?”

This fucking cunt, you think. I’m going to put her in her place, then she’ll be licking my feet! All logic goes out the window and you spring to your feet, still slightly dazed from the lunch. But you soldier on and dive towards her legs, fully intending on taking her to the ground and making her beg for mercy. Diana shoots her legs back and drops her full weight onto your back as you dive, driving you face first into the ground, dazing you again. Before you can react she spins behind you and pulls one of your hands behind your back. The other arm is pinned underneath your body weight and hers.

Using both her hands she begins to wrench your arm up your back and towards your head, putting a tremendous amount of strain on your shoulder. You can feel small pops coming from inside the joint and you hope nothing is being permanently destroyed.

“Ow ow ow stop please!” You call out and Denise stops the ascent of your arm, but keeps it in its already compromised position.

“Are you going to do what I told you?” She asks calmly above you. You hesitate and she wrenches the shoulder further.

“Yes! I’ll do it!” You cry out and she eases the pressure a bit.

“Do what? I want you to say it.” You can hear the smile in her voice.

“I’ll sit down and let you fart in my face.” You say as a tear rolls down your face. It was one thing to have her promoted over you, that wasn’t your direct decision anyway. But she had just physically bested you, leaving absolutely no doubt who the superior being between you two is.

“Good bitch. Now get in position.” She releases you, you don’t even consider a second round with her after how easily she dispatched you already. Instead you crawl to her executive chair and sit at its base, craning your neck back so the back of your head rests on the cushion with your face turned up. Denise fills your vision again, this time it’s her backside. She lifts her skirt up and you have to marvel at how perfect her ass is. If only it wasn’t about to release gas all over you!

“This is going to be awesome!” She remarks before sitting on your face. Her warm cheeks envelop your entire head, you again notice how firm her ass is. And now, as you are about you be as humiliated as you can be by another person, you really wish you’d been nicer to Denise, maybe even tried to date her. That certainly had to have worked out better than this!

Without warning Denise’s ass erupts around you, her cheeks on either side of your head cause an echo effect and her fart reverberates for several seconds. Then the smell hits you, eggy and thick. You writhe underneath her but there’s no escape. She has you completely pinned into the seat. Eventually the smell dissipates but the damage is done. Your biggest rival just farted in your nose, there’s no coming back from this!

"What??" You say out loud, snapping out of your daze. You notice Denise has a look of superiority on her face now, but her surprise seems to be mixed with delight... She is clearly loving this...

You don't believe you meant to shout out 'what' out loud, but you weren't exactly paying attention and now with your little outburst you have the attention of the entire room.

It is now that you notice a new face sitting next to Jim. She is a bit older, but certainly attractive. But that's not the point, the point is that this bitch has taken your Senior Management position...

"Jim, that was my position, you had been planning on giving me the Senior Management position for months! What the fuck are you doing giving it to this bitch???" You say in an outburst.

Everybody in the room looks at you in shock... Denise no longer has a look of surprise on her face, now it is just a look of pure delight...As if she was watching your own self destruction. And let's face it, she may well be! And as for Kim, she has a look of utter disbelief as she watches you abuse the former Senior Manager and insult her simultaneously.

"Rob, this isn't really the time to be discussing this, and I th-"

"-I don't care what you think anymore... Just... I just... You know, whatever, I am still Junior Manager, so whatever..." You interrupt Jim, your anger getting the best of you.

You get up and walk out, unable to believe what has just happened. You walk briskly to your office and you slam the door shut. You sit down and take a deep breath. Ok, this is a pretty bad situation. You lost the Senior Management position to some middle aged red headed bimbo, you sweared at and abused that same bimbo, Denise is hell bent on making you kiss her feet and become her slave and on top of all of this, you abused the one man who could have possibly helped your situation a bit... Your thoughts are interrupted by a knock on your office door....
