And not just any food either the foot of your most hated rival. You whimper a bit which causes her to laugh.

"You think this is bad Rob? I haven't even gotten my feet really smelly yet. This isn't anywhere near as bad as they can be."

The concept of her foot being even worse was nauseating but you soon stopped caring about that as she lifted her foot off of your face and than slammed it down hard. The heel of her foot slammed right into your mouth and split your lip. She didn't care about that thought as she proceeded to grind her foot painfully into your face.

Even then she wasn't satisfied. She pushed up with her other foot and then balanced on your face like a ballerina. While she wasn't fat by any means the fact that all of her weight was concentrated on your face made it very painful. You let out another pathetic cry which causes her to laugh which then makes her wobble. That causes her to slide off your face most painfully to you.

"Stupid jerk you made me trip."

She made you pay for it with a vicious stomp to your solar plexus that knocked the wind out of you.

"I love how helpless you are right now. I've wanted to do this to you for four years Rob. You have no idea the amount of pent up anger I have for you. But I think you're going to learn..."

Someone had to come by soon... she couldn't just beat you up in the workplace! Surely someone would come in and help you.... right?
1213233.title: It's useless, lay there and accept your fat...

choices: Your friend Jenny - the receptionist!
Jacinta - the blonde who has a crush on you!
Someone else...
12132332.content: It could be anyone; whoever it is you pray that they will resue you from this dire situation. Who enters the room at this point?
12132332.title: Who Shows Up?

choices: She lets you two leave.
She tries to broker a deal with Jacinta.
121323322.content:
Jacinta had heard something and walked in seeing you laying on the ground hurt while Denise was standing over you.

"What the hell is going on in here? Oh my God what are you doing to him?"

Denise whirled around. "I was defending myself, he tried to attack me!"

"You're a liar you're the one hurting him, get away from him you bitch!"

You were thanking your lucky stars! You were saved. Now you somewhat regretted never returning her feelings for you - she was certainly loyal to you.

Denise looked uneasy for a moment and then said, "No he did attack me. And who would believe a woman would attack a man? Seriously Jacinta if you know what is good for you, turn around and leave."

"I will not. I'm getting Rob out of here first."

Denise looked pissed - what was she going to do?
121323322.title: Jacinta - the blonde who has a crush on you!

choices: Resign. As ordered.
Take your chances with the police.
Run away!
121323323.content:
Denise is really beginning to lay into you, connecting the hard toes of her heels into whatever exposed soft spot she can find. Her assault is so rapid that you can’t even spare a breath to beg for mercy, as if she had any for you! You’d never been beaten like this, not even in a schoolboy fight or a drunken tussle at the bar. Amidst the chaos you hear an amazing sound, the click of the doorknob and the creak of the hinges as it swings inward. The assault instantly stops and you look up through tear streaked eyes to see your savior.

It’s Helena! The attractive in her own way, hard working, probably illegal immigrant janitor who certainly wasn’t fond of you. That didn’t matter though, she had walked in on a serious crime! Not only was she your messiah, she was your witness and key to getting out of this!

“Oh thank God!” You wail and throw yourself towards her, landing on the carpet at her feet as she recoils from your battered and bloody visage. You reach a hand towards her calf “Please...”

“Miss Denise what is going on here?” Helena asks, clearly in shock about what she saw. You turn to look at Denise who actually looks slightly nervous. Perhaps she understood the optics, she could claim self defense but your clumsy attacks hadn’t even grazed her, and you most likely needed to go to the hospital.

“This...bastard tried to assault me. He was in such a rage over the promotion situation that he lost it! Luckily I’ve been training in martial arts for decades and he was no match for me!” She finished.

“But...it looked like you were just beating him. Like a perro...” she trailed off.

“I was Helena, I wanted to teach him a lesson. To never try that shit again. I think he’s learned it now, hasn’t he?” She practically spits at you. You cower away, attempting to put Helena in between you two. You look up at her, prepared to plead for her to save you from this hell but are dealt a crushing slap to the side of the head that knocks you to the ground and leaves your head aching almost instantly.

“Puta de madre! My ex husband used to be just like you.” You can barely move, your body has been brutalized and you almost certainly have a concussion from Helena’s powerful strike. Instinctively you roll over on your back, exposing your soft belly like the beta dog that you are.

“Please...I’m sorry...I’ll do anything...no more!” You beg.

Denises’s perfect figure fills your vision as she stands straddling your body, either heel pressed against your side.

“Yes you will do anything, you’re done here! Helena...I’ll let you use this piece of shit whenever you want if you back up my story. You saw him attack me right?”

Helena glares at you. “Si.” Is all she replies with.

“Good, then you have two options shithead. Resign to Kim immediately and go immediately to my apartment, or I file a police report with Helena as my witness and you go to jail. Make your choice.”
121323323.title: Someone else...

choices: Kim Accepts
Kim denies you
Something else
1213233231.content:
You’d been completely checkmated. Now that Denise had someone to back up her story you knew it was a lock that you’d be imprisoned for your “assault”. The only way around this was to try to appease her by resigning and earning back some good will.

“I’ll resign Denise. There’s no need to get the police involved!” You plead from underneath her.

“Shame, the thought of you getting fucked in the ass in prison for the next few years seemed fun too. Very well...you know where Kim’s office is.” She makes a point of stepping on you as she walks back to her desk. “I’m going to text you my apartment address and the door code, I expect you to go there as soon as you’re done.”

You slowly rise to your feet, wincing in pain from the rapidly forming bruises on your body. Your phone buzzes from several incoming texts as you walk to Kim’s office, attempting to keep your head down to hide your split lip and other facial injuries. Kim’s voice calls you in after a knock on her door and she looks shocked to see your extremely disheveled appearance.

“What the hell happened to you?” She asks with an eyebrow raised.

“I fell down the stairs cleaning out my office, I would like to give my immediate resignation.” You’re proud of yourself for the clever lie. Just then her phone rings. Kim answers it without even excusing herself.

“Yes he’s in here...on speaker phone? Sure...” Kim presses the button and you hear Denise’s voice now.

“You hear me alright bitch?” Denise asks. You wince at the insult.

“Yes.” You reply. Kim smirks at your lack of defense.

“Good, change to our arrangement. I want you to get on your knees and beg Kim to let you resign, if you don’t I’m going to give you plenty more bruises.” Your stomach turns cold.

“Wait...you did this to him Denise?” Kim interjects.

“Damn right I did. He threw a tantrum in my office and came after me so I put my skills to use on him.”

“Very impressive. Well...bitch, you heard her. Better get to begging!”

“Let me know if he’s any trouble Kim. For now he’s all yours.” The call disconnects and you’re left standing there dumbfounded. How did these women constantly outmaneuver you? Why did they always seem so hell bent on humiliating you? You would’ve gladly played by Denise’s rules just to get out of this spot, but now she had made it even more difficult for you!

Seeing no other option you walked around the side of Kim’s desk and dropped to your knees. She smirked at your torn and untucked dress shirt, a souvenir from your beating. You had to admit, she was very attractive...maybe that’s why she had gotten the job over you! Unwilling...and unable to look in her eyes, you stared at her ankle high, heeled boots and began your plea.

“Please Kim, I know my behavior has been atrocious and I’m really sorry for that. I’d really appreciate the opportunity to move on from my mistakes here and start fresh somewhere else. I know you don’t care for me so I would be out of your hair too. Pretty please Kim? Just let me go?”

It was an agonizing wait on your knees while Kim twirled her foot in front of you. After what felt like forever she finally acknowledged you.

“Show me.” Was all she responded.

“What do you mean?” You were genuinely confused.

“Show me how badly you want to leave here...without me calling Denise in here to handle you again.” She raised her foot higher this time, twirling the suede boot practically at your eye level.

Understanding what she wanted, and hating her for it...you shelve your pride (more in fear of Denise than anything) and lower your head to her boot. You place a firm kiss on the top of the suede and then pull your lips back, waiting for her approval.

“I have two you know.” She says sternly. She refused to move her other boot from the carpeted floor, forcing you to completely prostrate yourself before her as you placed an even longer kiss on that boot. You decided a show of submission was best in this case and remained face down in the carpet at her feet while she contemplated your behavior.
1213233231.title: Resign. As ordered.

choices: Denise
Helena
Someone else
12132332312.content:
Your face is burning with shame as you lay at the feet of the women who took your promotions feet. In the span of a single day your entire existence has flipped upside down. Finally Kim breaks the silence.

“I’ve decided...NOT to accept your resignation.” You try to spring to your feet but Kim’s heeled boot slams into the back of your head, driving you face first into the floor. You struggle against her as both of her feet now press you into the ground.

How are these women so much stronger than you? Are you really just that weak?

“Instead I am going to create a new position for you. You will be the new office gopher, below everyone who works here. You’ll have to take a corresponding pay cut of course, but if you don’t accept I will corroborate Denise’s story of your attempted assault and the next job you get will be stamping license plates. Is that understood?”

WHY?!?! You want to rage aloud. You simply wanted out of this hell, but these bitches won’t let you go! But what choice did you have? You have been completely outflanked and now pressed into a corner.

“Yes Kim.” Is all you can muster in reply.

“I thought you’d see it my way. But you don’t refer to me by my name anymore, I’m clearly your superior after all. As such you will call me Master. You will refer to the other women in the office as Miss, Ma’am, or whatever else they desire.”

This was too much, but there was nothing you could do but try to accept it. If these two middle aged women had you so easily cowed imagine what the hardened criminals in jail would do to you!

“Yes Master.” You replied, her laughter greeting you.

“Good bitch. Now do what you did before, but take my shoes off. I like the feeling of a conquered rival kissing my feet.” The smugness of the statement practically hung in the air.

Had she done this before? Or was she referring to you kissing her boots earlier? Either way you had to comply, so you gently slid the boots off her feet and studied her feet for a minute, you had a feeling you were going to become very familiar with them. All things considered they were nice feet, you weren’t a foot guy but she certainly had a pair that would attract those types.

“Don’t make me tell you things twice.” She said coldly, while slapping your cheek with her bare sole. You place your lips on the tops of her warm feet, noticing the slight odor coming off of them and feeling the thin film of buildup from being inside her shoes. “This is the life.” She says as she slides her other foot in front of your face and you greet that one with a kiss. “Up now, time to re-introduce you to your former co-workers.”

You rise to your feet dejectedly, not looking forward to this fresh humiliation but following Kim out into the bullpen of cubicles where the all-female office spends their days.

“Attention everyone, I have an announcement to make!” You stand with your head bowed in shame, like a child awaiting punishment as Denise exits her office with a curious look on her face. The rest of the office turns to look at the two of you, including Helena who leans her mop against the wall.

“Rob has agreed to accept a reduced role here in the office instead of me firing him for his behavior earlier. He will now be the office gopher, anything that any of you require he will do immediately. Consider him the lowest member of our totem pole. If there are any issues with his behavior or willingness to comply with tasks, please let myself or Denise know. She is particularly adept at putting him in his place. He has also agreed to take a 75% pay cut as befits his new role, so if you have any odd jobs that need to be done on the weekends I suggest you take advantage. That’s all!” She turns on her heel and in a second has returned to her office leaving you feeling very much like a prey animal as the rest of the women in the office eye you.

Who pounces first?
12132332312.title: Kim denies you

choices: Become the office footwipe
Alone time with Denise
Something else
121323323121.content:
There’s a din of noise as you notice one of the wastebaskets tip over. Papers, energy drink cans, food wrappers, and the various other debris of an office trash can scatter all over the floor.

Denise gives you a mocking look and simply says “Oops.” The rest of the assembled women all giggle and chatter. “Go ahead and take care of that for me, office bitch.”

The rest of the women howl as you scramble around the ground on your hands and knees cleaning up their waste. You can’t decide if you’re more angry or ashamed by what you’re being forced to do, but your cheeks burn as you complete your task. As you attempt to rise you are met by Denise’s firm hand.

“Stay.” Is all she commands. One of the other women makes a laughing comment about her ordering you about like a dog. “Well he is our office bitch, so he’s basically a female dog.” Denise’s audience laughs again. “Roll over, bitch.” You obey, knowing the consequences of rebellion. “That’s a good boy!” She remarks and then walks next to you. “Does the good boy want a belly rub?”

Before you can respond Denise slips her foot out of her heel and begins rubbing it all over your stomach and chest. The women are besides themselves, but the mood in the room takes a dark turn when Denise moves up and begins wiping her bare foot all over your upturned face. You feel tears well in your eyes and a knot of fear develop in your stomach as the crowd begins to see just how far this can get pushed...
121323323121.title: Denise

choices: Run to Kims office
Still frozen in shock
12133.content:
"Well well well Rob your in trouble now". She says with a huge smirk on her face.

"Get out of my office Candice"

"Sorry can't, I was sent here by our new boss Kim" she says smirking even more. "You see after you and stormed out everyone left except me Denise and Kim. We wanted to give her some advice on how to handle this problem especially after Jim told her to fix this by any means necessary and we came to a nice conclusion," she says gigling.

"So what I'm fired then is that it?"

"No that means you get you pay for a few months and have a nice chance to look for another job, we can't have that. However if you quit or don't follow your bosses orders and get let go for that reason you get nothing."

You just stand there frozen, if you were let go or quit then you would lose your house and pretty much be screwed.

"Ohh yeah which reminds me why I'm here, Kim wants you in her office on all fours ready to follow any order she gives and she does not want to hear a single sound from you. And she said if you would not be there within 5 minutes you would be in for hell, which leaves you 30 seconds to get there," she says walking out the door her giggling turning into full laughter.
12133.title: It is Candice, the bitch receptionist... She co...

choices: Michelle - The new girl with a superiority complex
Jacinta - The woman with a crush on you
Denise - Your arch nemesis
122.content:
You've been working at this office for three years, and although life is repetitive and somewhat mundane, you're rather content with your job. However, little did you know that everything was about to change.

You had originally been working under a different manager. When you were hired, Jacinta already worked in the office. Unfortunately, the woman hired alongside you (Denise) hated you upon first sight, and you hated her too. You immediately made friends with Jacinta, to avoid Denise turning her against you too, since the she had already convinced Candice the receptionist and Helena the janitor that you were the scum of the earth.

Unfortunately, Jacinta had developed a bit of a crush on you, and while you did not feel the same, you were still friendly with her. Jacinta and the other receptionist, Jenny, we're your only female friends in the office. Most people working there were men anyway. That was until your new manager came in a week ago.

Kim - she had been transferred from another branch of the company, and when she arrived, she had fired half of the office, and you were the only man that remained.

Kim had hired several more people, all women, and you had befriended some of them, but you hadn't really got to know any of them. It didn't help that most of them were friends with Denise, but a few of them knew that she hated you, and we're a little sympathetic to you.

You arrived at work on Monday morning, and we're greeted by Jenny at the reception at her desk.

"Good morning Rob!" Jenny chirped, smiling at you sweetly.

"Morning Jenny." You smiled back at her. You didn't have a crush on her or anything, but you couldn't deny that she was rather cute, and had a nice smile.

You made your way to your desk, where you ran into Kim. You internally rolled your eyes, as she looked up at you from the tablet in he hands.

"Ah Rob. I'd like to talk to you about some rearrangements I've made to the office." Kim told you, placing her tablet in her bag, and pushing her glasses up.

"What do you mean?" You ask her, trying to hide the annoyance in your voice.

"The old office layout wasn't productive, so I've decided to rearrange where everyone's desk is." Kim explained.

"Wait, so who's sat near me?" You ask her.
122.title: Established worker!

choices: You confront Denise directly
You go straight to your boss, Kim
1223.content:
"I decided to put you and Denise near each other. The friendly competition you two have with each other keeps you both super productive and I'm sure the proximity will stoke those fires even more."

You've gotta be kidding me! You think. You and Denise might hate each other but at least you got to stay a comfortable distance apart before. Now you'd have to see her all day long.

"Okay sounds good Kim. I'm sure it'll keep things more productive." You've got to count on Denise acting out and you appearing to be the more rational out of the two of you.

"I'm glad you see it that way. Remember, friendly competition is good for business. And what's good for business is good for your career." She winks at you and walks away.

"Friendly competition my ass." You mutter as you walk to find your new desk. You notice Denise first and then surmise your desk is the empty one to the right of it. It's hard not to notice Denise, personal feelings aside she is a knock out and you've rubbed one out fantasizing about grudge fucking her over her desk more than once.

She notices you walking over and you see her eyes roll. Deciding against a friendly greeting you place your company issued laptop on the desk and sit down in your chair. You're shocked when the back of the chair breaks off and you topple backwards. Denise let's out an intentionally loud "Ha!" as you crash to the ground and several other people snicker as you scramble back to your feet.

"What the hell is this? Where's my old chair?!"

"Don't know Bobby, must've gotten lost in the shuffle during the move." Denise replies.

"Don't call me Bobby. Hey! Isn't that my old chair!" You point at the one Denise is sitting in.

"This one? No I'm certain it's not." You can tell by her tone that she's lying. She must've switched chairs before you got to the office. But you can't prove it and don't want to seem like a whiner to Kim.

It's your turn to roll your eyes and you turn to your desk. The chair is ruined, there's no way you'll be able to sit in it but you've got several reports that need to be done immediately. You decide to work standing up and power up your laptop.

Unfortunately you decided to break in some new shoes today and they are killing your feet after a few hours. You drop to both knees to give your feet a rest and continue typing away. After a few minutes Denise's voice enters your ears. "Kneeling eh? That's a good spot for you."

You ignore her remark and return your attention to your work. You are determined to turn this situation to your advantage.

A few minutes later "Hey Bobby, how do you like my Jimmy Choo's? Bought them with last months bonus check. $1,000."

You turn to look at them. You have to admit they look well crafted but that's about it. You never notice what a woman has on her feet.

"Yeah well mine was twice that. Maybe because I don't spend my day making wise cracks and worrying about whatever you've got on your stinky, gross feet."

"Oh Bobby that's not nice. I've got nice feet. How about a foot massage? You're at the perfect height. Make it a good one and I'll let you keep giving them to me when I get promoted."

"Absolutely not. I'm not sure what you're confused about here but feet are absolutely disgusting. I wouldn't touch a super models feet, let alone your hooves."

With that you get up to go to the bathroom and get away from your rival for a few minutes.

However, Denise will get the last laugh. Due to the sensitive nature of some of the clients your office deals with it is policy that you either close your laptop completely or lock it to the password screen to keep data secure. Denise's pestering caused you to lose focus and you forgot to do this. She wastes little time and quickly jumps behind your desk. She opens your e-mail application which is linked uniquely to your login credentials and begins typing away.

Denise,
I know there's been tension between us for some time. But I think I know how we could alleviate it. Let's go out for a drink after work tonight and then head back to my place. I eat pussy like a lesbian and I can fuck for hours. I think once we get some of this aggression out of the way it'll be better for everyone.
Rob

Denise sends it to her own email account from yours and then leaves the sent message open on your desktop. Just as you leave the bathroom she sits back at her desk with a big smile on her face. You sit down and read with horror as you realize that you've made a potentially monumental mistake.
1223.title: Denise - Your arch nemesis

choices: Helena, the janitor who hates you.
Jacinta, the women who has a crush on you
12231.content:
You take a deep breath and weigh your options. Failing to lock your work station is a fireable offense and if you go to Kim with this she might see it that way too. But if Denise shows anyone that email you'll get fired and lose the best reference on your resume. No one in the industry would hire you if they thought you were stupid enough to send an email like that! You decide to tackle to issue head on and appeal to Denise's sensibilities. You turn around and she is wearing an absolute Cheshire Cat smile.

"Interesting email you sent Bobby."

"Denise, I don't know what you have planned but you don't need to do this."

"I don't know what you're talking about Bobby. As a matter of fact I'm having a hard time hearing you. Why don't you come closer."

You shuffle your feet around the side of her desk so you're standing right next to her. She swims your old computer desk so she is fully facing you.

"No that won't do. You're too tall for me to hear up there. Best if you kneel down like you were over at your desk." She smiles wickedly.

You hesitate.

"Or I could just print this email and see who pulls it off the communal printer first?"

Checkmate. You sink to one knee in front of her, leaving your other leg out so it almost appears that you are stretching.

"Both knees Bobby."

Her voice is cold and you know you need to keep her happy so you oblige. A few odd looks are cast in your direction as your office mates notice you kneeling in front of your biggest rival but you try not to pay attention to them.

"What do you want Denise?" You figure being direct is your best approach.

"What I want is your obedience. We both know what I could do to you with this email. You'd be fired and ruined in the industry, I'd make sure it got as public as possible. But now that I've got this at my disposal, I'll settle for having you as a loyal servant. Someone to watch my back and be at my beck and call as I move up the ladder. The only promotions you'll be getting from now on are ones that I give you."

You kneel there in stunned silence. She was so evil! So conniving! But she was also so...RIGHT! With just a few clicks of a mouse she had placed you fully at her mercy. The promotion you were certain you'd get over her was a dream now. You were shaken out of your stupor by a jab from her heel to your knee. You glared up at her.

"But for now, I'll settle for a soy bean latte with a double shot of espresso. I'm going to start timing you, if you aren't back in ten minutes I bring this email to Kim and you're out of work."

You kneel there with your jaw open, the Starbucks was down five flights of stairs and across the lobby. You'd have to sprint the whole way and hope there wasn't a line.

"Clocks ticking." She said with a smile.

You jump to your feet and begin sprinting across the office floor, narrowly missing several collisions with your coworkers. You barge down the stairs and across the lobby figuring you're making good time. You get to the Starbucks and notice there is one person in line in front of you.
12231.title: You confront Denise directly

choices: Denise is waiting at her desk
Denise is talking to her best friend, Candice
122311.content:
As you enter the cafe you notice it's Helena in line. Staring at the menu. Helena is the building janitor and due to Denise's efforts and a couple of honest mistakes made by you she absolutely despises you. At first you tried to mend fences but in recent months have taken to insulting her when she comes after you.

Shit, you think. Oh well, running short on time.

"Umm Helena, I'm in a really big rush and have to get this drink for somebody. Can I please go in front of you?" You ask as politely as you can.

She looks at your sweaty face and notes your heavy breathing "No."

"Please, Helene! I know we haven't always gotten along but this is really important. Look...I'll buy whatever you want and give you $20. Just please let me go ahead of you."

"Hmmmmm..." she taps her "Croc" clad feet on the ground as she considers your proposal.

"No." And she returns to perusing the menu.

"Oh for fucks sake!" You exclaim and brush past her. You approach the barista, a college aged black woman and she glares at you.

"Uh uh Mister. She was here first."

"She's still figuring out what she wants!"

The barista glares back at you without a word. Sensing you are running short on time you turn to face Helene and realize drastic measures must be taken. You drop to your knees in front of her and clasp your hands in front of you. "Please Helena, I'm begging you!"

"Oh my God this is too good!" Laughs the barista behind you, and you hear the click of the camera sound off several times on her phone.

"Oh fine. But make it $50, now get up...you're making a scene."

"Thank you!" You jump to your feet and order the latte for Denise. Too embarrassed to look at the chocolate skinned barista. She hands it to you and you take off running back to the office as you hear the barista say "Now what's your number so I can send these to you?" To Helena.

Well fuck, what's another humiliation at the feet of a woman who hates me today right?

You reach your floor and begin searching for Denise.
122311.title: Helena, the janitor who hates you.

choices: Work for Denise (your rival)
Work for Helena (the janitor who hates you)
12232.content:
Not wanting to surrender control of the situation you decide to bring this matter directly to Kim. She'll probably be disappointed in you for failing to lock your workstation but you have an exemplary record at the company and you doubt she'd fire you for your first offense. Six months from now this will be a thing of the past. You don't even turn to look at Denise, instead you quickly lock your computer and walk straight to Kim's office. Just as you open the door Denise rushes in past you with a piece of paper in her hand. Your jaw drops as the door slams fractions of an inch from your nose and you hear the click of the lock.

For a moment you consider grabbing the door but realize that would just leave you looking foolish. Instead you straighten your tie, turn around, and walk back to your desk. You begin the process of returning to your work but you can't focus, the thought of what's being said in that office is killing you. And what is on that piece of paper? Surely she printed out the email to show Kim. You're done!

What feels like ten years was probably only ten minutes but your heart jumps into your throat when you see Kim's door open and your boss step out of it. "Robert, my office." She says sternly. Sheepishly you weave through the desks while the whole office looks at you quizzically.

You enter the office and close the door behind you. You notice Denise sitting there with a smug look on her face, not wanting to appear too forward you remain standing as Kim appears to be re-reading the email. Finally after what feels like an eternity she looks up at you.

"I'm disappointed in you Robert. Things like this are why I replaced most of the males with female employees when I came on. We can't have so many people running around thinking with the wrong head."

You remain silent, taking your dressing down like a man while Denise practically radiates next to you.

"This is very serious, thankfully Denise hasn't pushed this to HR yet. She said she'd prefer to handle it in house. For that I'm grateful, I don't need my bosses asking why my employees think this is appropriate behavior. I think you owe her a word of thanks for that kindness."

"Look, Kim...I know how bad this looks but I didn't send that email. I went to the bathroom and forgot to lock my computer. I've never done it before and I'll never do it again. But Denise sent that to herself to make me look bad!"

"Oh for fucks sake Robert! Listen to yourself! That sounds ridiculous! Who in their right mind would do something like that? You're digging a deeper hole for yourself here."

You stand there in stunned silence. It did sound ridiculous when you actually verbalized it. No matter how true it was.

"To think you were the front runner for the supervisor spot. You haven't left me with many options here."

"Just don't fire me, look I can make this right!" You don't like the begging tone in your voice but now is not the time for your ego to get in the way.

"I don't think I'm going to fire you. I'm going to give you two options."

"Oh thank you Kim!"

Denise giggles slightly at how pathetic you sound but Kim either didn't hear it or chose to ignore it.

"Denise is getting the supervisor spot."

"Yes!" Denise exclaimed.

"But she's also going to continue working some clients, namely your highest grossing ones. You will keep a skeleton load of clients, take a 20% pay cut, and work directly under Denise as her personal assistant. If after six months Denise feels like you have performed well and you deserve it, you'll regain your old position and pay but Denise will obviously still be your boss. If she gives you a negative review I will fire you personally."

You stand in stunned silence. Denise isn't even bothering to hide the unbridled joy on her face anymore.

"Option two, you keep your same pay and client list but you will work an additional two hours after shift. You will report directly to Helena, our head custodian. If after three months she gives you a positive review you will cease your janitorial duties. Again, if she gives you a negative review you will be fired."

Your mind is spinning...either way you'll be reporting directly to someone who despises you and who will do everything they can to humiliate you. And you'll have to do it or you'll be out of a job!
12232.title: You go straight to your boss, Kim

122322.content:
Not willing to give Denise the final satisfaction of being her personal bitch for the next six months you make your decision.

“I’ll work for Helena for three months.” You say with the enthusiasm of a man headed to the gallows.

Denise glares at you.

“Very well. Denise, get your desk packed up and start moving into the office at the end of the hall. We’ll discuss your new duties and pay later. Robert, stay here.”

Kim walks past you and out into the hallway, Denise lingers for a moment.

“This isn’t over Bobby. By the time I’m through with you, you’ll be begging to be my assistant.”

She leaves the room as well, allowing you a moment to stew in the juices of your decision. You had just volunteered to serve a mid-30s, Latina janitor who already hates you for two hours a day for the next three months. To top it off you’d have to be on your best behavior or else the janitor would get you fired!

After a few gut wrenching moments Kim walks back into the room with Helena and you can tell by the look on the janitors face that she's already been apprised of your punishment.

"I've already filled Helena in on your duties for the next three months Robert and she has agreed to take you on. She will also be judging you and writing a review of your performance every day and providing them to me. If at any time these performances dip in form, I will have no choice but to fire you. Is that understood?"

You can barely stomach that "cat who ate the canary smile" on the Latina's face but you answer. "Yes ma'am. I understand."

"Good, I really hope you can make this work Robert. I'm prepared to let this all be bygones if you can humble yourself here for a bit. Seeing as how the workday is basically over why don't you finish up whatever you have going on from the morning and then report to Helena's office."

"Yes ma'am." You walk with your head held low from Kim's office and make your way to your desk. You secure all your paperwork and laptop and take a deep breath. You're about to start a three month journey into hell but there's nothing you can do but face it head on and hope Helena takes pity on you.

As you walk past Candice's desk she calls out to you "Hey Bobby, make sure I can see my reflection in the surface of my desk tomorrow. I'll make sure Helena tells Kim if you don't."

Ugh...of course Denise would've told her bitch of a best friend already. Your face burns with embarrassment, knowing that the entire office will know your punishment by now, but you stay strong and walk out of the office towards your new, second job. You descend into the basement of the building to Helena's office (basically a cleaning closet) and see that she is standing there, waiting with a huge smile for you.

"Hello asshole. I heard you're my new bitch?"

"Look Helena, I know we haven't always gotten along but can you please not make this any harder than it has to be? I promise I'll work hard for you if you just keep it professional." You can't believe you have resorted to begging a cleaning lady to not refer to you as her "bitch".
122322.title: Work for Helena (the janitor who hates you)

1223222.content:
"I thought you'd be an asshole about this. Good thing Kim gave me her number so I can call her whenever I want to."

Your mind races as she pulls out her cellphone and begins scrolling through her contacts. You stand frozen to the spot as she selects a number and brings the phone up to her ear, looking at you with an emotionless expression. This janitor in her mid 30s was about to put you in the unemployment line. Completely panicked you realize that it's time for drastic measures and you drop to your knees in front of her.

Helena appears shocked but a smile creeps across her face. You hear the faint sound of Kim's voice on the other end of the line and decide to ratchet it up another notch. Keeping eye contact with her you clasp your hands together and softly mumble "Pleaasssseeee...I'm begging you."

Her smile is beaming at this point and she pats you twice on the head like a dog. She obviously is very pleased with the fact that she's reduced you to a kneeling, begging mess already.

"No Miss Kim, everything is fine. He was a little late getting here and I thought he was going to blow me off but he walked in just as I called you. He says he got lost coming here."

A silence as she listens to whatever Kim is saying on the other end.

"For sure Miss Kim, I'll keep him on a tight leash and make sure his properly humbles him. Have a good night."

She presses the screen to end the call and then points the phone towards your grovelling form. Before you can react you realize she has already taken several pictures of you kneeling at her feet.

"Now you see who is in charge, si gringo?"

"Yes Helena."

"No, from now on you call me Senora Helena as a sign of respect."

What's another humiliation today? "Yes Senora Helena" you respond dejectedly. You attempt to rise from your knees but a firm hand from Helena keeps you in your submissive position.

"No, I like you better down there."

She rolls her hand me down office chair over in front of you and sits down in it. One Croc-clad foot crossed over the other one dangling at about your nipple level.

"So I think we will set a routine. I usually work a few hours later than you fancy pants in the offices do and then I get on the bus to go home. I work 12 hours a day, every day and it is hard. So you will make my life easy."

Her strong accent clouds some of her words and you wonder if this woman is even in the country legally, let alone a high school graduate. But here she was, lecturing you while you knelt in front of her like an obedient dog.

"To start, I think you will rub my feet at the start of your shift everyday. I am on them all day and I've never had a foot rub before. Mexican men are too macho for that, but not you bitch white boys."

With that she peels her the Croc on her top foot off using your shirt and wiggles her visibly sweaty foot in your face.

12232221.content:
You can’t believe how quickly your life has changed. At this time yesterday you were driving home after another successful days work, day dreaming about your inevitable promotion. To most people at the office it felt more like a coronation, after all...you’d been the top dog there for years. Now here you were, just 24 hours later. Kneeling on a basement floor with an uneducated Hispanic janitor wiggling her feet in your face. Remembering that this women held your entire future in her hands you took a deep breath and tried to find your happy place.

She began to cackle as soon as you grabbed her foot and started kneading at her slightly slick soles. You’d never given anyone a foot massage before so you just guess at it and whenever she seems to enjoy something, you do more of it. She lounges back with a huge smile plastered on her face and her eyes half closed. You can’t help but notice that she is actually kindle attractive, in an “every woman” type of way.

Some 20 minutes later, you’re pulled away from your thoughts as she retracts the first foot and thrusts the other one into your hands. She didn’t even bother to take her Croc off this time, deciding that’s a task you’re better suited to. Begrudgingly you pull the footwear off and place it on the ground. You begin working on her foot in the same way you did the previous one when suddenly she plops the already massaged foot down on your shoulder.

“Helena what the fu...” she cuts you off with a few taps on the lips with the sole of her stinky foot.

“Shhhhh...gringo. Don’t make me call Miss Kim.” She purrs at you.

She has you dead to rights and you know it so you just focus on the task at hand and try to block the smell of her foot right next to your face out of your mind.

“Good gringo bitch.” She says and strokes your cheek with her big toe.

Your cheeks burn with shame and anger but you just keep massaging her calloused and ill maintained feet. After another twenty minutes she pulls that foot from your hands and rests it on your opposite shoulder. Your knees are really starting to ache now and you find yourself actually hoping she’ll have you do some cleaning now so you can stretch your legs!

122322211.content:
“Alright gringo bitch. Put my Crocs back on and get to work.” You quickly comply. “I already got most of the floor done but I HATE cleaning the bathrooms. So that’s what I have a gringo bitch for now.”

More anger runs through you. Now you’ve been demoted to toilet cleaner!

“The mop bucket and cleaning supplies are in the closet in between the bathrooms. I’ll be up in a few minutes to supervise your work.”

Supervised...by a janitor! The indignity of it all! You quickly rise to your feet and turn to walk away when you suddenly come crashing back down to the floor. Helena tripped you! You wheel around on your knees prepared to say fuck it all and say what’s on your mind. As you turn, she kicks you sharply in the face, sending you flying onto your back. In a flash she is standing over you, pinning you to the ground with her foot.

“I said call me Senora Helena didn’t I?” She growls at you.

Shit! You had forgotten! Too stunned (and a little afraid) to say something back you merely nod your head and mumble “Yes, Senora Helena.”

“Damn right gringo bitch! Now get to work!” She steps off you roughly and you drag all the necessary supplies to the elevator shaft.
“No no no gringo bitch, elevators are for masters...slaves use the stairs.” She points down the hallway.

It shocks you that you don’t even feel that angry at the trivial condition she set, you simply feel resigned to it. Another half hour later and you’re in the women’s bathroom of the office your formally ruled over. Realizing that you’re getting close to your two hour window you rush through the job, having already finished the men’s room. You can’t believe the stains and trash all over the multiple stalls. But you sweep and mop the floors and use the brush to clean the inside of each toilet. Just as the clock signals your two hours are up Helena walks in through the door.

She does a brief walk through of the bathroom and then walks up to you, she grabs you roughly by the ear and begins pulling you around the bathroom by it where she points out the five things you missed. Eventually she stops berating you and releases your ear. You immediately begin rubbing the side of your head...she was strong! You suppose years of manual labor would do that.

“Now I have to sit here and watch you! Get moving stupid gringo!” She punctuates that with a sharp slap to the back of your head.

Another slip further down the ladder, not only has she insulted you non stop and made you massage her feet, now she’s physically abusing you! You shake off yet another blow to your ego and set upon your tasks with renewed vigor. There’s a light at the end of the tunnel to this hellish day now. Twenty minutes (and way over your allotted two hours) later and you are done. The last task was to restock the toilet paper in two of the stalls. You turn towards your tormentor from your knees and notice that she’s watching you intently.

“Senora Helena...” you mutter weakly.

“Yes I see your done gringo bitch. Do I look dumb to you? I don’t think so. You’re done for today. Bring these supplies downstairs, I’m taking the elevator, I’ll meet you there.” She turns quickly and exits. You clumsily carry all the supplies down the many flights of stairs and see her waiting outside her “office” with her purse and a lunch bag. She’s staring a hole in you, and you start to worry.

122322212.content:
“So now I’m going to tell you how your time with me will work.”

You gulp nervously and don’t dare to move, fully aware that she is still using you as a living, breathing, ottoman.

“Every day you will clean exactly what I tell you to clean for about two hours. If you do what you’re told, when you’re told to, and without whining...I’ll tell Kim you did a good job. But until then, you are 100% my bitch.”

She stares at you, you feel so much shame kneeling in front of this minimum wage worker while she rests the lowest part of her body on you that you start to think that maybe you are her bitch. You can’t even hold eye contact with her, you just drop your gaze to the floor...where her feet should be instead of resting on your shoulders. There’s a silence in the air for a few minutes, and then she lifts your chin up using the top of her foot so you have to look at her.

“I want to hear you say that you’re my bitch. Admit to it.” She says coldly while staring right into your soul.

You gulp again and then respond, knowing that playing this game for a mere three months will get you back on the right path.

“I am your bitch Senora Helena.” You say, your gaze immediately dropping to the floor again while the Latina laughs and claps her hands above you.

“Damn right you are gringo! Now would you like to know what you’ll be cleaning today?” She says with a wicked smile.

You shrug your shoulders, unsure of how to answer.

“I’ve decided that today...you’re going to clean my feet with your tongue!”

Your jaw drops, did you just hear her correctly?

Your spirit is already so broken. But it still almost shocks you that you kneel there without resistance as Helena inserts her big toe into your mouth.

“Suck.” She orders.

You immediately comply and begin to swirl your tongue around her toe while bobbing your head back and forth.

“Fuck...” she gasps as she falls back into her chair. She looks to be nearly orgasmic. “Do all of them.” She commands.

One by one you take her toes into your mouth treating each one like a lollipop. They taste like dirt and sweat and all to often you collect something from in between her toes that’s of a cheesy consistency. You simply swallow it, knowing you don’t have the opportunity to spit it out and sensing that would upset Helena. Once you finish sucking her little toe she switches feet and you repeat the routine on the other foot, delicately sucking each of her toes.

“On your back gringo bitch.” She orders.

You immediately flop to your back under her, slightly disappointed in how quickly you are obeying these outrageous demands. There’s no time to think as one of her feet descends on your face and rests there.

“Make the bottoms clean.” Are the only instructions you are given.

Unsure of how to proceed you just begin licking her sweaty feet. Long, wide, wet licks from her rough heels to her yellowed balls of her feet. Sometimes you’ll find a tougher spot and focus on that in an almost French kissing motion. This goes on for what feels like forever, your back is sore from laying on the concrete and your tongue is dry. Eventually she pulls her feet away and just says “Kneel.”

You quickly scramble to your knees and don’t even dare look her in her face. This woman just made you lick every inch of the bottoms of her stinky, sweaty, callused feet. How could you look her in the eye.

12232221221.content:
"You gringo bitch, you are my property now...mine to command. Si?" She leans forwards and grabs your chin so that you are forced to look her square in the face.

"Yes...Senora..." Your cheek stings as the Latina slaps you hard across it. "Wh-what...?"

"Si...not your bullshit 'yes'; say 'Si, Señora Helena', you bitch!" She thunders at you, her hand still outstretched.

"Si...Senora...Helena!" You yelp up at her, genuinely frightened of this woman. You're not sure what's worse - the slap across the face or the fact that you have to look in the eye the woman who you've been forced to lick the bare soles of.

She nods and smiles. "Better, white boy." Leaning back , she raises up one foot and hovers it over your face. Gulping you're forced to stare at one of the feet you've just been licking clean, your own saliva dripping off it. The stench is still strong, like blue cheese and vinegar mixed together.

"My feet are soft and clean, correct?" She barks at you.

You hesitate for too long as she slams her foot down, making you groan in pain. "Answer me gringo!"

"Er, your feet are soft and clean...Senora Helena!" You yelp up at her, feeling helpless. You also feel your nose aching from her kick to your face.

"You're gonna do this everyday, bitch. As soon as you've finished you're stupid work, you're gonna come here, get on your knees and lick my feet clean. Got it?" She smirks down at you, clearly loving lording this power over you.

"Ye...Si, Senora Helena," You correct yourself just in time.

"Then, when my feet are nice and clean, then you can do some more cleaning. Of the entire office! As I'm in a good mood, I'm gonna show you how to do it. From tomorrow you'll be doing it all on your own while I stay here and relax. Got it gringo?"

"Si, Senora Helena," you say meekly. For the next couple of hours, Helena shows you all of the equipment, how to use it, where to clean - including desks, floors, the kitchen, toilets....everything! You're so desperate to avoid any more humiliation at her hands (and feet) that you listen attentively and do your duties diligently. She's actually impressed by the time you're through.

"Si! You're natural cleaner! Your hands for cleaning the office, your tongue for cleaning my feet!" She cackles while you keep your eyes on the ground. Realising you're at Candice's desk, you remember the receptionist teasing you about how clean she wanted her desk to be.

Finally, Helena dismisses you, not before forcing you to kiss the tops of her feet before departing.

"What you have to say?" She says down ominously at you. "Don't I get a thank you?"

Groaning internally and hating the fact that you have to go along with this, you suck it up. "Th-thank you, Senora Helena for letting me lick your feet. And for showing me to clean. Thank you."

She laughs. "You are a pathetic gringo bitch boy. But you know your place. Now get the hell out of my office." Quickly turning away, you drop face down on the spot of carpet that she was just standing on. Not wasting another second, you swiftly get out of there, not daring to turn around in case the Latina janitor decides to humiliate you even more!

By the time you get home, you're exhausted - mentally and physically. Entering a deep sleep, you have horrible nightmares about Helena where she's forcing you to lick her nasty feet, suck on dirty toes...you wake up in a cold sweat. How long can you keep this up for?! One evening in, out of three months, and you're already struggling like hell.

Getting ready for work and arriving at the office, you consider your options. Can you really go an entire three months of Helena abusing you, or - grudging as the acceptance of it may be - is it better to be Denise's assistant instead.

"Oh, good morning Robert!" Kim calls to you as you walk by her office. "Come in for a sec."

You do so, tossing over the idea of sticking with Helena or switching to Denise.

"Can I just say thank you for my sparkling desk - I've never seen it so shiny!" She smiles at you, though it seems like more of a smirk. "What is it Robert, everything OK?"

What do you tell her?

122322212211.content:
"It's...it's..." You say awkwardly, still contemplating whether it's better to stick with Helena...

Kim stares at you shrewdly. "What is it, Robert? I asked you if everything's OK. How's it going with Helena?"

"It's...fine," you tell her finally, swallowing thickly. "It's...all good with Helena."

"Great! Well, enjoy your day - and the hours afterwards of course!" She smiles again before turning away from you. Ignoring this dismissive remark, you head over to your workstation, where Denise is already sitting and looking smug.

"There he is! The world's greatest cleaner!" Denise says with a smirk, admiring her desk. "I don't think my desk has every been so well polished! I can even see my reflection in it!"

"Look," you begin before you suddenly have the visual of Helena's sweaty, nasty feet in your face. Your pause goes on for far too long.

Denise snickers. "Wow, well that was...pathetic! Maybe being the janitor's assistant will teach you a lesson in humility! Maybe it will show you that I'm simply better than you!"

You collect yourself. "Listen, bitch, you and I both know that I never sent that email. You've screwed me over and I am going to get revenge on you. It may not happen today or tomorrow, but trust me - I will get you for what you've done to me."

"Yeah, whatever," the blonde says, her eyes narrowing at you. "The only thing that's important is that you're the cleaning guy! I know it, Candice knows it...EVERYONE knows it!"

You burn red with anger and embarrassment, but decide not to say anything else. Denise may be right - licking Helena's dirty, stinky feet clean was certainly a humbling experience. Yet you will never forget her nasty little prank - at some point you will do something so terrible to her that she'll be begging you for forgiveness!

"So, there's a chance of a big promotion coming up. Kim says I've got a good chance! She told me how impressed she was with how I handled your misogynistic, disrespectful behaviour," she says causally while typing on her keyboard.

Still ignoring her, you keep one ear open. The idea of her getting promoted ahead of you makes your stomach feel sick.

Footsteps suddenly come towards you...who is it?

"Rob! How's it going? Didn't get a chance to talk to you yesterday!" Jenny, your receptionist friend appears next to you and leans against a cupboard.

"Oh, hey Jenny," you smile, feeling relieved that it's her instead of Candice - Denise's pal. "All good, you?"

You make small talk for a little bit while Denise scowls. "Can you take this conversation somewhere else? Some of us are trying to work!"

Jenny stares at her, raising one eyebrow. "Anyway, Rob. I do have some work to do. See you after work for a coffee? 5:30?"

"Er, actually no I can't, I...I'm busy," you say, feeling embarrassed at the thought of being Helena's cleaning assistant. Denise snorts and rolls her eyes.

"What's that?" Jenny says, sounding a little impatient with your nemesis. "Something to say?"

Denise smirks as she looks between the two of you, while you silently wish for her not to tell. "Don't you know? Rob's got a new after-work job! He's the janitor's assistant!"

"Yeah, right," Jenny replies sarcastically. "Rob, it's fine if you're busy - I'll see you another-"

"Are you really as stupid as you look? Listen to me...Rob is a CLEANER! See for yourself after work if you don't believe me!"

"Hey, don't call me stupid!" Jenny fumes, looking across at you for support but you're still wincing from the fact that Denise has just spilled the means. Giving you one more exasperated look before storming away, you sigh with relief as Jenny departs, though feel guilty that you didn't stick up for her.

Denise snickers. "Don't worry - like I said Rob, EVERYONE will know that you're the janitor's bitch..."

Shuddering, you again remember the smell and taste of Helena's bare feet. How could you do that...lick that cleaner's feet clean...?

The rest of the day passes fairly uneventfully. You don't see Jenny again, which is probably for the best as you'd really rather not have her question you about what Denise said, if she registered it at all, that is - she was upset and stung by your blonde nemesis's sharp words after all. Candice is unbearably smug when she comes over to chat to Denise and make cheap remarks about your new, additional after-hours job. Managing to avoid pretty much everyone else, you make it to 5:30 and head straight down to the basement, to Helena's 'office'.

As you walk down the steps, you see that Helena is already sat down, legs stretched out so her bare feet are propped up on a box. Knowing how easily she overpowered you yesterday, do you get it over with and lick her feet clean - like she instructed you - or do you decide to put her back in her place. She is only a janitor after all...!

"So what Denise said about you being a cleaner...what does that mean?" She looks perplexed as she looks between you and Helena, the janitor having her headphones back on has not noticed anything yet.
