Just remember that you have to do everything that Helena tells you - I know it's unfair, but that's how it is, I guess."

Your heart sinks. It was the advice you were hoping not to hear but you know deep down is the most realistic. "You're right..." You sigh. Smiling at your friend, you try your luck. "Don't suppose you wanna help me clean the office each evening...?"

Jenny raises an eyebrow. "Don't push it! I've helped you out this time but tomorrow you're on your own. I don't wanna be dragged into this and risk my career too!" It's a fair point, so you thank Jenny again and say your goodbyes before you check the time. You're actually slightly early - deciding that this will please Helena, you head back down to the basement and see her in the same position as before.

"Gringo! You're done? And there's time to spare...? Let me see..." She gives you a suspicious look as she hops to her feet and storms past you, inspecting the office for herself. Several minutes later, she gives you an approving look. "Good job - for a white boy bitch anyway. As you finish early, you can lick my feet for a little longer..."

Trying not to show her how dejected you are by this turn of events, you merely nod and utter 'Si, Senora Helena,' before following her to Kim's office - of all places. The Latina plops her bare feet on Kim's sparking clean desk, pointing at her feet, as if you needed any more instructions. Closing your eyes and hoping to get the ordeal over with, you do what you've become accustomed to when around the janitor: lick her feet. This time, they're a little softer and nowhere near as dirty. So the experience is still gross, but a lot less disgusting than before.

"I am the boss!" Helena chuckles, looking through some of the things in Kim's desk and tapping her toes appreciatively. "Well, I'm your boss, right bitch?"

"Si...Senora....Helena," You mumble in between mouthfuls of feet. Another quarter of an hour later, and Helena is satisfied. Allowing you to go home, you try but fail to get rid of the taste of her stinky feet from your mouth. Making a mental note of bringing some chewing gum and mouthwash to work, you head home and pretty much as before, collapse into bed and fall asleep within moments.

The next day at work is a little trickier than the previous one. Denise has let slip to pretty much everyone that you've had to get an extra job after hours as the janitor's assistant. Rumours begin circling that you're funding a drug habit, or have an illegitimate child that you're having to pay support for. Jenny tries futilely to defend you, but it doesn't help much. Denise, your nemesis, is insufferably smug and gleeful when people make comments about your cleaning, like 'Missed a spot, Rob!'

Kim summons you into her office, looking rather displeased with you. "Rob, there's something we need to talk about..."

What does the boss want with you?
1223222122111111.title: Keep your head down and get on with it!

choices: She accepts - you can be her assistant!
She rejects - she'd rather you stayed as Helena's assistant!
122322212212.content:
"It's, er, the thing is..." You start, finding it hard to express yourself clearly.

Kim looks a little impatient while she leans back on her chair. "Come on, just spit it out. Helena was impressed by your work by the way - she said she already feels lighter on her feet!"

Trying to ignore the image of Helena's gross feet, you press on. "It's that...OK, I want to be Denise's assistant instead."

She stares at you in surprise. "Really? Well, that's a u-turn from yesterday. Why?"

Realising that she wouldn't believe the truth about Helena - that she forced you to lick her feet clean, slapped you and kicked you in the face - you decide that you take a different tact. "Well, cleaning the office and working under Helena taught me some humility. I realise that my email was...wrong. It was out of order."

"Go on," you boss replies, observing you shrewdly.

"So, er, I want to make it up to Denise. I want to show her respect and prove that I'm not a jerk who thinks with his...you know...I, I want to show to you that I can be her assistant, do a good job and get my good reputation with you back."

"But you chose Helena," Kim says, frowning. "She's not going to be impressed with your change of heart. I'm sorry, Robert, but you made your choice and that's what you will need to fulfil for the next three months."

Feeling desperate, you decide to go all out and throw yourself at her mercy. "Please, Kim, please! I really want to be Denise's assistant - please just let me!"

Her expression is hard to read. The corners of her mouth twitch as she stands up from behind her desk and walks up to you, her arms folded. "I didn't know you had it in you - to beg and plead like that. But you know..." She taps her chin thoughtfully. "It's not me who you should be begging. Tell you what, if you beg Denise to take you and she accepts then fine - you can be her assistant. BUT, you also need to apologise to Helena - she was expecting your help for three entire months! So, I think another 10% of your pay should be cut to compensate for her troubles. Sound fair to you?"

You feel numb. 30% salary down for 6 months, and that's if Denise agrees to you being her assistant! Knowing that you don't have a choice, you nod weakly, while Kim makes a couple of calls. A minute later, Denise arrives, looking smug. Moments later, Helena comes in, looking triumphant as she gives you a gleeful smile.

"Ladies, thank you for coming in. Now, Helena first I'd like to thank you. However you had Robert working yesterday, it's certainly worked wonders! He seems to genuinely have learned a lesson in humility - the different is startling!"

"Si, Miss Kim," Helena says affirmatively, her arms folded and nodding. "I will make sure he knows respect in the three months that he helps me!"

"Well, that's the thing... there will be a change in plan," Kim tells her, causing the janitor to look confused. So does Denise as your boss turns to her.

"Denise, thank you again for alerting me to Robert's disgusting email, and for coming in today. He has something to say to you..." Your redhead boss turns to you and nods, signalling your cue.

How mortifying is it to actually beg your nemesis - the woman who has screwed you over and put you in this terrible position?! Yet, it's preferable to being Helena's bitch for another three months...

"Denise, I am so sorry for what I did. It was wrong - I see that now. Yesterday when I was given the choice, I went for Helena because I still felt hostile towards you about the situation, but I was wrong. I should have chosen to be your assistant. Please, please give me the chance to work under you and prove that I'm not a jerk-"

"Hey! You can't just change now!" Helena shouts angrily at you.

"Don't worry, Helena," Kim says soothingly. "There's more to come. Robert, I think it would be better if you got on your knees to address Denise - if you are truly sorry you'll do it, and I'm sure it will help Denise to accept it."

Knowing that it's a necessary evil, you grimace as you get on your knees and stare up at Denise. She has a look of total glee and satisfaction as she watches you throw yourself at her mercy. "Please, Denise, please let me be your assistant. Please - I'm begging you to give me a chance!"

Denise looks from you and the other two ladies before cleaning her throat. What does she decide?
122322212212.title: Denise's assistant after all?

choices: Coffee run for her and all the girls at the office!
Something else...
1223222122121.content:
"Well, it's a difficult one...." Denise milks it for every single second, frowning as she stares down at you. "I mean, that email was so disgusting and misogynistic....plus the fact that you didn't jump at the chance to be my assistant the first time round..."

"You're right! Let him be mine!" Helena calls over, a little desperately. There's fire in her eyes; clearly she wants to keep humiliating you for the next three months!

"Hmmm...you know what, I accept. Rob, you can be my assistant. Kim, I assume that everything's the same as before - that in 6 months time, I decide whether he gets to keep his job or not?" Denise looks positively thrilled, while you hang your head, still on your knees.

"Oh yes, all as before. And Helena..." Kim directly addresses the Latina. "I know this is not what you wanted. It's not your fault that Robert here needs to prove himself to Denise. So, as compensation, you will be getting 10% of his salary from now on."

"Twenty percent!" The janitor fires back, catching you all by surprise. You turn to look at the two women; Helena looks resolute as she stares at the boss. What nerve is must take this janitor to make such a demand!

Taking a breath, Kim addresses her. "That's too much, Helena. You know that 10% of his salary is about half of yours, right?"

Helena presses on, tossing her long black hair out of her eyes. "I know but he has screwed me over..." She gives you a dark look, her hard face looking tougher than ever. "And it is he who should pay."

"OK, fair point," Kim retorts. She turns to you. "Robert, the only way of settling this amicably is if we negotiate. Then everything will be sorted, OK?"

You feel like standing to your feet and pointing out the unfairness of this all - you're already going to be giving 20% of your salary to Denise! Yet, you are so desperate to be rid of Helena...

"Fifteen percent," Kim counteroffers, assuming your consent with your silence.

"Done," Helena replies sticking out her hand and shaking Kim's. Before turning on her heel, she gives you a dirty look which is now combined with smugness.

Left alone with Denise and Kim, you feel partly relieved, partly furious with yourself to be outmanoeuvred by these powerful women. Even the janitor has ended up getting one over you!

"Thank you both. And Robert, remember that Denise is now your judge, jury and executioner. Do everything she tells you and I'm sure in 6 months time, you can return to your former position with your reputation fully restored. Denise, be fair to Robert - it must've taken a lot for him to literally kneel before you, at your mercy," The redhead cleans her glasses before putting them back on, then shakes Denise's and your hands, allowing you stand back up again as she does.

"Thanks Kim!" Denise says cheerily, while you mumble a less enthusiastic one. "Right, my new assistant. Time go get to work!" Your blonde speaks with enthusiasm as you follow her out of Kim's office.

As soon as you're out, she smirks at you, looking positively delirious. "This is the best day ever! I get you to be my office bitch, knowing that you're having to give another chunk of your money to the janitor!"

Deciding to keep quiet, you remember Kim's words - Denise is your judge, jury and executioner...

Leading you to her workstation, you stand before her awaiting orders. "Sooo, what shall we start with...?" Denise plays with her blonde hair, as she considers what to do with you...
1223222122121.title: Denise gets a new assistant!

choices: Screw it - leave out Helena and get the coffee for everyone else
Suck it up, you have to get Helena coffee too!
12232221221211.content:
"Ooh, I know, I want a coffee. Soy bean latte with a double shot of espresso," she states, folding her arms as she stares at you.

"Erm, sure," you reply, meeting her gaze and relieved that it's not anything more embarrassing. If you can get by with making Denise's coffee, doing a few bits of paperwork....maybe the next 6 months will pass quickly!

Before you turn to leave, Denise hands you a notepad and pen.

You give her a look. Had this been twenty four hours ago, you would have been quick to throw her a sarcastic comment or barb. But things have changed. Not only in terms of being her assistant, but your treatment by Helena has genuinely made you less cocky and quick to make a clever remark.

"Soya bean lattee...with a double shot?" You ask her, scribbling down her order.

She smirks. "Yeah, that's my order. You also need to ask Candice..."

Your heart sinks. The idea of fetching coffee for that bitch of a receptionist makes you groan internally, yet you suck it up and nod with affirmation.

"She usually has a skinny caramel frappaccino with a single shot of espresso and extra foam. Plus, you'll need to ask that drip, Jenny, And Kim, obviously. Oh there's a new girl, Michelle - I bet she'd love you to fetch her coffee! Tell you what...get every woman in this office a coffee - that will be your first official job as my assistant!" Denise giggles a little, clearly pleased with herself.

"Every woman?" You say, trying not to sound exasperated.

"Yep! You got a problem with that?" She gives you a challenging look.

Shaking your head, you take the notepad and pen, having made a note of Candice's order. You'll have to get everyone's order...there's no point even asking Denise for money towards this - of course it will be you who will have to pay!"

"Oh, and don't forget Helena! I bet our janitor will love to have a coffee from her former assistant!" Denise cackles as you stop dead and feel a cold shiver go through you. Yet you don't contest it - Denise is your boss now. It could be a hell of a lot worse - licking Helena's calloused, rough, yellowed-in-places soles...yes this is definitely a vast step up!

Taking the order of every woman in the office is not as bad as it sounds; in fact, you are able to come across as a nice guy by doing so! Jenny, the redhead receptionist who is your friend doesn't think much of it, as you've done coffee runs for each other before. You don't bother to ask Candice - it will be bad enough delivering her ridiculously specific coffee to her! Michelle, the very attractive newbie flutters her eyelashes at you as you take down her order of a hazelnut cappuccino with no foam or cream.

"Trying to impress the new girl, right?" She says teasingly, giggling a little as you blush.

"Sure," you smile, playing along. "How's it all going?"

She sighs. "Booor-ing! I can't believe you office guys can put up with this crap! I'm doing all these module thingies...such a waste of time!"

You grin, remembering how you were similarly frustrated when you started at the office. "It'll get better."

"Or, you could do my work for me? I mean, I could let you take me out for a drink if you do...?"

Taken aback, it takes you a couple of seconds to respond. "Oh, er, thanks but...maybe another time." Tempting as it is to take this beautiful brunette for a drink, you decide you have enough on your plate as it is!

The new girl shrugs. "Suit yourself...I'll find some other schmuck to do it for me. Maybe I'll even let him fuck me tonight..."

Impressed and a little shocked by her gall, you say goodbye before moving swiftly on. Michelle is certainly sexy and gorgeous but she's a distraction you can do without. The most grateful for the coffee order is Jacinta, the blonde who apparently has a crush on you. Jenny has gossiped with you over some of the things she's said, how the blonde basically wants to ravish you. So, it's no surprise that she beams at you when you make a note of her order, a modest Americano, no milk.

"Rob, thank you so much," she purrs at you. "Trying to get into my good books?"

You decide not to flirt and make your excuses that you need to be on your way. Jacinta looks a little disappointed, but again, you can't afford distractions! After taking Kim's order, to which she seems pleased about, you have over ten names on your pad. This is gonna be expensive! Just before heading out to the Starbucks down at the lobby, you remember Helena. Denise did instruct you to take the janitor's order, but can you really bring yourself to go down to the basement and embarrass yourself again in front of her. Shuddering again at the thought and taste of her nasty bare feet, you decide what to do...
12232221221211.title: Coffee run for Denise's assistant

choices: Surrender and kiss her feet - best not to piss her off!
Screw it - tell her where to go and make a hasty exit!
122322212212112.content:
Knowing that Denise will probably use you avoiding Helena against you, you reluctantly make your way down to the basement where Helena is sitting, bare feet propped up on a cardboard box. As she's listening to music, she doesn't notice you at first. It takes several calls of her name for her to realise you're there.

"You!" She says with a snarl, narrowing her eyes and folding her arms after taking her headphones out of her ears. "You gringo bitch! You have some nerve coming here after begging Miss Denise to work for her."

Swallowing thickly, you try to ignore her bare feet, remembering the taste, smell and feel of them against your nose and mouth. "I, er, I wanted to see if you'd like a coffee...?"

She tsks at you. "Senora Helena to you, gringo. Don't you forget it. Try that again!"

Even though you technically don't have to, you feel cowed by this aggressive Latina. "Er, Senora Helena...would you like a coffee?"

"I'll tell you what I want. I want you to get down on your knees and kiss my feet like the loser you are," she says with a sneer, clearly enjoying the fact that you referred to her has 'Senora Helena' again. "Kiss my feet, then you can fetch me a coffee."

Your knees wobble for a moment but you find a small amount of pride left in you. "Senora Helena," you say through gritted teeth. "I don't work for you any more. I do respect you though," you add quickly as a look of fury appears on her hard yet pretty face. "That's why I'm offering to get you a coffee."

She stares at you, her bright eyes burning through you so much that you find your gaze shifts downwards, at her feet.

"My feet are sore, gringo. I've been working for two hours already - since before you even got here. Get down on your knees and kiss my feet. Actually, no...I want you to lick the bottoms of them again. Si...that's what I want you to do, bitch."

You feel your nerve shaking...is it wise to refuse this Hispanic thirty something? The way that you degraded yourself in front of her yesterday has left an indelible mark on you...some sort of reverence that makes you feel somehow inferior to her, even though she's beneath you, financially and socially speaking.

"I'm getting tired waiting, white boy. Get down on your knees and lick my feet already. I'm not gonna ask you again..."

Do you surrender yourself to Helena or cling on to the pride you have left and get out of there? You're not her assistant anymore after all...
122322212212112.title: Go see Helena...

choices: Yes, she's angry with how long it took you!
She doesn't seem to care...phew!
1223222122121121.content:
It's a mixture of fear and genuine inferiority that makes you sink weakly to your knees. Helena's expression morphs from one of anger to pure pleasure as you humbly bow down so that you can place your tongue on the bottoms of one bare foot, starting at the heel.

"Good boy," she purrs. "You know where your place is - at the bottom of my feet! It doesn't matter who you work for, does it? Miss Kim, Miss Denise...whoever your boss is, I'M your real boss. Aren't I?"

"Yes...Si...Senora...Helena..." You murmur while sliding your tongue slowly up the janitor's bare sole, grimacing as you absorb the familiar taste of her cheddary, sour feet. Part of you can't believe you're doing this - the whole point of being Denise's assistant was to avoid situations like this ever again! Yet here you are, licking Helena's feet like a dog, while she makes fun of you.

"You white boys are all the same. Mexican men - they're too macho, too tough to do this. Every white guy - he knows his place. White men I've been with - they're like putty in my hands. I usually get bored of them....but not you. I don't think I could EVER get bored of this!" She cackles, tapping her toes against your forehead, while you lick up and down her sole, absorbing all of the grime, sweat and dirt from it.

"You know, my daughter - she's now eighteen - her father is a white boy. Not that sees him - bastard fucked off years ago. She'll be happy that I'm taking fifteen percent of your earnings. AND I can still make you lick my feet! You are such a loser, gringo!" Helena is attractive, there's no doubt about that. The fact that she has a daughter actually makes you feel a pang of sympathy towards her; it can't be easy being a single mother on a janitor's wage.

"My daughter, she gonna have a good life. She won't need losers like you licking her feet. No, she gonna go to college, so that fifteen percent of your wages, that gonna help, si." She leans back slightly on her chair, forcing you to arch forwards with your neck so that you wince a little.

After licking one of her feet thoroughly, she clicks at the other so you can do the same. Dutifully, you service her other sole, getting so used to the flavour that it doesn't seem like such an ordeal. In fact, maybe it's your imagination but Helena's soles seem softer and less calloused than yesterday. The Latina janitor seems to be thinking the same thing.

"My feet feel so good...so refreshed! You're a pro, foot licker! Si, this feels so goooood!" She sighs, almost orgasmically. "Let's make a deal...I tell no one in the office that you've come down here to lick my feet, and you agree to do it every day. Same time every day, while I'm having my break. Twenty minutes a day. You got that, gringo?"

You nod weakly, knowing you can't deny her. Helena has done a number on you - even though you're technically Denise's assistant, you're going to be spending twenty minutes a day licking the bare feet of the janitor who clearly despises you. What a win-win situation for Helena...taking a cut of your pay AND the sensation of having you lick her feet every day - the latter obviously separate to Kim's arrangement!

"OK, now you can get me coffee. Double espresso. Now get out before you piss anyone else off!" She pushes her feet forward, knocking you back so you lose your balance and fall flat on your back. Helena chuckles at this, shaking her head at what a loser you are before getting some cleaning equipment to resume her duties.

Feeling humbled and disgusted with yourself, you keep your head down as you quickly depart, knowing also now that you're way behind schedule. It takes a good fifteen minutes to queue, order then wait for the coffee to be made - fifteen orders in total! One of the girls from Starbucks, a cute girl with short, pink hair, kindly offers to help you up with a coffee. Between the two of you, you just about manage to carry the drinks up.

First of all, you rush to Denise...she's your priority after all. Will she be pissed with how long you've taken for your first job as her assistant?
1223222122121121.title: Surrender at Helena's feet!

choices: Give in to Helena - get her another coffee and hope that Denise isn't too angry!
You can't risk pissing Denise off anymore...leave Helena and hope for the best!
12232221221211211.content:
"What the hell took you so long?" Denise barks at you, a furious look on her face. "Nearly an hour to do a coffee run...you're kidding me!"

"Sorry, Denise...sorry...there was such a big queue..." You look behind you but the pink-haired girl from Starbucks has already departed, clearly not wanting to stay to hear a telling off. "I tried my best!"

Staring at you and shaking her head in disgust, Denise is clearly not impressed. "If this is your best, then it's clearly not good enough! Maybe I should just tell Kim now that you're a hopeless case and should be fired now!"

"No...no, please Denise!" You gulp, feeling panic swirl inside you. "It-it's a one-off. Just give me a chance to make it up to you!"

She considers you. "We'll see. First of all, drop off these coffees - the other women must be annoyed with you too. Now get out of my sight."

You murmur a quiet 'yes Denise' to yourself. Not impressed with this, Denise stops you and smirks. "No, no, no. From now on, you'll address me properly. 'Yes boss' is what you'll say to me - that's the least you can do for being a useless assistant! You got that?"

"Yes, boss," you say quietly, hating the fact that Denise has free reign to say and do anything she wants as your superior. Had this been a day ago, it would be unthinkable to imagine you calling Denise 'boss'! She knows it to, as she continues to smirk before allowing you to scurry away.

The reactions you get from the other women are mixed. Candice is delighted, partly because you are delivering her coffee and also as she had no idea how long it took you. She fixes you with a grin before inspecting the frappaccino. Making you wait an age until she smells it, tastes a bit, checks the contents thoroughly before leaning back on her chair, sipping with satisfaction, then dismissing you. Your friend, Jenny, is concerned why it took you so long, and is shocked by how much coffee you are delivering, but you don't have time to chat.

Kim barely acknowledges you as you place her coffee on a coaster, while she talks on the phone. On the other hand, Jacinta practically licks her lips as you hand her the coffee, her fingers brushing against yours as she receives it.

"Oooh, Rob.... I could get used to this...!" She winks and chews her lips as she stares at you. Hurrying away, you don't even stop to talk to Michelle, the gorgeous new girl, who seems disappointed that she doesn't have the opportunity to flirt with you. After doing all of the other rounds, with reactions ranging from annoyance that you took so long to gratitude that you made them a coffee, you are left with one. Helena's double espresso, which is now cold.

Heading down to the basement, you feel relieved to see she's not there. Leaving the coffee on a makeshift table, you quickly depart, pleased at last to have some good luck. You can now prove to Denise that you're going to do a good job as her assistant and earn your job back...eventually!

As you make your way back upstairs, you see Helena in the corner of your eye.

"Hey...where's my coffee?" She calls over to you, unabashed that she's causing a few coworkers to look over.

"It's down in your...room," you reply, not sure of what else you can all the basement.

"Bring it up here," she orders you, hands on hips and giving you an expectant look.

Feeling your cheeks redden, you ignore the sniggers from your colleagues as you head back down to get Helena her double espresso. When you hand it to her she pulls a face.

"What the hell is this? It's cold!" She tsks at you after spitting out the coffee on the floor. "Get me another."

You can't believe she is speaking to you in front of other colleagues like this! Clenching your teeth, you walk towards her so that your conversation is more private.

"Senora Helena," you whisper. "Please don't make me...I have to get back to Denise..."

"Double espresso. Now!" She gives you a firm, resolute look. Clearly not going back down, you think about who it's better to keep in the good graces of - Helena or Denise...
12232221221211211.title: Yes, she's angry with how long it took you!

choices: Make up an excuse and apologise to them both!
Tell the truth! It may be the only way to save your job...
122322212212112111.content:
"Si, Senora Helena..." You tell the Hispanic janitor weakly. Ignoring the sniggers from other coworkers, you head back down to the Starbucks and do as you're bid.

Helena is simply too formidable, too strong to refuse. Every act of submission to her makes you feel more and more inferior that the idea of refusing her becomes increasingly unlikely. She smirks as you dutifully bring up her double espresso, still waiting in the same spot.

"Bring it back down to my office, gringo," she tells you with authority, strolling away while you follow her meekly. Again 'office' is an overstatement for a basement with some boxes and cleaning equipment. Once again, you kneel before your conqueror, holding out her coffee to her as though she's a queen.

"I am your boss," she states down to you, a satisfied expression on her face.

"Si, Senora Helena...I am your bitch," you say humbly, as she takes the coffee off you and finishes it in one gulp, smacking her lips appreciatively.

"You will lick my feet again, then you will beg Miss Denise to forgive you for being such a late, gringo bitch!" She chuckles as she kicks off her crocs, resting them on a box in front of you. "Lick!"

You gulp as you stick your tongue out and begin to race it along the Latina's cheddary-flavoured soles, a taste that's becoming all too familiar for you. As you lap up and down, like a puppy dog you realise that Helena has broken you. The fact that you are not even thinking of putting up a fight means that she truly owns you. You've never been attracted by feet but there is something strangely comforting and alluring in serving this Latina woman. She is hot, despite her social standing and aggressiveness. Maybe in the past you teased her because you actually had lustful feelings for her. While you continue to lick up and down, you feel your pants begin to tighten a little, causing a small whimper of defeat to escape your lips.

Luckily, Helena is too occupied on the phone to notice this. "Hahaha, si! This gringo is now my bitch! He's licking my feet clean - again! He's such a loser that he's too scared to say no! He knows that I own his ass!" She says, chuckling to whoever she's talking to. "Yeah, no problem!" She puts her phone on speaker and holds it over to you. "Hey gringo, tell my daughter, Gabriella, that you're my bitch!"

"I'm...your mother's...bitch, Gabriella," you say weakly, finding that the humiliation makes your pants tighten even more.

"Oh my God! You are such a loser! Licking my Mom's feet and admitting that you're her bitch!" Giggles Helena's teenage daughter down the phone to you. "Say it again, say it again!"

"I'm your Mom's bitch, Gabriella..." You whimper, blushing with the sounds of raucous laughter from both the janitor and her eighteen year old daughter.

Helena looks down at you with disdain, still with her daughter on speaker. "You foot licking gringo bitch! You don't talk to her no more. You are a piece of dirt compared to my Gabriella. She's going to college, gonna get a good education and get a good job to make me proud, aren't you baby?"

"Yes, Mom," says the teenager respectfully. The women says their goodbyes and Helena puts the phone down, staring at you with a mixture of contempt and triumph.

"Now," she says kicking you away so you fall flat on your back. Quickly you roll to your side to disguise the slight boner you have. "Now, you can crawl back to Miss Denise and apologise for being late like the bitch you are!"

You do so, thanking her and scurrying away. As you race towards Denise's workstation, your heart sinks when you see Kim is standing there next to your nemesis, now boss.

"Well, Rob, what do you have to say for yourself?" Kim says, raising her eyebrows while Denise continues to stand next to her and smirk...
122322212212112111.title: Give in to Helena - get her another coffee and ...

choices: Get on your knees and rub her feet!
Another coffee run...!
1223222122121121111.content:
"I'm sorry, really sorry," you babble at the two women. "I, er, I lost track of time. Won't happen again..."
