"Gringo...! Lick my feet, you pathetic little bitch!" She roars at you as you sprint away from her and out of the basement. Her cries becoming fainter, you're out of the building in record time. On the drive home, you keep picturing Helena's slimy, filthy bare soles and can't help but shudder.

What the hell were you thinking? How could you ever be attracted to feet?!

Something about Helena's forceful personality, along with the fact that her feet were genuinely getting cleaner and softer every time you licked them are the most logical explanations. Having never been remotely interested in feet - quite the contrary - you feel actually relieved that you're not even slightly attracted to them anymore!

That night, you have feet-less dreams, thank God! However, you can't avoid the fact that you've undoubtedly pissed off a strong, vengeful Hispanic janitor... In the morning, the first thing on your mind is how are you going to deal with this problem? On the one hand, you owe Helena nothing; on Kim's orders, you work for Denise, not the Latina. Still, Helena has become accustomed to your submissive behaviour towards her...it's unlikely that she would accept you quietly slipping away from what she expects from you. And what she expects is you kneeling before her and licking her feet!

Shuddering again at the thought, disgusted with yourself that you ever enjoyed her nasty feet, you arrive at work - a little earlier than usual. Knowing that you'll be forced to rub Denise's stinky feet, act as her footrest, along with anything she else she decides to subject you to, this is surely the best time to deal with the Helena problem. See her now before your assistant duties to Denise start? Or is it best to avoid the forceful Latina altogether?
122322212212112111111112122.title: You can't bring yourself to do it - run away!

choices: Stick to your guns - call her bluff and leave her to it!
She's won! You can't risk her telling Kim...drop to your knees and be her bitch!
1223222122121121111111121221.content:
A renewed sense of vigour in your step, you decide to confront Helena head on. Every time you picture her disgusting, dirty feet, you feel ever clearer about your decision - you will NOT lick her feet ever again!

When you enter her 'office', you steel yourself to do what must be done. "Helena," you begin, clearing your throat as she slowly pulls off her headphones and glares at you. "I just wanted to clear the air..."

"It's Senora Helena, you stupid gringo bitch! Now get down on your knees and take my crocs off," she tells you firmly, still glaring at you.

"No...and I won't be calling you 'Senora', or doing anything with your feet from now on," you reply, feeling a sense of defiance burn in you. You're right - why the hell should you! When you were her assistant, at her every whim and mercy then you had no choice. Not anymore! The fact that you were briefly turned on by her feet was a one off, an anomaly. Yep, you may be Denise's reluctant work bitch, but no one else's! Well maybe Candice's too to be fair!

She continues to stare at you, eyes narrowed with a scowl on her tough face. "White boy, you listen to me," she says through gritted teeth. "You are my bitch. You licked my feet like a dog. You told me that you liked licking my feet...you love my feet!"

"No, I don't," you counter. "I only licked your feet because I was afraid of you. I said that I liked it as that's what I thought you wanted me to say. No offence, Helena, but we're done here. No hard feelings, right?" You stick out a hand, trying to be as respectful yet firm as possible.

"No hard feelings?!" She spits on your hand and slaps it away. "You think I'm gonna let you off so easy! Ha!"

"Helena, listen-"

"No, YOU listen, you son of a bitch! You are my property, whether you like it or not. Either get down on your knees and plead like the white boy bitch you are to lick my feet again...to say how sorry you are for running out on me yesterday...AND for pretending you didn't like my feet! Or...OR, I will tell Miss Kim some very interesting things..." She smirks, for the first time since seeing her this morning, looking something other than furious.

"What!" You cry out in surprise, not expecting this turn of events. "Helena, look - all I want is to draw a line under it all and move on..."

Your words trail away as Helena shakes her head and points to her crocs. "I've given you a choice, foot bitch. Now are you gonna kneel like the loser you are, or force me to tell Kim all about your dirty little arrangement with me."

"She won't believe you," you say quietly.

"HA! My word against yours, gringo. So - you made up your mind yet? I gotta get to work soon and I'm tired of waiting for your white boy ass to make his choice..."
1223222122121121111111121221.title: Confront Helena head on - explain that you will...

choices: Pick up Helena her coffee too!
Don't get Helena a coffee - just avoid her!
122322212212112112.content:
Deciding that upsetting Helena rather than Denise is the lesser of two evils, you babble something incoherent to the Latina and scurry back toward your new boss. On your way to Denise, you try to shake away the thought of what Helena will do to you....it's something you simply have to forget about for now!

Breathlessly, you arrive back at Denise's workstation, sucking some oxygen into your lungs while the blonde stares coldly at you.

"You seriously need to get better at being my assistant. If you don't then it's bye bye for you!" She says, sneering at you while you clutch onto your ribs, feeling them hurt a little with how much you are deeply breathing in air.

"Sorry, boss," you mumble, feeling useless.

Denise continues to stare at you, as though thinking what to do with you next. "To think, we were rivals - equals until yesterday, Now look at you, the office coffee boy and my devoted assistant. One word from me to Kim and your ass gets fired. You know that, right?" She brushes some of her dirty blonde hair out of her eyes.

"Yes, boss," you say quietly.

"So, you should be doing EVERYTHING you can to please me! If this is your idea of saving your job and staying in this company, then you're an idiot. Six months of being my bitch, then you can get back to your old job But six months is a long time - I'm gonna make the most of it, don't you worry!" She seems to smug, so self-satisfied that normally you would be thinking of a way to take her down a peg or two. But you don't. In the past 24 hours you've been so humbled by Denise, Helena and Kim that your confidence is gone and you don't have the nerve to do anything other than obey!

"OK," she says, apparently satisfied for now that she's put you in your place. "I'm gonna give you out a list of jobs that you need to do as my assistant. Get a pen and paper..." As you scribble down her instructions, you gulp at the sheer amount of work she expects you to do,,

"So, a coffee for me and all of the women in the office - like you did, but quicker. That should take you fifteen minutes. Not an hour! Got that?"

"Yes, boss."

"Then I want you to refile and organise all of my folders and papers. There are over twenty folders in the cupboard behind me, with over a thousand pieces of paperwork. I want them alphabetised, per year, and with a poly pocket and label for each document," she continues, looking pleased with herself.

"Yes, boss," you murmur, making a note of it all.

"All the old files - not just mine but some of my colleagues too - they need shredding. Then there's the tax forms, and the new contract reports..."

Denise reels off a huge list of jobs, which seem to be endless. You shudder when she mentions things like walking her dog, polishing her shoes - as well as Candice's, taking her clothes to the dry cleaners, collecting them, booking her nail and salon appointments...by the time she's finished, you have over twenty jobs on your list!

For the rest of the day, you try your best to carry out the various tasks she's set you, while avoiding Helena at the same time. By 3pm, you've knocked off a few items from the list - some will be ongoing for weeks anyway. After Denise tells you to fetch her another coffee - the usual soya bean latte with a double shot of espresso, you think about the Latina cleaner. Maybe you should make it up to her by getting her coffee now...it may not be too late to make amends! If you don't, she could exact out some nasty form of revenge on you. Then again, is it best just to ignore her?
122322212212112112.title: You can't risk pissing Denise off anymore.....

choices: Michelle - the newbie! She wants you to take her out for a drink!
Jacinta - the girl who has a crush on you! What does she want?
Someone else...
1223222122121121122.content:
It'd best to avoid Helena, you tell yourself. Fortunately, you are able to for the rest of the day. Resolving to be the best assistant for Denise possible, you put the Latina janitor out your mind and get steadily more efficient. Even Denise cannot find much fault in your work, which doesn't stop her in ordering you around and taking great pleasure in it.

Finally it's the end of a long day. The worst part was probably when Candice came over to drop off her work shoes in front of you.

"Hey, Rob. I heard that you're a real good shoe polisher! Make 'em nice and shiny for me!" She said with a sneer while you stared at the ground in shame. Polishing both of hers and Denise's work shoes was a humiliating experience, especially as the smell of the insoles reminded you of Helena's cheddary, raunchy bare feet...

Placing them carefully under their respective desks, you stand back in front of Denise, waiting to be dismissed for the day - it is now 5:30 after all!

"Well, at least you're less terrible now," Denise tells you with disdain while you avert your eyes from her gaze. "I've typed up your schedule for tomorrow, and onwards for the next six months. Here it is..."

Reading over it, you feel your heart sink. This is such a specific timetable, it is going to be hard work keeping on top of it all...

Assistant Rob's Daily Tasks and Duties:

8:00 - 8:15 - fetch all women in the Office their coffees

8:15 - 8:30 - drop off Denise's dry cleaning

8:30 - 9:00 - sorting files and paperwork

9:00 - 9:45 - collect Smoochies out for her walk

9:45 - 9:50 - coffee run for Denise and Candice

9:50 - 10:20 - shredding

10:20 - 10:40 - pick up Denise's dry cleaning

10:40 - 11:10 - type up tax forms and legal documents

11:10 - 11:20 - coffee run for Denise and Cand...


You stop reading the rest of the list and try not to sigh out loud. Carrying out these menial tasks five days a week will be humiliating and exhausting! Skimming through the rest of the timetable, you narrow your eyes at the mention of Smoochies (Denise's pet Chihuahua) and polishing your boss' and Candice's shoes at the end of the day...

"Anything to say?" Denise says, her grin as wide as the cheshire cat's.

Shaking your head weakly, you stay behind to tidy and polish Denise's desk for her, while she packs her bag and waves you a cheery goodbye.

Six months, six months...then you can get back to normal! You tell this to yourself...but it doesn't seem very hopeful! One day in and you're already shattered. Plus, there's the Helena situation too - you did promise her to service her feet for twenty minutes a day... Too tired to think about it any more, you finish sorting out Denise's desk before treading your way towards the exit of the building.

"Rob!" You hear a voice call behind you. Who is it?
1223222122121121122.title: Don't get Helena a coffee - just avoid her!

choices: Don't tell her anything and move the conversation along to someone else!
Confide in Michelle...
12232221221211211221.content:
"Rob...it is Rob, right?" A familiar voice fills your ears as you turn around.

It takes you a moment to recognise her - it's the new girl - Michelle! "Oh, hey...good first day?"

"Ya, ya," she says yawning. "Wanna take me out for a drink?"

Taken aback with her directness, you blink in surprise and feel flattered. Remembering how much she was flirting with you before, when you took her coffee order, you start to think a bit more cynically. What does this cute brunette want with you? She seems to read your facial expression as she grins and bites her lip.

"Look, I know it's a little forward, but I don't bullshit. If I want something, I'll just do it. I need to get the inside goss on the people here. It's not easy you know - being totally new to a place like this. You know everyone, right? You were getting everyone coffees earlier! So, how's about it - you and I find a bar to go to, so you can fill me in on everything?" She stares at you confidently.

Clearly, this girl is used to getting what she wants. The fact that she is upfront with why she wants a drink is commendable, yet you can't quell your suspicions about her intentions. "So...you just want some gossip. On everyone at the office...that's why you want a drink?"

She giggles. "Well, you never know..." She walks closer to you and whispers in your ear. "Tell me everything I need to know and I may even reward you..."

It's all a bit too much for you. Before you know it, you're nodding and agreeing to buy her a drink while she squeals happily and walks out of the office with you. The newbie has no qualms in instructing you to drive, and quickly googles a bar that's only a few minutes drive away.

"Double vodka martini," she says as you arrive at the bar. Despite knowing that she's using you for information, you can't help but feel excited about taking out a hot, young girl for a drink. Ordering yourself a coke, you take the drinks over to the table where she's sitting at.

"Sooo," she begins after taking a sip from her drink. "Tell me about everyone. Start with that boss, Kim. What's her deal?"

You begin telling the gorgeous brunette about Kim, finding yourself spilling the beans on what you know about her, along with the other coworkers that Michelle mentions the name of.

"What about that blonde...Delores...Denise?" She says, finishing her drink and gesturing at the barman to bring another.

"Er, she's...she's...OK," you tell her awkwardly, You can't badmouth Denise - your direct boss.

She giggles. "Oooh, hit a nerve! What is it, Rob? Failed office romance? Did she dump you!"

"No!" You say indignant, louder than you meant to.

Not put off, Michelle keeps pushing. "Aw, you got a crush on her? I mean, she is good looking - in a bit of a cold, hard bitch kinda way. "You want me to put in good word for you?"

Feeling a little desperate, you don't want Michelle to get the wrong idea about your once-nemesis, now boss. Is it best to be nonchalant about her, or do you decide to confide in her the truth - that you're Denise's assistant? Maybe the new girl could be a useful new ally...
12232221221211211221.title: A drink with the newbie!

choices: No one notices.
Someone notices!
Readers choice
12232221221211211223.content:
Your blood turns cold as you hear a familiar voice behind you.

“Disrespectful piece of gringo shit!”

Before you can react your vision turns white from a hellacious open handed slap that lands just behind your ear. You stumble around to face your attacker and are met with an explosion of pain as Helena’s foot crashes into your balls. You crumble into a shaking heap in the hallway at her feet.

“Don’t think you need to get me a drink?!” She roars at you while she continues delivering kicks into your fetal body. The pain in your balls blocks out the pain from the further kicks but you know you’ll definitely be sore tomorrow. Eventually she runs out of steam above you and stands over you while you sob from the vicious attack. “Pathetic white boy.” She snarls and then spits directly into your face.

She sneers at you for a minute while you compose yourself and then breaks the silence. “Get up puto, you still owe me 20 minutes and a coffee.”

Somehow you find the strength to drag yourself to your feet. While there was no one left in the office, if you went to the coffee shop you’d surely cause a scene. Your clothes were torn, there was blood leaking from some of your wounds, and your face was swollen. Almost reading your mind Helena speaks.

“We aren’t going here, no. You’ll walk me closer to my house. There’s a Colombian place I like there. Walk behind me, like Japanese woman...and keep your eyes on the ground.” She says with a smirk.

You do so the whole 15 blocks to the coffee shop. Helena gives you her order and sits in a back booth, luckily the place isn’t too packed. The barista is a chubby (but somewhat pretty) 20 year old who doesn’t speak a lick of English. You manage to get Helena’s fairly simple order off and shake your head in embarrassment when the girl indicates that she would like to know what you want.

You return to Helena with the coffee and stand there, unsure of how to proceed.

“What are you waiting for gringo? Twenty minutes.” She stares a hole in you.

You look around in a panic, there’s only a few other customers in the shop and they are all at the front of the store.

“Do it, or I’ll beat you again and make you do it anyway.”

Knowing what she says is true you cram yourself under the booth, praying that you are hidden enough so as not to draw attention. Your face wrinkles as you remove her work sneakers and the smell of her wet socks hit you. You quickly peel those off and begin the now familiar task of cleaning Helena’s sweaty, dirty, janitor feet. You begin at her heels, swirling your tongue around the rough skin surrounding them until the taste of sweat is gone. You continue working up her feet as she sighs in contentment above you.

It’s got to be getting close to twenty minutes...can you escape this unnoticed?
12232221221211211223.title: Someone else...

choices: Now you can fetch her coffee!
She wants some blackmail material!
1223222122121122.content:
Suddenly finding some of your previous swagger, you glare at her. "You're not gonna ask me again? Good! I'll be off then!"

Turning on your heel, you feel a slither of pride restored. This janitor can't order you around anymore!

"Gringo!" She spits at you, jumping to her feet. "You get back here now!"

"See you, Helena. Oh...hang on I forgot to say 'Senora'... Oh yeah, I don't give a shit!" You say with a smirk, walking up the stairs and feeling pleased that you've put the janitor back in her place.

A stinging pain to the back of your head makes you yelp out. Dropping down to your knees, you stumble back down the stairs, clutching the sudden blow from Helena.

"What the...why...?" You cry up at her, your eyes widening with fear as she stands over you, hands on hips.

"You're my bitch!" She says down, a smile now adorning her hard yet pretty features. "Say it!"

"Screw you..." You mutter, placing your hands on the ground to push yourself up. The Latina woman uses a bare foot to place down firmly on your chest, pinning you to the floor.

"Screw me...ha! You need to learn another lesson, gringo..." With an evil glint in her eye, Helena lifts her foot from your chest and pushes it hard on your throat.

Immediately you begin to splutter and choke under her bare foot. "Please...please..get off!" You gurgle up at her.

"Ah, pathetic white boy now begging me? That's more like it...now address me properly, bitch!"

"Please....Senora...Helena...please!" You whimper, starting to feel groggy and in desperate need of oxygen. Clearly, getting cocky and turning your back to her was a terrible mistake.

"Hmmm...only if you tell me that you're my bitch! And that I own your gringo ass!" Helena says with a nasty chuckle, clamping her toes around the side of your neck.

"I'm your...bitch...Senora Helena! You own...my ass!" You whine pathetically, feeling darkness start to descend...is she going to render you unconscious?

Mercifully, the Hispanic woman lets off and moves her foot away, allowing you to suck in huge gulps of oxygen. Placing a hand around your throat, you control your breathing so it becomes less raspy.

"Now...now you will lick the bottom of my feet..." Helena smirks as she dangles a bare sole over your face. The dirty imprint of it makes you shudder but you know when you're beaten. Placing your tongue on her rough, hard heel, you weakly lift it upwards, absorbing the dirt and grime from her foot, along with the cheddary, sour flavour. Tears springing to your eyes with the intense, acrid taste, you do as you're told and lick all the way up to her toes. Repeating the action, Helena nods and snorts, clearly pleased with herself.

"You will lick the bottoms of my foot EVERY time I tell you to. Got that, gringo bitch?"

"Yes, Senora Helena," you say meekly, feeling utterly cowed by this powerful woman. You hate the taste of her raunchy foot but continue to lick it up down, as well as the other one once she swaps feet. Trying not to imagine where she's been walking around barefoot, you grimace and hope that the ordeal will be over with soon. Another ten or so minutes later, she places her foot back down and smirks at you. What's next?
1223222122121122.title: Screw it - tell her where to go and make a hast...

choices: Go ahead and clean - just get it done!
Wait for Helena - don't risk pissing her off!
1223222122122.content:
A cold, hard look in her eyes, Denise shakes her head. "No."

"What?!" You cry up at her, taken by complete surprise. The fact that you've just got down on your knees and begged your nemesis to be her assistant of all things...surely she'd just accept!

"You heard me - I said no," she says simply, regarding you with disdain before turning to Kim. "Sorry, Kim, but the fact that this misogynistic pervert had the nerve to choose being Helena's assistant over me in the first place tells me everything I need to know. He had the chance to make it up to me and he blew it. That's how it is!"

Your redhead boss looks between the two of you then shrugs her shoulders. "Fair enough, Denise. Robert has behaved despicably and he did make his choice. So that's that - I apologise Helena for wasting your time but there will be no need to make any changes in our, ahem, arrangement after all."

"You're gonna regret that, gringo..." Helena mouths directly at you. The other two women either can't tell or choose to ignore her words. The Latina cleaner addresses Kim. "I see this man - he really has no respect. I will teach him to respect women...to make amends for what he's done!"

Denise smirks at you before leaving the office, leaving you alone with the other two. Kim studies you. "Robert, I have to say...I am impressed! Actually getting on your knees and being prepared to beg and grovel - that's a quality I like in people! However, you have to make it up to Helena her - she'd understandably upset that you would renege on your deal. So, do a good job over the next three months and, assuming there are no problems, you'll come out of this a better employee, and person - I'm sure."

With a wave of her hand, both you and the Mexican janitor depart. Sensing her staring daggers at you as you exit Kim's office, Helena is clearly pissed. "I'm gonna make you pay, bitch..." She whispers in your ear before skulking away from you.

Returning to your desk, you try to ignore the smug, superior expression on Denise's face. "Did you really think I would let you be my assistant, considering you chose being the janitor's skivvy instead? Ha, even making you my office bitch isn't a patch on knowing that you're scrubbing every desk, toilet and floor clean here!"

Before you can retort, she pulls a sympathetic face. "Aw, you did such a good job getting on your knees and begging me like a little doggy!" She pouts at you.

"Go to Hell," you snarl at her. "I bet you're loving every moment of this."

She stares at you confidently. "Anything else to say, janitor boy? Anything that I can pass on to Kim...?"

Realising that you have to suck it up, keep calm and ignore her, you focus instead on your work. The day passes fairly quietly at first, but by the afternoon - thanks to Denise - everyone has heard about your new 'extra job'. Taking all of the barbs, smart remarks and insults, you know it's best not to react and give Denise any satisfaction in knowing that it's got to you.

Keeping yourself to yourself, you avoid your friend, Jenny along anyone else at the office. Finally, 5:30 comes around, which makes a sense of dread reside in the pit of your belly. Helena is not going to go easy on you... When you arrive at the basement in her 'office', you see that she's not there. Do you go ahead with the cleaning or wait for her to arrive, in case she has any specific instructions for you?
1223222122122.title: Rejected by Denise!

choices: Do it - lick Helena's dirty footprints from the bathroom floor!
Protest - she's gone too far!
12232221221222.content:
Thinking it best to wait, you feel relieved with your decision when Helena appears suddenly a minute or two later, causing you to stumble down the steps.

“You stupid gringo bitch!” She says vehemently, spitting at you. “You don't wanna be my assistant, worthless prick? You wanna serve that Miss Denise instead?"

"Helena, please...I..." Your words crumble away as Helena slaps you hard, making you drop to the ground. Clutching your stinging face, you try to continue but she slams a croc-clad foot down hard on your groin.

Tears springing from your eyes, such is the intense pain, you moan. "Please, please!"

"Please...SENORA HELENA!" She roars at you, seething with rage. She hits you again in the groin, forcing you to wretch around on the floor in agony, whimpering like a wounded animal.

"Please...Senora...Helena..." You gasp, trying your best to ignore the pain that you are in. It feels as though your balls have swelled to balloons, then been squashed!

"I told you...you're gonna pay for trying to get rid of me. You're stuck with me now, gringo. You're gonna wish you'd never tried to swap bosses. I'M your boss! SAY IT!"

"You're...you're my boss...Senora Helena," you say weakly, allowing her to pin her croc on your chest, signifying her victory.

Helena seems satisfied with your quick and easy capitulation. Ordering you to remove each of her crocs, she stands over you, resting one bare sole over your face.

"Lick the bottom of my foot clean! You did such a good job yesterday, bitch! You're tongue's gonna know the bottom of my feet real well for the next three months! HA!" She orders you, smiling evilly as you reluctantly stick out your tongue and proceed licking her bare sole, tasting all the dirt and grime and whatever else she's stepped on today.

"I had to be barefoot when cleaning the women's bathrooms today...I bet you've got all sorts of crap on your tongue now! Imagine tasting the dirt that Miss Denise, Miss Kim and all those other women have walked on! You're a pathetic gringo bitch. MY pathetic bitch!" Helena thunders down at you while you meekly lick her cheddary-tasting foot. It's so salty that you wish you could chug down some water, or anything to get rid of the taste!

Swapping over her feet, Helena watches you with satisfaction as you humbly lick up and down her other sole, not even daring to look her in the eye. Any chance of changing your arrangement, or reestablishing yourself as someone who isn't a pushover is totally gone. She knows, and you know that you're her bitch, for as long as you're her assistant!

"Now, you ready to clean the office like the bitch you are?" She asks you, cackling at how pathetic you must look.

"Si, Senora Helena," you murmur, swallowing uncomfortably all of her foot sweat and grime after she steps away. You want to splutter and spit it all out, but you know that would only displease her.

As yesterday, you clean the entire office - this time without any help from Helena. It takes over two hours and by the time you're done, you feel like collapsing at Helena's feet. She's decided to stay, just to make sure you've done a good job.

"Ladies' bathroom's not clean," she tells you, after her inspection is complete. "Rest is OK."

"Senora Helena...the woman's bathroom is completely clean...OW!" You wince as Helena smacks you around the back of the head.

"I tell you if it's clean...!" You yelp in pain as she grabs you by the ear and takes you over to the WC. Opening the door she points to the dirty footprints all over the floor. "See - not clean!"

Those are Helena's footsteps! She must have deliberately made her feet dirty and walked all around the women's bathroom, just to make you clean it again! Not falling into her trap, you merely nod and clear you're throat. "Sorry, Senora Helena. I will clean the floor again." Before you head back to get a cloth and disinfectant, Helena stops you with another tug on your ear.

"I've got a better idea, bitch. Clean the dirty footprints with your tongue. That's all it's good for anyway! Get on your hands and knees and lick up every dirty footprint you can see!"

She smirks at you, clearly enjoying the power that she holds over you. Just before you drop to your hands and knees, you feel a small burning resentment build. Licking her feet is one thing, but licking dirty footprints off the bathroom floor...can you bring yourself to do this?!
12232221221222.title: Wait for Helena - don't risk pissing her off!

choices: More humiliation in the bathroom
She lets you go home for the night
Reader's Choice
122322212212221.content:
The past couple days have really done a number on your psyche. Once a proud, up and comer, now you simply resign yourself to your fate. That brief ember of indignation has disappeared and you wordlessly collapse to your knees, prepared to perform your most humiliating task yet. You lower your face to the floor and stick your tongue out. Helena’s feet are visible out of your peripheral vision as she wants to witness this humiliation up close and personal.

“Do it bitch!” She barks at you.

With a sigh you drag your tongue along the tile floor, removing the dirty foot prints in long, broad strokes. Helena is beside herself with laughter above you, in disbelief that you would debase yourself this thoroughly.

“HA! You really don’t have any dignity, do you? Maybe next time I’ll have you lick the bathroom floor clean before you mop it!”

Shuddering at the thought you crawl to the next foot print and repeat the process. By the time you get to the fifth footprint your mouth is completely dry and you can barely loosen the dirt. You turn to face Helena on your knees.

“Please Senora Helena, can I have something to drink? My mouth is so dry I can’t loosen the dirt anymore.” You can’t believe you’ve been reduced to begging for water, so you can do a better job of licking dirty footprints off of a bathroom floor.

You look up at her and your stomach turns immediately when you see the sick smile on her face. “Sure thing gringo bitch!” Before you can react, she grabs a fistful of your hair and drags you across the bathroom floor, flinging you into the first stall she comes to. Maintaining her hold on your hair she grabs your face and shoves it roughly towards the toilet, you try to brace yourself against the seat but she is too strong! Your arms collapse and you face smacks into the cold water of the porcelain bowl. You thrash about but it’s too no avail, your flabby office body is no match for her years of manual labor!

A minute goes by and you can feel your vision start to blur and you begin to think she might actually drown you in here! Involuntarily your mouth opens and you suck in a mouthful of water! A few seconds later you feel her grip release on your hair and you fly out of the water and collapse to the floor, gasping for air. As your senses return you realize Helena is laughing hysterically at you.

“Oh weak little gringo bitch. You are so pathetic! Now you finish the floor!”

Eventually you regain your faculties and slink back to your knees, a mixture of your tears and the toilet water drips off of your face as you lick the remaining prints from the floor. Amazed that your situation always seems to get worse no matter what you do, you continue to weep as you clean the bathroom floor with your tongue while Helena taunts you.
122322212212221.title: Do it - lick Helena's dirty footprints from...

choices: You are young and this is your first 'real' career.
You aren't old but you have an impressive resume.
Something Else?
123.content:
You are Rob and you just started working there a few months ago. Already you had made enemies (already!). Denise your arch rival and her friend Candice were constantly trying to make your life hell.

But before we begin are you a new worker with little experience in the workplace? Are were you brought in by a company head hunter as an ace employee who was brought in to shake some things up?
123.title: The new guy!

choices: Monday afternoon, the end of the work. Everyone has gone and you are about to.
The cleaning lady has just started to work.
1231.content:
You are a young career starter with little experience. Aged only twenty-two years old, but in spite of your youth you are a placeman.

In the last month, you have got a few rivals - Denise and Candice - two gossiping and aspiring woman. You have become friends with a receptionist named Jenny. Candice and Denise seem to hate you, as does the cleaning lady, Helena. She has started to look at you very hostilely. You would not like to meet her in a dark corridor....!

It is interesting and sometimes strenuous, working among so many women. They are all beautiful and ambitious - they mostly want to climb up through the ranks.
1231.title: You are young and this is your first real job

choices: Kim calls you into her office
Encounter Helena
12311.content:
The sound of the computer fan silenced and you got up. The only sound in the office was the shuffling of paper as you cleaned up your desk, and the low buzzing of the hallogen lamps of the large office room. You have been here now for about 13 hours and absolutly exhausted. Straightening your tie you got up of your chair and walked towards the corridor leading to the hall.

In one office the lights were still turned on. Kim, the senior manager, was still working. She came here this morning before you and was still hammering the keyboard in front of her computer. Despite her age you could not ignore her bare legs which where visible between her black boots and the skirt she wore. And everything was still in place where it should be. Quickly you shrugged off the thought and looked straight ahead towards the elevator - and right into Helena's scowling eyes.

She seems to be waiting for you, leaning on her brush and stares at you. You should not show any fear but this women was intimidating. She had the face of an angel, the body someone seemed to have shaped in a wet dream and as far as you know the strength of a wrestler. Jenny told you she is working out every day before and after work and has been world champion in Thai Boxing in her younger years.

You gulp and walk forward...
12311.title: Monday afternoon, the end of the work. Everyone...

choices: Helena the janitor confronts you.  What is her problem?
Your manager (Kim) tells you there are some rumors of poor behavior about you.
Jacinta goes too far and attempts to kiss you!
1232.content:
Your name was Rob and even though you weren't any older than Denise your resume dwarfed hers. You had graduated college completing your JD-MBA within only four years. From there you continued your education and became a Black Belt in Six Sigma and worked for a variety of companies helping them innovate and improve. The position you currently held was fairly below your talent level but it had come with a massive signing bonus and a promise that if you changed things for the better you would be rising through the ranks fairly quickly.

From the start though it was difficult. The office did not trust you as an outsider in fact some of the women in the predominantly female office were down right hostile! Denise, the 26 year old blond, constantly tried to knock your ideas down. In all honestly you couldn't blame her she was the hot stuff in the office before you waltzed in with your dual degrees and formal innovation training.

Dealing with Candice the receptionist was a pain too. Luckily there was more than one otherwise business would have been practically impossible! And then there was Jacinta who seemed to determine to get into your bed. She was pretty attractive but office romances could make your career dicey. The bastards in HR loved to side with women even if there was little evidence that the male had done anything wrong. You figure it was best to stay clear of romantic entanglements all together.

You were focused on your work late at night when a potential disaster occurred.

What was it?
1232.title: You aren't old but you have an impressive r...

choices: Helena knees you in the balls suddenly.
She lets you by.  The next day...
12321.content:
You looked up from your work and realize you are the only one around. Part of your success so far has been you ability to focus in on an issue and zone out all distractions. You were hyper efficient when you did this but you often would lose track of time. You yawned and stretched and began packing your briefcase for your trip home.

However you were interrupted by the cleaning staff. What was her name? Helen? Helena? Something like that.

"Good night." You say as you walk past her.

"You bloody bastard have the decency to look at me at least."

Whoa you were caught off guard. You could hear venom and hostility in her voice in spades. What was her issue? You turn and looked at her. She was a bit older than you and had nice skin and was all in all a pretty brunette.

"I'm sorry you sound upset. What is the matter?"

She poked you hard in the chest. "You're what's the matter. I'm tired of you looking down at me. I'm a person not your bleedin maid!"

You really had no idea what the crazy lady was talking about. You just wanted to go home after a long day of work. You start to get a little irritated.

"Look I'm sorry if I offended you but I'll be on my way now."

But does Helena let you past or does she attack you.? You were physically fit but you absolutely were not expecting to be attacked in your own office!
12321.title: Helena the janitor confronts you.  What is her ...

choices: You fight back!
You apologize and beg her to stop.
123211.content:
You were not expecting the brunette to suddenly rush you and slam her knee right into your bollocks. You crumple to the ground. The pain radiates from your groin and you give a pathetic and shrill cry of pain. You were momentarily disabled by the agony that was racing through your nervous system. The pain radiated out from your testicles and made your stomach clench with nausea.

"Fuck'in bastard!" She snarled at you and then steps back and lets loose with a powerful kick from her foot. She was wearing sneakers and so there was no need to balance herself, it was all power in her kick.

Her foot exploded into your face. You collapsed onto your back writhing in agony. The knee to the balls was far worse but blood was dripping from your nose.

"You aren't better than me and I won't let you talk crap about how I'm some stupid over paid maid! I work hard for my money you wretched tosser!"

You couldn't really even communicate back as you lay there in pain curling your body to protect yourself as she started to rain down kicks and stomps onto you. You pull your head to your chest and curl into the fetal position desperately trying to keep your head and testicles out of the reach of her athletic foot. Long hours of mopping, sweeping and pushing the janitorial cart had given her some dangerous strength!

You must have taken a hundred kicks and stomps before she finally stopped to catch her breath. Your back, arms and legs were a mass of bruises but nothing critical had been damaged. Should you take this momentary respite to try to fight back or should you try to apologize for whatever perceived rudeness you had done to her?
123211.title: Helena knees you in the balls suddenly.

choices: You wake up in the morning naked and tied up in the middle of the office.
You wake up - its still night and your tied up at her mercy!
1232111.content:
This bitch was crazy! While she caught her breath you sprung into again. You struggled to your feet and stumbled directly at her. Your leg twinged as you put weight on it and you realized this may not have been the best idea. If you knew she was hostile before she had beaten you, you were confident you could have beaten her but with you so battered and unsteady you were at a severe disadvantage.

You took a clumsy swing at her that she duck. She shoved you into her push cart and you fell back into a stack of paper towels and bottles of cleaning fluid.

Helena wasted no time in quickly grabbing the mop that she had in the cart and whacked you with it across the chest as you tried to push the cart away. Shit that hurt! You winced and flinched as she pulled back to strike again. The solid piece of wood clipped your arm and soon you were more worried about escape than fighting back. You stumbled away and tried to run.

"You ain't going anywhere you ugly git!" She jammed the the mob handle in between your legs so that on your next step you tripped over it completely and landed face first onto the ground. You moaned in pain as she began to beat you savagely with the the mop. It probably wasn't the best weapon in the world but it was doing the trick. You screamed for help as she slammed it down onto you over and over again. Your forearms were taking the burnt of the blows and hot tears began to trickle down your face.

"Aww are you crying? Crying that the 'ugly un-educated peon' is putting you in your place?"

You had never in your life called someone a 'peon' who the hell did that in this day and age? Her wrath was unswayed by your protests and pleas of innocence as she continued her ruthless assault. You felt something crack in one of your arms and you cradled it as she switched tactics and stomped on your ribs. It was followed by another viciously hard whack to your head and you lost consciousness.
1232111.title: You fight back!

choices: You are found out by one of your enemies.
You are found out by a neutral or one of your allies.
12321111.content: You groan heavily. You open your eyes and see the first rays of sunlight stream into the office window. You become fully awake when you realize you are completely naked and tied to an office chair. Crap if someone find you... it would be beyond embarrassing. And while you had done nothing wrong it would be only even odds if they believed the janitor randomly attacked you. You only hoped someone sympathetic would fine you...
12321111.title: You wake up in the morning naked and tied up in...

choices: Lie and say you insulted her and apologize for it.
Stick with the truth - say you never talked trash about her!
12321112.content:
You wake up and find yourself tied up to one of the support columns int he office. Your hands are behind you and tied together behind the pillar. Your arm is throbbing painfully as is your head. You let a low groan that causes Helena to laugh. The brunette was sitting in front of you on one of the office chairs with her bare lets crossed. You saw that she was barefoot and had taken off her jeans. She had on a pair of white panties, not particularly sexual but not granny panties either.

"You finally up yet ya' tosser?"

You let another groan. "Why are you doing this? Untie me... you just assaulted me!"

She moves the chair closer and slaps you across the face with her bare foot. Her feet bore no toenail polish but they weren't ugly by any means. They were sweaty from working long hours doing menial janitorial work. You flinch, not really from the pain because it wasn't that hard of a slap, but from the wet residue left on your face. It was sweat. You felt sick.

"Stop this."

She slaps you again and laughs.

"Nah you stupid git. You're gonna pay for your high 'an mighty talk."

"But I didn't..." You try to say but she cuts you off by pushing her foot onto your neck, cutting off your words and your oxygen. Her legs were strong! Your face slowly turns red as she watches.

"No more o' of your lies pig. Apologize or you'll regret it."

Faced with the unwelcome reality of being completely at her mercy you don't see any choice. But what if she was just looking for confirmation that you had said those things? If that was the case by you admitting it she would feel justified in doing even worse things to you. Her cold uncompromising gaze gave you chills.

What were you going to do?
12321112.title: You wake up - its still night and your tied up ...

choices: Agree to service her feet.
Beg her, tell her you'll do anything else but not that!
123211121.content:
Her strong foot lets up on the pressure and you breathe in a lungful of air. You had started to see stars! Seeing how brutal she had been earlier and how quickly she was to cut off your life giving oxygen made you realize it was best to appease her. She clearly believed whoever had spread the lies about you (and you were pretty sure you knew who) and getting her to believe otherwise seemed an impossible task. Instead you decided to lie in the hope she would show some mercy.

"All right, all right! I admit it. I'm sorry. I was rude and I'll never do it again, just please let me go."

Helena scowled at you. "I knew it! You bloody bastard, all this time you were denying it but you were a sleazy little blagger! I can't believe you have nothin' better to do with your day than to tell lies."

Seeing her get angrier you start to rethink your plan but it would just infuriate her more if you went back on what you had just said. Instead you push the lie further.

"I'm sorry, I'm just an arrogant fool. But everyone is entitled to some mistakes? You've knocked me around quite a bit, please enough is enough, yeah?"

Helena glared at you. "Its enough when I say its enough bastard. You don't know what its like to slave over your work, this ain't no prissy desk job, I'm on my feet all night, every night. I work hard for me money and I don't need you coming in and disrespecting what I do. I'm not on the dole, I'm workin' hard."

A light flickered on behind her eyes. "Aye that gives me an idea. If you really want to apologize why don't you make me feet feel better? Get your tongue out and do service to someone who had to put up with all your arrogance."

Her damp sweaty feet nauseated you. You still had a trail of sweat on your cheek from where she had slapped you. To put your actual tongue on it? The thought was vile. What kind of monster was she? But at this point what could you do? This temperamental cleaning lady had you by the bollocks!
123211121.title: Lie and say you insulted her and apologize for it.

info.brief_description: What happens when the women of your office decide to use their feet to take control?
info.description:
Most people would consider working at an office to be uneventful and mundane. Well this is no longer the case for you! In your office, you are surrounded by women who are all trying to climb the corporate ladder. Normally this wouldn't phase you, but what happens when their ambitious actions come at your expense? After all - some will literally step on you to get ahead! So who are these ladies that you work with...?

The women of your office:

Michelle  
21 year old petite brunette - a new girl who is fresh out of university, and believes that she is superior because of her college degree. All her life she has been given everything; now that she is working in a proper job, she believes everything should still be handed to her... God forbid she should discover a weakness about you or blackmail you, as she would literally step on you to climb the corporate ladder and would happily have you hand over opportunities to her, as you kneel at her feet and serve her like a Queen!

Kim  
42 year old red head - A new manager who is incredibly sexy and has been placed in a position that most people would take most of their working lives to attain, so you're naturally jealous and a little fearful of her. She understands that in order to gain the respect of the staff that she manages she needs to "make an example" out of the first staff member who steps out of line...

Jacinta  
30 year old blonde woman - she has been working for the business for 4 years and you think she has a crush on you... You find her kind of attractive but despite her strong advances, you've never really thought of her in a sexual way before... But if she finds out any weaknesses about you, I'm willing to bet her advances will have a much more powerful effect on you... Will you be able to resist?

Denise  
26 year old blonde girl - she is your arch nemesis, your worst enemy, the ultimate bitch! Whenever there is an assignment or task at work, you always end up working against her. The hatred you feel towards her is mutual, and she would do anything to take you down for good. Lately, you have managed to come out on top during your little competitions at work; if there were to be a management position on the line, she would be a very strong candidate... What would her tactic to win be? Let's hope she doesn't know your weakness! If anybody would exploit it, it would be her!

Candice  
23 year old brunette - she is one of the receptionists at the office, but unfortunately for you she happens to be Denise's best friend as well! Being the receptionist, she is pretty much the central point of all gossip in the office, so if a secret about you was out there, chances are she would find out... And you would have to do ANYTHING to convince her not to tell Denise... And it doesn't help that she can't stand you!

Jenny  
24 year old red head - another receptionist who works inside the nucleus of office gossip, however this one just so happens to be your friend! If it wasn't for Jenny, you would have to go to Candice to get documents and stationary, and she would probably make you grovel for it! As Candice and Denise are constantly trying to convince her to join them in hating you, you are screwed if they succeed! So you want to... No, NEED to keep your friendship with Jenny strong!

Helena  
34 year old brunette - She is actually the janitor, cleaning the entire office. She seems to have it in for you because Candice and Denise have told her that you said her job was pathetic and you constantly put shit on her job because she was "Just a cleaning woman". This is a lie, but unfortunately it worked and Helena hates you now. Whenever you see her she gives you a dirty look and you believe that her mission in life is to make you a slave at her feet to put you in your place... Do you secretly want that to happen? Or not?!


In this interactive story you can choose whether you have a foot fetish or a dislike for feet, then decide upon your level of experience and standing within the office workplace: whether you are a manager, established for several years, or the new guy!

This is a story created and developed by me  and Vincanity  


Please check out our other foot-related interactives! :)


Rules

~Please use correct spelling, punctuation and grammar
~Only women are allowed to go barefoot
~Write in second person (you - not I/he etc.) Tense is not so important to be honest!
~No toilet, scat, vore, extreme gore, death or shrinking please
~No ending chapters - any that are added will be removed!
~Please make sure chapters are at least 1500 characters in length, though the occasional 'choice' chapter is fine.
~Please do not introduce any new characters. If you do want to, message me first!


The more detailed your chapters the better! I will give GPs to good additions and will add to your stories in return - just let me know which ones!

Have fun! Now, time to enter the office...
